eng: The Tarnished will soon return.
chn: 褪色者将要归来──

eng: Guided by Grace once lost.
chn: 受那失去的赐福指引，回到此地。

eng: The Golden Order is broken to its core.
chn: 黄金律法早已破碎到无以复加。

eng: They will fight. And they will die. In an unending curse.
chn: 战斗、死亡──这永无止尽的诅咒，

eng: For how else is a champion, or a lord, to be born?
chn: 却是催生英雄与王者的唯一温床。

eng: Brandish the Elden Ring.
chn: 为了我们所有人……

eng: ...for all of us.
chn: 展现艾尔登法环吧。

eng: The fallen leaves have spoken.
chn: ……落叶捎来讯息：

eng: Of the return of the Tarnished. To the Lands Between.
chn: 褪色者将回到交界地。

eng: Elden Ring, O, Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环啊，艾尔登法环──

eng: Shaper of life, arbiter of fate.
chn: 掌管生命、左右命运，

eng: Lord of the very stars above.
chn: 甚至能支配星辰流转。

eng: Tarnished warrior, spurned by the grace of gold.
chn: 褪色者啊，不受黄金赐福的战士啊，

eng: Seek that which hath been lost to thee.
chn: 寻找失去的事物吧。

eng: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 穿越雾海，前往交界地──

eng: Seek the Elden Ring!
chn: 寻找艾尔登法环吧！

eng: Brave Tarnished. Mighty warriors, who fought at my side.
chn: 褪色者啊，并肩而战的战士们啊。

eng: Await the summons. It will call to thee one day.
chn: 我们那失去的赐福，还有指头，

eng: Heed the fading grace. Listen to the Fingers.
chn: 总有一天会呼唤你们。

eng: Gold commandeth the very stars,
chn: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

eng: giving life its fullest brilliance.
chn: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金──

eng: Elden Ring, O, Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环啊，艾尔登法环，

eng: Be ready, once it is shattered.
chn: 直到它破碎的那一刻到来。

eng: Seek the Elden Ring, O Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者啊，寻求艾尔登法环吧。

eng: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 穿越雾海，前往交界地吧。

eng: Become Lord. Enact thy will!
chn: 当上王，实现愿望吧！

eng: Seek the Elden Ring!
chn: 寻求艾尔登法环吧！

eng: Long ago, ye Tarnished lost something most dear.
chn: 你们褪色者吶，曾经失去了某种伟大的事物。

eng: The Elden Ring. O Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环吶，艾尔登法环──

eng: Its gold commanded the very stars,
chn: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

eng: giving life its fullest brilliance.
chn: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金。

eng: Though shattered, it yet guides thy kin.
chn: 然而如今，祂早已破碎──

eng: Though fractured, it yet guides thy kin.
chn: 然而如今，祂早已破碎──

eng: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 指引你们穿越雾海，前往交界地。

eng: Hoarah Roux, the Gold Mask.
chn: “金色面具”荷莱·露、

eng: Lady Yuliya, the Deathbed Companion.
chn: “同眠少女”尤莉雅、

eng: The hideous Dung Eater.
chn: “食粪者”、

eng: And Sir Gideon Orphnier, the All-knowing.
chn: “百智爵士”基甸·奥夫尼尔。

eng: Each coveteth the Elden Ring.
chn: 所有人都渴求艾尔登法环──

eng: But their ambitions are yet unmet.
chn: 却没有人能得偿所愿。

eng: Surely thou hast thine own design?
chn: ……你心里也有未了的愿望吧？

eng: Then implore the Two Fingers, for guidance.
chn: 那就祈求双指降下指引吧。

eng: Across the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 祈求在雾海彼端的交界地之中，

eng: To face the Elden Ring.
chn: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

eng: To stand before the Elden Ring.
chn: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

eng: Face the Elden Ring.
chn: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

eng: And reclaim what was thine.
chn: 有幸觐见艾尔登法环。

eng: Elden Ring, O Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环吶，艾尔登法环──

eng: Its gold commanded the very stars,
chn: 那甚至能支配星辰流转，

eng: giving life its fullest brilliance.
chn: 让生命登上颠峰的黄金。

eng: Shattered, by someone, or something.
chn: ……如今却因故变得支离破碎。

eng: Fractured, by someone, or something.
chn: ……如今却因故变得支离破碎。

eng: Godrick, the feeble.
chn: “懦弱”葛瑞克、

eng: Malenia, decayed from birth.
chn: “生而腐败”玛莲妮亚、

eng: General Radahn, slayer of giants.
chn: “巨人杀手”拉塔恩将军、

eng: Rykard, the tyrannical serpent.
chn: “傲慢之蛇”拉卡德，

eng: And Morgott, Prince of the Omen.
chn: 再加上“恶兆王子”蒙葛特。

eng: Each, inheriting their own shard, played a part in the Shattering,
chn: 那些碎片君王引发了破碎战争，

eng: a war with no end, and no victor.
chn: 战争持续了很久、很久，然而却没有人胜出。

eng: And so the Two Fingers call upon ye, the Tarnished.
chn: ……所以双指才会呼唤你们这些褪色者。

eng: To cross the Sea of Fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 要你们穿越雾海，前往交界地，

eng: To seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 去追求艾尔登法环。

eng: Seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 渴求艾尔登法环吧。

eng: The fallen leaves tell a story.
chn: ……落叶捎来讯息：

eng: The great Elden Ring was shattered.
chn: 在雾的彼端，我们的故乡“交界地”，

eng: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
chn: 那伟大的艾尔登法环已经破碎──

eng: Now, Queen Marika the Eternal is nowhere to be found,
chn: “永恒女王”玛莉卡销声匿迹，

eng: and in the Night of the Black Knives, Godwyn the Golden was first to perish.
chn: 在黑刀阴谋之夜，“黄金”葛德文最先失去性命。

eng: Soon, Marika's offspring, demigods all, claimed the shards of the Elden Ring.
chn:
玛莉卡之子──
诸位半神拿到艾尔登法环的碎片，

eng: The mad taint of their newfound strength triggered the Shattering.
chn: 却因为那股力量堕入歧途、陷入疯狂、引发碎片战争……

eng: A war from which no lord arose.
chn: 在那场无王存在的战争最后──

eng: A war leading to abandonment by the Greater Will.
chn: 无上意志放逐了他们。

eng: Arise now, ye Tarnished.
chn: 噢，所以啊，褪色者啊──

eng: Ye dead, who yet live.
chn: 依旧无法永眠的死者啊。

eng: The call of long-lost grace speaks to us all.
chn: 那许久以前我们失去的赐福，正在出声呼唤。

eng: Hoarah Loux, chieftain of the badlands.
chn: “蛮荒地王者”荷莱·露、

eng: The ever-brilliant Goldmask.
chn: 光耀金面具、

eng: Fia, the Deathbed Companion.
chn: “死眠少女”菲雅、

eng: The loathsome Dung Eater.
chn: 受尽唾弃的食粪者、

eng: And Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-knowing.
chn: “百智爵士”基甸·奥夫尼尔。

eng: It happened an age ago.
chn: 那是很久远的事了……

eng: But when I recall, I see it true.
chn: 但对我来说，历历在目。

eng: On a night of wint'ry fog.
chn: 在飘着冰冷浓雾的夜里……

eng: The Rune of Death was stolen,
chn: 死亡卢恩被窃走，

eng: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
chn: 在“黄金”葛德文成为半神的初始死者……

eng: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
chn: 也许玛莉卡女王就陷入了狂乱。

eng: The Elden Ring was broken,
chn: 之后，艾尔登法环被击碎，

eng: triggering the Shattering, an internecine war between demigods.
chn: 诸位半神引发了破碎战争。

eng: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
chn: “碎星英雄”拉塔恩将军，

eng: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
chn: “米凯拉的锋刃”残身玛莲妮亚，

eng: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
chn: 力量最为强大的他们战斗到最后一刻……

eng: But there would be no victor.
chn: 然而，却无人胜出。

eng: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
chn: 所以时至今日，世界依旧百废待举，

eng: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
chn: 静待艾尔登之王现身。

eng: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
chn: ……还是说，你就是那个人？

eng: It happened an age ago.
chn: 那是很久远的事了……

eng: But when I recall, I see it true.
chn: 但对我来说，历历在目。

eng: On a night of wint'ry fog.
chn: 在飘着冰冷浓雾的夜里……

eng: Bearers of Black Knives stole into the dark.
chn: 黑刀刺客傍着夜色疾行。

eng: And the demigods began to fall, starting with Godwyn the Golden.
chn: 在“黄金”葛德文成为半神的初始死者……

eng: Queen Marika was driven to the brink.
chn: 也许玛莉卡女王就陷入了狂乱。

eng: The Shattering ensued; a war that wrought only darkness.
chn: 关于破碎战争，全是一团迷雾──

eng: The Elden Ring was broken, but by whom? And why?
chn: 是什么人，为了什么目的击碎艾尔登法环？

eng: What could the Demigods ever hope to win by warring?
chn: 诸位半神是为了什么投身战争？

eng: The conqueror of the stars, General Radahn.
chn: “碎星英雄”拉塔恩将军，

eng: And the Blade of Miquella, Malenia the Severed.
chn: “米凯拉的锋刃”残身玛莲妮亚，

eng: These two were the mightiest to remain, and locked horns in combat.
chn: 力量最为强大的他们战斗到最后一刻……

eng: But why was there no victor?
chn: 但又为什么，无人胜出？

eng: And so, we inhabit a fractured world.
chn: 时至今日，世界依旧百废待举，

eng: Awaiting the arrival of the Elden Lord.
chn: 静待艾尔登之王现身。

eng: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?
chn: ……还是说，你就是那个人？

eng: You think this is the one, Torrent?
chn: ……托雷特，你很在意这个人？

eng: Is that him, Torrent?
chn: ……托雷特，是这个人吧？

eng: Is that her, Torrent?
chn: ……托雷特，是这个人吧？

eng: Don't worry, it's not too late.
chn: 不用担心，还有救喔。

eng: He is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

eng: She is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

eng: ...For that is their curse.
chn: 毕竟这是个诅咒。

eng: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on his side.
chn: ……不用担心，托雷特。还有救喔。

eng: Don't worry Torrent, fortune is on her side.
chn: ……不用担心，托雷特。还有救喔。

eng: We found him here, after all.
chn: 终于找到了。

eng: We found her here, after all.
chn: 终于找到了。

eng: One of his kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

eng: One of her kind is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
chn: 这个人肯定也会追求艾尔登法环……

eng: ...Even if it does violate the Golden Order...
chn: 即使这么做会背离黄金律法。

eng: Foul Tarnished,
chn: 褪色者啊──

eng: In search of the Elden Ring.
chn: 受愚昧的野心之火摆弄，

eng: Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
chn: 妄想得到艾尔登法环？

eng: Hrah!
Someone must extinguish thy flame.
chn: 那么，连同那阵火在内，都该扑灭。

eng: Let it be Margit the Fell!
chn: 我“恶兆妖鬼”玛尔基特，立刻执行。

eng: Mighty dragon, thou'rt a trueborn heir.
chn: ……同为后裔的龙啊，

eng: Lend me thy strength, o kindred.
chn: 汝的力量，无庸置疑……

eng: Deliver me unto greater heights.
chn: 能将朕推向更高的境界。

eng: ...Well.
A lowly Tarnished,
chn: 区区褪色者，

eng: playing as a lord.
chn: 气焰倒是不小。

eng: I command thee, kneel!
chn: 跪下吧，

eng: I am the lord of all that is golden!
chn: 朕可是黄金君王！

eng: <panting>
Ahh, truest of dragons.
chn: 啊，强大的龙啊……

eng: Lend me thy strength...
chn: 将汝的力量……

eng: Nnngh!
<panting>
Forefathers, one and all...
chn: 诸位先祖啊……

eng: Great King Godfrey...
chn: 伟大的葛孚雷王啊……

eng: Bear witness!
chn: 敬请见证！

eng: It's been a long while, Morgott.
chn: ……许久不见了，蒙葛特。

eng: Long and hard didst thou fight.
chn: ……能战斗至今，着实不简单。

eng: Tarnished Warrior.
chn: 褪色者啊──

eng: Spurned by the grace of gold.
chn: 不受黄金赐福的战士啊。

eng: Be assured, the Elden Ring
chn: 那伟大的艾尔登法环──

eng: resteth close at hand.
chn: 确实近在眼前。

eng: Alas, I am returned.
chn: 然而我重回此地，

eng: To be granted audience once more.
chn: 为的就是再次觐见它。

eng: Upon my name as Godfrey,
chn: 我名为葛孚雷──

eng: The first Elden Lord!
chn: 是初始的艾尔登之王。

eng: Nngh!
That will be all.
chn: 好了，够了。

eng: Thou didst me good service, Serosh.
chn: 瑟洛修啊，你帮了我不少忙。

eng: I've given thee courtesy enough.
chn: 我受够繁文缛节了。

eng: Rrraaargh!
<exhales>
Now I fight as Hoarah Loux!
chn: 从此刻开始，我是荷莱·露！

eng: Warrior!
chn: 一名“战士”！

eng: Dearest Miquella.
chn: 我的米凯拉啊，

eng: You must abide alone a while.
chn: 请您稍等我一会儿。

eng: No one else will take you.
chn: 我不会再让您……

eng: Never again, I swear!
chn: 被任何一个人夺走！

eng: Welcome, honoured guest.
chn: 贵宾莅临了──

eng: To the birthplace of our dynasty!
chn: 前来见证我们的美妙王朝！

eng: Foul Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者啊，

eng: Graceless Tarnished.
chn: 不受赐福的褪色者啊──

eng: What is thy business with these thrones?
chn: 来到王座，何事之有？

eng: Ahh...
Godrick the Golden.
chn: “黄金”葛瑞克、

eng: The twin prodigies, Miquella and Malenia.
chn: 蒙受天赐的孪生子，米凯拉与玛莲妮亚、

eng: General Radahn.
chn: 拉塔恩将军、

eng: Praetor Rykard.
chn: 拉卡德司法官、

eng: Lunar Princess Ranni.
chn: “月之公主”菈妮──

eng: Wilful traitors, all.
chn: 一群不知服从的叛徒。

eng: Thy kind are all of a piece.
chn: 你们全都是一丘之貉。

eng: Pillagers, come seeking vengeance upon the Erdtree.
chn: 敌视黄金树的侵略者啊。

eng: Pillagers. Emboldened by the flame of ambition.
chn: 为野心之火摆弄的掠夺者啊。

eng: Ngh!
Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
chn: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

eng: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
chn: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名！

eng: O, Death.
O Destined Death...
chn: ……命定之死啊。

eng: Become my blade, once more.
chn: 再一次化成我的剑吧。

eng: <long exhalation>
Ahh, art thou come to be born anew?
chn: 哎呀，你也想要再一次诞生，所以过来了吗？

eng: Be not afraid, there is no pain...
chn: 不用担心，一点也不会痛唷……

eng: <children giggling>
Hush, little culver.
chn: 哎呀……你出现了……

eng: Hush, fair maid.
chn: 哎呀……你出现了……

eng: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
chn: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

eng: Ahh, my beloved...
chn: 啊，我可爱的孩子……

eng: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
chn: 等等我，我马上来抱抱你……

eng: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
chn: 你们会一直、一直、一直诞生唷。

eng: Ye will be countless, born, forever.
chn: 你们会一直、一直诞生唷……

eng: Defiler of mother's rich slumber.
chn: 侵入母亲如泥摇篮的人物啊。

eng:
Upon my name as Ranni the
Witch, thou wilt not go
unpunished.
chn: 我以魔女菈妮之名，降下惩罚。

eng:
After death, quite the tale will be
thine to tell.
chn: 在死亡之后继续传唱吧：

eng:
Of the last Queen of Caria,
Rennala of the Full Moon.
chn: 卡利亚的末代女王──

eng:
And the majesty of the night
she conjureth.
chn: “满月”蕾娜菈有如高雅黑夜的化身。

eng: Ahh, my sweet children...
chn: 啊，我的孩子……

eng: Have no fear, I will hold thee. Patience...
chn: 等等我，我马上来抱抱你……

eng: Ye will be countless born, forever and ever.
chn: 你们会一直、一直、一直诞生唷。

eng: Upon my name as Ranni the Witch.
chn: 我以魔女菈妮之名宣告：

eng:
Mother's rich slumber shall not be
disturbed by thee.
chn: 勿侵扰母亲的如泥酣眠。

eng: Foul trespasser.
chn: 罪人啊。

eng: Send word far and wide.
chn: 传唱后世吧：

eng:
Of the last Queen of Caria,
Rennala of the Full Moon.
chn: 卡利亚的末代女王──

eng:
And the majesty of the night
she conjureth.
chn: “满月”蕾娜菈有如高雅黑夜的化身。

eng: I dreamt for so long.
chn: ……我做了好长的梦──

eng: My flesh was dull gold...and my blood, rotted.
chn: 身体如黄金失色，血液陷入腐败……

eng: Corpse after corpse, left in my wake...
chn: 堆积了不计其数的尸骸，

eng: As I awaited...his return.
chn: 就为了等到那个人归来。

eng: ...Heed my words.
chn: ……好好感受吧。

eng:
I am Malenia.
Blade of Miquella.
chn: 我玛莲妮亚，身为米凯拉的锋刃──

eng: And I have never known defeat.
chn: 战无不胜的理由。

eng: Sweet Tarnished...
chn: 褪色者啊……

eng: Dearest companion...
chn: 我的朋友啊……

eng: Did you not heed my warning?
chn: 你不理会我的警告吗？

eng: Your greed knows no end.
chn: 真是贪婪。

eng: You would steal the last drop of warmth from his empty frame?
chn: 事到如今，还想夺走空壳仅存的温暖。

eng: After all you've taken, you still want more?
chn: 你还想夺走更多吗？

eng: Then you will have to kill me.
chn: ……那么，就战胜我吧。

eng: I am Malenia, Sword of Miquella.
chn: 打倒战无不胜、米凯拉的剑──

eng: And I have never known defeat.
chn: 打倒我玛莲妮亚。

eng: My dear twin, accept this gift.
chn: 亲爱的妹妹啊──

eng: A gift of abundance, my last drop of dew.
chn: 收下我的丰饶，我最后的露滴。

eng: Let all things flourish,
chn: 无论美丽，无论丑陋──

eng: whether graceful, or malign.
chn: 愿一切都依他的原形，成长茁壮。

eng: Wait.
chn: ……慢着。

eng: The scarlet bloom flowers once more.
chn: 猩红花朵将再一次怒放。

eng: You will witness true horror.
chn: 见识何谓“毛骨悚然”吧。

eng: Now, rot!
chn: 腐败吧！

eng: Farewell, then.
chn: ……永别了，

eng: May your visit be fruitful.
chn: 希望会是一场完美的邂逅。

eng: Hmm...
Very well.
chn: 还不坏啊。

eng: You...
chn: 你啊……

eng: A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.
chn: 成为我蛇王的祭品吧，

eng: Join the Serpent King, as family...
chn: 成为我蛇王的族人吧，

eng: And devour the gods with me!
chn: 一起吞噬神祇吧！

eng: Together, we will devour the very gods!
chn: 一起吞噬神祇吧！

eng: General Radahn is cursed ever to wander.
chn: 拉塔恩将军一直处在仿徨的状态──

eng: Before we begin, allow me to paint you the full picture.
chn: ……在祭典开始前，和你说一说吧。

eng: Eaten from the inside, by Malenia's scarlet rot, his wits are long gone.
chn:
玛莲妮亚的猩红腐败不只由内而外侵蚀身体，
也让将军的神智陷入疯狂。

eng: Now he gathers the corpses of former friends and foes alike, gorging on them, like a dog.
chn:
他将尸体集中起来，不论敌我，
接着像条野狗一样啃食……

eng: Howling at the sky.
chn: 朝天空发出痛心的哭喊。

eng: O Erdtree, you shall burn.
chn: 黄金树啊，燃烧吧。

eng: Burn, for the sake of the new Lord.
chn: 为了新王，燃烧吧。

eng: Thank you. For guiding me here.
chn: ……谢谢你带我来这里。

eng: The one who walks alongside flame,
chn: “伴火同进者，”

eng: Shall one day meet the road of Destined Death.
chn: “终有一天会遇见命定之死。”

eng: Good-bye.
chn: 永别了。

eng: I hope you will become Lord. Lord of each and all.
chn: 希望你能当上王──我们所有人的王。

eng: Aaargh! Aargh!
<guttural moan>
Nngghaa!
Argh!
<great howl>
Now wilt ye serve, each and all.
chn: ……侍奉的时刻到啦。

eng: The Elden Lord is crowned.
chn: ……法环之王加冕啦。

eng:
The new Elden Lord,
steward of a fracturing world.
chn: 新的法环之王现身，衰颓时代随之降临……

eng: And so beginneth the age of fracture...
chn: 衰颓时代就要拉开序幕了吶……

eng: The fallen leaves tell a story.
chn: ……落叶捎来讯息：

eng: Of how a Tarnished, of no renown, became Elden Lord.
chn: 无名的褪色者，当上了艾尔登之王。

eng: The fallen leaves tell a story.
chn: ……落叶捎来讯息：

eng: Of how a Tarnished became Elden Lord.
chn: 在雾的彼端，我们的故乡“交界地”，

eng: In our home, across the fog, the Lands Between.
chn: 褪色者当上了艾尔登之王。

eng: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
chn: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

eng: An Age of Fracture.
chn: 那是个“衰颓时代”。

eng: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
chn: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

eng: The Age of Order.
chn: 那是个“律法时代”。

eng: The Age Absolute.
chn: 那是个“完美律法时代”。

eng: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
chn: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

eng: The Age of the Duskborn
chn: 那是个“潜藏者当道的时代”。

eng: Our seed will look back upon us, and recall.
chn: 在王的治理之下，想必人们会如此形容──

eng: The reviled curse that defined our age.
chn: 那时代充斥该忌讳的诅咒、玷污……

eng: The Blessing of Despair.
chn: 最适合以绝望赐福为名。

eng: ...The battle is over, I see.
chn: ……一切都结束了吧。

eng: I do solemnly swear.
chn: 我在此宣誓：

eng: To every living being, and every living soul.
chn: 所有的生命，所有的灵魂啊，

eng: Now cometh the age of the stars.
chn: 接下来即将迈入星星时代──

eng:
A thousand year voyage
under the wisdom of the Moon.
chn: 将遵循月的法则，开始千年的旅程。

eng: Here beginneth the chill night that encompasses all, reaching the great beyond.
chn: 众生啊，在这冰冷长夜中，漫长地思考吧──

eng: Into fear, doubt, and loneliness...
chn: 何谓恐惧、仿徨、孤独？

eng: As the path stretcheth into darkness...
chn: 以及何谓深入黑暗？

eng: Well then. Shall we?
chn: 来，走吧……

eng: My fair consort, eternal.
chn: 我永远的王啊。

eng: ...The battle is over, I see.
chn: ……战争结束了吧。

eng: ...All matters are settled, then.
chn: ……一切都结束了吧。

eng: I do solemnly swear.
chn: 我在此宣誓：

eng: To all the hearts that remain in thy thrall.
chn: 依然受到禁锢的众生心灵啊。

eng: To all life, and the souls harboured therein.
chn: 众生的生命，以及其中的心灵啊。

eng: Now comes the age of the mind.
chn: 接下来即将迈入精神时代──

eng:
A thousand year voyage,
governed by the wisdom of the Moon.
chn: 将遵循月的法则，开始千年的旅程。

eng:
All shall be encompassed, in a still and silent night, unending.
And thought shall turn to fear,
chn: 众生啊，在这悄然无声的长夜中，永远思考吧──

eng: emptiness, life...
chn: 何谓恐惧、空虚、生命？

eng: And a path stretching into the darkness...
chn: 以及何谓深入黑暗？

eng: Let us go, together.
chn: 来，一起走吧……

eng: My dear consort, eternal.
chn: 我永远的王啊。

eng: Lord of Frenzied Flame...
chn: 癫火之王……

eng: I will seek you, as far as you may travel...
chn: ……我一定会到你的身边……

eng: To deliver you what is yours.
chn: 为你送上──

eng: Destined Death.
chn: 命定之死。

eng: Young seedling, young seedling.
chn: 小树苗啊，小树苗，

eng: Return to the bosom of earth.
chn: 回到大地的怀抱吧。

eng: But remember well,
chn: 但是千万要记得，

eng: Thou'rt mine.
chn: 你是属于我的。

eng: So shall I give of myself. This is for thee.
chn: 来，收下吧。

eng: Mine abundance, my drop of dew.
chn: 收下我的丰饶，收下我的露滴，

eng: Quench thy thirst, throughout thy frame.
chn: 滋润你的渴、充满你的身，

eng: Blossom and burgeon, time and again.
chn: 一株株的新芽，一株株地萌生。

eng: Grow larger, stronger.
chn: 愿你越长越大、越长越高。

eng: Until the day cometh.
chn: 然后终有一天，

eng: When thou canst share in my dream.
chn: 和我一同梦见吧──

eng: Elden Ring, O Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环、艾尔登法环，

eng: Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.
chn: 那优美的律法，那温柔的梦。

eng: If thou covetest the throne,
chn: 有意为王的人啊，

eng: Impress my vision upon thine heart.
chn: 请别忘记我的虚像。

eng: In the new world of thy making,
chn: 希望在你那全新的世界里头，

eng: all things will flourish,
chn: 无论美丽，无论丑陋──

eng: whether graceful, or malign.
chn: 一切都能依他的原形，成长茁壮。

eng: Greetings.
chn: 你好。

eng: Traveller from beyond the Fog.
chn: 穿越雾前来的人啊。

eng: I am Melina.
chn: 我的名字是梅琳娜……

eng: I offer you an accord.
chn: 想要和你谈个条件。

eng: And one other. Whom grace would again bless.
chn: ……那失去的赐福又再一次，

eng: A Tarnished of no renown.
chn: 回到默默无名的褪色者身上。

eng: Cross the fog, to the Lands Between.
chn: 朝雾的彼端前进，抵达交界地，

eng: to stand before the Elden Ring.
chn: 觐见艾尔登法环──

eng: And become the Elden Lord.
chn: 当上艾尔登之王吧。

eng: The Rune of Death is unbound.
chn: ……死亡卢恩被释放了。

eng: Black flames have devoured the Erdtree,
chn: 黑色火焰燃烧了黄金树，

eng: and the Lands Between are shrouded by Death's dark fate.
chn: 灰暗的死亡命运遍布交界地。

eng: But the flames will also burn the impenetrable thorns.
chn: 然而那火焰，同样也燃烧了拒绝的刺。

eng: Farewell it is, then.
chn: 是时候道别了。

eng: You'll be Elden Lord, yet.
chn: 一定要当上艾尔登之王吶……

eng: Well, if you really are that gullible...
chn: ……你真的是烂好人啊。

eng: Ngh!
then stay away from the Volcano Manor!
chn: 那我劝你最好别靠近火山官邸。

eng: Bye now!
chn: 拜啦！

eng: Take care!
chn: 一路小心！

eng: Lord host, I could not be more content.
chn: 宿主啊，我真的非常高兴。

eng: I found knowledge, and then found someone. That someone was you.
chn: 庆幸自己获得智慧，遇见的人是您……

eng: And now, inside you, here I am...
chn: 庆幸能待在您的体内，完成这件事。

eng: Well well well?
chn: 哦哦哦？

eng: I should have known, you scheming little thief.
chn: 你真的是不要脸的小偷啊。

eng: The gods demand vengeance. Vengeance!
chn: 那只能说活该遭天谴啦，这是天谴！

eng: He he he he he...
chn: 嘿嘿嘿……

eng: My sincerest gratitude. I thought I'd never wrench that thing open.
chn: 多谢啊，你不打开我还伤脑筋咧。

eng: You're the finest customer a man ever had!
chn: 你真的是大贵客耶。

eng: This is how you die, you disgusting Tarnished.
chn: 下贱的褪色者，你去死吧。

eng: Don't worry, I've got big plans for you. After you snuff it...
chn: 我会让你的牺牲发挥最大的价值。

eng: <screaming>
<screaming>
(explained above)
Unleash it upon them! A cursed blessing to all!
chn: 所有的一切！蒙受诅咒的赐福吧！

eng: (scream of pain)
Have you heard of the Finger Maidens?
chn: ……你知道指头女巫吗？

eng: They serve the Two Fingers, offering guidance, and aid, to the Tarnished.
chn: 她们是侍奉双指，帮助、引导褪色者的人……

eng: But you, I am afraid, are maidenless.
chn: 但现在的你，没有女巫在身边。

eng: I can play the role of maiden.
chn: ……我可以代替她们的职务。

eng: Turning runes into strength.
chn: 我能够将卢恩化作你的力量。

eng: To aid you in your search for the Elden Ring.
chn:
只要你渴求艾尔登法环，
这件事肯定对你有帮助。

eng: You need only take me with you.
chn: ……所以，希望你能帮忙──

eng: To the foot of the Erdtree.
chn: 带我到黄金树的树脚。

eng: Then it's settled.
chn: ……这样就算谈成了。

eng: Summon me by grace to turn runes into strength.
chn:
想让卢恩化为自己的力量时，
请在赐福所在处呼唤我。

eng: Ahh, another matter.
chn: ……对了，还有一件事。

eng: I bequeath to you this ring.
chn: 这枚戒指交给你。

eng: Use it to traverse great distances.
chn: 需要长距离移动时，就使用那枚戒指吧。

eng: It will summon a spectral steed named Torrent.
chn: 那能够呼唤名为托雷特的骏马灵魂。

eng: Torrent has chosen you.
chn: ……托雷特选上了你，

eng: Treat him with respect.
chn: 希望你好好待它。

eng: I understand. I'm asking you to put faith in but a stranger.
chn: ……我明白了。心有疑念，我也不勉强。

eng: Yet I'm certain that we can reach an understanding.
chn: 但你一定会需要这个条件。

eng: Summon me by grace if you should reconsider.
chn: 届时，希望你到赐福所在处呼唤我。

eng: Have you reconsidered my offer?
chn: ……你愿意接受条件了吗？

eng: Shall I turn your runes to strength?
chn: ……想把卢恩化为自己的力量吗？

eng: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
chn: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

eng: Phew. It is done.
chn: ……这样就结束了。

eng: This tiny golden aura is the grace of the Erdtree.
chn: ……这簇小巧的金光，是黄金树的赐福。

eng: This light once shone in the eyes of your Tarnished brethren.
chn: 据说在过去，这金光从你们褪色者的眼眸散失，

eng: But now it is all that guides you. Or so I hear.
chn: 而如今，又转而出现、引导你们。

eng: You can see them, can't you?
chn: 你应该看得见吧？

eng: The rays of grace, that guide you through your burden.
chn: 赐福的指引──引导使命所在的光芒。

eng: Me?
chn: ……关于我吗？

eng: I'm searching.
chn: ……我在寻找。

eng: For my purpose, given to me by my mother inside the Erdtree, long ago.
chn: 过去母亲在黄金树赐予我的那个使命，

eng: For the reason that I yet live, burned and bodiless.
chn:
还有即使肉身烧毁，变成灵魂形貌的身体，
我还能继续活命的理由。

eng: There is something for which I must apologise.
chn: ……其实我也想向你道歉，

eng: I've acted the Finger Maiden, yet can offer no guidance.
chn:
我曾说要代替指头女巫的职务，
但我没有办法引导你。

eng: I am no maiden. My purpose…was long ago lost.
chn:
因为我不是女巫，而且……
也失去了既有的使命。

eng: Upon the cliff, in Castle Stormveil, is a shardbearer.
chn: ……断崖之城史东薇尔，那里有一位碎片君王。

eng: A demigod who inherited a fragment of the shattered Elden Ring.
chn:
他是在艾尔登法环破碎之际，
拥有那破碎一部分的其中一位半神。

eng: If the rays of grace signal the castle,
chn: ……如果赐福的光芒指引你前往那里，

eng: then the Elden Ring beckons you.
chn: 那么，你就是真的受到艾尔登法环引导。

eng: As an ally by pact,
chn: 对和你有着约定的人而言……

eng: ...I pray that you are fit...
chn: 我希望你能保持如此。

eng: To face the challenge presented by the Ring.
chn:
……我希望你能受艾尔登法环引导，
进而勇于挑战各种难关。

eng: Spoken echoes linger here.
chn: ……这个地方存在着箴言。

eng: Words of Queen Marika, who vanished long ago.
chn:
是很久以前就销声匿迹的玛莉卡女王，
她所留下的箴言。

eng: If you wish, I will share them with you.
chn: ……你想听的话，我可以转达。

eng: Very well. In Marika's own words.
chn:
……我知道了。
我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: My Lord, and thy warriors. I divest each of thee of thy grace.
chn: “吾王啊，王的众战士啊，我将夺去你们的赐福。”

eng: With thine eyes dimmed, ye will be driven from the Lands Between.
chn:
“当你们的双眸黯淡褪色，
我将放逐你们于交界地之外──”

eng: Ye will wage war in a land afar, where ye will live, and die.
chn: “于交界地之外征战，生存，死亡吧。”

eng: Well? Perhaps that might serve you in lieu of a maiden's guidance.
chn: ……怎么样？希望多少能代替女巫的引导。

eng: Of course. Perhaps there is no need.
chn: ……我知道了，这不必勉强自己听。

eng: Tell me if you should change your mind.
chn: 改变心意了再和我说。

eng: Spoken echoes of Queen Marika linger here, as well.
chn: ……这个地方也有玛莉卡女王的箴言。

eng: Shall I share them with you?
chn: 你还想听的话，我可以转达。

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: Then, after thy death, I will give back what I once claimed.
chn: “在你们面临死亡之后，那被夺去的会再归还──”

eng: Return to the Lands Between, wage war, and brandish the Elden Ring.
chn:
“返回交界地，投身交战，
随心所欲地展现艾尔登法环。”

eng: Grow strong in the face of death. Warriors of my lord. Lord Godfrey.
chn:
“与死亡比邻，成为强者吧──
王的众战士啊，吾王葛孚雷啊。”

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: The Erdtree governs all. The choice is thine.
chn: “黄金树是掌管一切的存在。做出抉择吧──”

eng: Become one with the Order. Or divest thyself of it.
chn: “要融入律法？还是脱离律法……”

eng: To wallow at the fringes; a powerless upstart.
chn: “沦为无力的边境支流？”

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: Hear me, Demigods. My children beloved.
chn: “半神啊，我可爱的孩子啊。”

eng: Make of thyselves that which ye desire. Be it a Lord. Be it a God.
chn:
“你们能成为任何存在──
能成为王者，也能当上神祇。”

eng: But should ye fail to become aught at all, ye will be forsaken.
chn: “但是当你们没有成为任一存在，就会被抛弃……”

eng: Amounting only to sacrifices...
chn: “并且，成为祭品。”

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: O Radagon, leal hound of the Golden Order.
chn: “噢，拉达冈啊，黄金律法的忠犬啊。”

eng: Thou'rt yet to become me. Thou'rt yet to become a god.
chn: “你还不是我，还不是神祇。”

eng: Let us be shattered, both. Mine other self.
chn: “我的半身啊！击碎彼此吧！”

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: I declare mine intent, to search the depths of the Golden Order.
chn: “我在此宣告，去探索黄金律法──”

eng: Through understanding of the proper way, our faith, our grace, is increased.
chn:
“明了何谓正当性之际，
我们的信仰与赐福也会获得加强。”

eng: Those blissful early days of blind belief are long past.
chn: “那些幸福的幼年时光，盲从时代已经走向终结。”

eng: My comrades; why must ye falter?
chn: “我的同志啊，毋须再犹豫不决！”

eng: In Marika's own words.
chn: ……我直接复诵玛莉卡的箴言：

eng: Hark, brave warriors. Hark, my lord Godfrey. We commend your deeds.
chn: “王的众战士啊，吾王葛孚雷啊。”

eng: Guidance hath delivered ye through each ordeal, to the place ye stand.
chn: “遵循引导战斗至此，着实难能可贵。”

eng: Put the Giants to the sword, and confine the flame atop the mount.
chn: “歼灭那山顶上的巨人们，封印火焰吧。”

eng: Let a new epoch begin. An epoch glistening with life.
chn:
“如此一来，那光耀的生命时代，
就能拉开序幕──”

eng: Brandish the Elden Ring, for the Age of the Erdtree!
chn: “展现艾尔登法环，迎接黄金树时代之始！”

eng: Forgive me. I've been...testing you.
chn: ……对不起，其实我一直在观察你。

eng: To see whether or not grace truly does guide you.
chn: 怀疑你是不是真的受赐福指引……

eng: And...whether you are fit to face the challenge that entails.
chn: 还有，会不会挺身挑战难关。

eng: It seems my worries were unfounded.
chn: 结果是我杞人忧天。

eng: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
chn: 从一开始，托雷特就相信你了……

eng: Whereas I merely pretended.
chn: 我不够真诚。

eng: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
chn: 有一件事情，是我能引导你的──

eng: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
chn:
圆桌厅堂。那是受到指引的褪色者，
也就是英雄们聚集的地方。

eng: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
chn: 我能够带你前往。

eng: Very well.
chn: ……我明白了。

eng: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
chn: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

eng: Forgive me. I've been...testing you.
chn: ……对不起，其实我一直在观察你。

eng: To determine if the Elden Ring would truly have you.
chn: 怀疑你是不是真的想觐见艾尔登法环，

eng: If you had the mettle to endure this long and arduous path.
chn: 还有，会不会为此投身无数战斗，向前迈进。

eng: It seems my worries were unfounded.
chn: 结果是我杞人忧天。

eng: Torrent had your measure from the very start.
chn: 从一开始，托雷特就相信你了……

eng: Whereas I merely pretended.
chn: 我不够真诚。

eng: There is but one other thing I can do to offer you guidance.
chn: 有一件事情，是我能引导你的──

eng: I can take you to the Roundtable Hold...
chn:
圆桌厅堂。那是受到指引的褪色者，
也就是英雄们聚集的地方。

eng: Gathering place of Tarnished champions, guided by Grace...
chn: 我能够带你前往。

eng: Your seamster, Boc...
chn: ……你的裁缝师，柏克。

eng: He is always eager to see your return.
chn: 他一直在等你。

eng: Please, will you talk to him, when you can?
chn: ……可以的话，希望你去见他。

eng: I'm sure he would be much contented.
chn: 他一定会很高兴。

eng: Your seamster, Boc...
chn: ……你的裁缝师，柏克。

eng: I see him crying, from time to time.
chn: 他有时候会哭泣。

eng: I think he misses his mother.
chn: 好像是因为想念母亲，

eng: He wants someone to tell him he's beautiful.
chn: 也希望有人能称赞他好看。

eng: Does being born of a mother...
chn: ……身为母亲，还有母亲生下的人，

eng: Mean one behaves in such a manner?
chn: 所有人都会像他们那样吗……？

eng: Is there...another person inside of you?
chn: ……你的身体里，还住着另外一个人吗？

eng: Did you...want that to happen?
chn: 那是你所希望的事吗？

eng: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
chn: ……我没有从中感受到恶念，就交由你判断了。

eng: Hello, other you.
chn: ……另外一个人啊。

eng: I am Melina, and I have an accord with this person.
chn: 我的名字是梅琳娜，和这个人有着约定。

eng: We might be together for some time.
chn: 说不定我们会相处一阵子……

eng: Pleased to meet you.
chn: 请多关照了。

eng: Is there...another person inside of you?
chn: ……你的身体里，还住着另外一个人吗？

eng: Did you...want that to happen?
chn: 那是你所希望的事吗？

eng: I sense no malice. Do as you think best.
chn: ……我没有从中感受到恶念，就交由你判断了。

eng: Hello, other you.
chn: ……另外一个人啊。

eng: I am Melina, and I am travelling with this person.
chn: 我的名字是梅琳娜，和这个人一起旅行。

eng: We might be together for some time.
chn: 说不定我们会相处一阵子……

eng: Pleased to meet you.
chn: 请多关照了。

eng: The Erdtree...is close.
chn: ……快到黄金树了。

eng: Only a little further till the foot of the Erdtree, and the accord is fulfilled.
chn: 交换条件中提到的树脚，就快到了。

eng: It takes me back.
chn: ……好怀念啊。

eng: I was born at the foot of the Erdtree.
chn: 我是在黄金树的树脚诞生的，

eng: Where mother gave me my purpose.
chn: 也是在那里接受了母亲赐予我的使命……

eng: Though now, everything is lost to me.
chn: 但现在，我失去了一切。

eng: I...have to ascertain for myself.
chn: ……我必须要知道──

eng: The reason for which I live, burned and bodiless.
chn:
即使肉身烧毁，变成灵魂形貌的身体，
我还能继续活命的理由。

eng: My utmost thanks.
chn: ……谢谢你。

eng: For bringing me to the base of the Erdtree.
chn: 谢谢你带我来到黄金树的树脚。

eng: Here, I can govern my own movement.
chn: 在这里，我就可以自由行动。

eng: And thus, the accord is fulfilled.
chn: ……那么，我们的约定完成了。

eng: I shall depart to ascertain the purpose I was given.
chn: 我要去确认自己的使命。

eng: Farewell.
chn: ……再会了。

eng: I shall leave Torrent, and the power to turn runes into strength, here with you.
chn:
将卢恩化为力量的方法，还有托雷特，
我都留在这里。

eng: I wish you luck, in realising your ambition.
chn: 希望你能达成自己的使命。

eng: You have fought long and hard.
chn: ……你都一路征战过来了，

eng: I have no doubt you will become Elden Lord. May you take the throne.
chn: 肯定有办法当上王──当上艾尔登之王。

eng: Hello again, old friend.
chn: ……好久不见了。

eng: It's me, Melina. Your travelling companion.
chn: 你还记得我吗？我是梅琳娜。

eng: Allow me a moment to converse with you.
chn: 我想和你聊一聊。

eng: You were unable to enter the Erdtree, no?
chn: ……你没办法进入黄金树吧？

eng: Prevented by the mantle of barbs.
chn: 祂的表面布满荆棘，拒绝让你进入。

eng: The thorns are impenetrable.
chn: ……那是拒绝的刺，

eng: A husk of the Erdtree's being; that spurns all that exists without.
chn: 是黄金树拒绝外界一切，由自我形成的硬壳。

eng: The only way to stand before the Elden Ring...
chn: 想要觐见艾尔登法环，当上艾尔登之王，

eng: and become the Elden Lord...is to pass the thorns.
chn: 就必须克服那些刺。

eng: My purpose serves to aid in that very act.
chn: ……我的使命与此相关。

eng: So I'd like you to undertake a new journey, with me.
chn: 所以，我希望再和你一起旅行，

eng: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
chn:
走到云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶──
那有着灰灭火焰的山顶。

eng: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
chn: 这么一来，我就能燃烧黄金树……

eng: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
chn: 也能引导你走上成为艾尔登之王的路。

eng: I wish to journey with you once more.
chn: ……我希望再和你一起旅行，

eng: To the flame of ruin, far above the clouds, upon the snowy mountaintops of the giants.
chn:
走到云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶──
那有着灰灭火焰的山顶。

eng: Then I can set the Erdtree aflame.
chn: 这么一来，我就能燃烧黄金树……

eng: And guide you. Down the path to becoming Elden Lord.
chn: 也能引导你走上成为艾尔登之王的路。

eng: Think not, of the kindling.
chn: ……你不用担心火种。

eng: I shall see to that.
chn: 我会准备。

eng: All I ask of you is to make the journey.
chn: 你只要想办法前往，

eng: To the snowy mountaintops of the giants, far above the clouds.
chn: 到那云海之上，积着厚雪的巨人山顶。

eng: I know...
chn: ……我很清楚，

eng: I'm asking you to commit a cardinal sin.
chn: 自己是在要求你犯下重罪。

eng: But it must be done to reach the path beyond.
chn: 但如果，那条路会通往我希望的结果，

eng: And that is the path I wish to travel.
chn: 我想要往下走。

eng: What is your mind?
chn: ……你怎么想呢？

eng: There is something I'd like to say.
chn: ……我想告诉你一件事。

eng: My purpose was given to me by my mother.
chn: 我的使命虽然是母亲赐予的，

eng: But now, I act of my own volition.
chn: 但现在，达成使命是出自我的意愿，

eng: I have set my heart upon the world that I would have.
chn:
已经和母亲的期望无关。
我是为了让世界变成希望的模样而行动──

eng: Regardless of my mother's designs.
chn: 是我的心，决定这么做。

eng: I won't allow anyone to speak ill of that.
chn: ……我不允许任何人践踏这份心意。

eng: Not even you.
chn: 当然，就算是你也不允许。

eng: We're almost there.
chn: ……就快到了。

eng: The flame of ruin lies just ahead.
chn: 灰灭火焰就在前方。

eng: I'm glad it was you I travelled with.
chn: ……我很庆幸是和你一起旅行。

eng: I must tender my thanks to Torrent, too.
chn: 真的该谢谢托雷特。

eng: Thank you, Torrent.
chn: ……托雷特，谢谢你。

eng: Please continue to lend your aid. Till the end.
chn: 你要一直帮助这个人喔。

eng: I have long observed the Lands Between.
chn: ……我一直注视着交界地。

eng: This world is in dire need of repair...
chn: 心想着，这个世界必须被修复……

eng: and Death...indiscriminate...
chn: 也认为，必须让死亡平等降临。

eng: Are you prepared...
chn: ……你准备好了吗？

eng: To commit a cardinal sin?
chn: 做好犯下重罪的心理准备了？

eng: Very well.
chn: ……我明白了。

eng: Let my hand rest upon you, for but a moment.
chn: 一下子就好，让我碰触你……

eng: Very well.
chn: ……我明白了。

eng: Tell me, when you are fully prepared.
chn: 等你准备好了，再和我说。

eng: Are you ready to commit a cardinal sin?
chn: 你做好犯下重罪的心理准备了？

eng: If you intend to claim the frenzied flame,
chn: ……如果你的心向着癫火，

eng: I ask that you cease.
chn: 我希望你回心转意。

eng: It is not to be meddled with.
chn: 那是不能接触的事物，

eng: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
chn: 是会吞噬所有生命，所有意念的浑沌。

eng: However ruined this world has become, however mired in torment and despair...
chn: 即使这个世界陷入毁灭的境地，充满了痛苦与绝望，

eng: Life endures. Births continue.
chn: 只要生命存在，世间生生不息……

eng: There is beauty in that, is there not?
chn: 一切还是美好。

eng: If you would become Lord, do not deny this notion.
chn:
我希望你──想当上王的你，
不要否定这件事情。

eng: Please, leave the frenzied flame alone.
chn: ……请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

eng: I shall see to the kindling.
chn: ……我会准备火种。

eng: It is a purpose which I choose to fulfil.
chn: 这是我的使命，同时也是出自我的意愿。

eng: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
chn: 所以请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

eng: The frenzied flame is not to be meddled with.
chn: ……癫火是不能接触的事物。

eng: It is chaos, devouring life and thought unending.
chn: 那是会吞噬所有生命、所有意念的浑沌。

eng: So, please... Leave the frenzied flame alone.
chn: 请不要让你的心，向着癫火。

eng: I ask you, one more time.
chn: ……我再说一次──

eng: Please, seek not the frenzied flame.
chn: 请让你的心，远离癫火吧。

eng: As one who strives to become a Lord,
chn: 我希望你──想当上王的你，

eng: deny not the lives, the new births of this world.
chn: 不要否定生命存在，世间生生不息这些事。

eng: Those who would are not fit to be called Lord.
chn: ……否定这些了，那也算不上是王了。

eng: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
chn: 没有生命的世界里，哪里会有王呢？

eng: Please, put a stop to this madness.
chn: 拜托你了，能不能悬崖勒马？

eng: The Lord of Frenzied Flame is no lord at all.
chn: 癫火之王根本算不上是王──

eng: When the land they preside over is lifeless.
chn: 没有生命的世界里，哪里会有王呢？

eng: You...have inherited the frenzied flame.
chn: ……你受赐癫火了。

eng: A pity. You are no longer fit.
chn: 那么，你我已经不能共存。

eng: Our accord ends here.
chn: 彼此立下的约定，也到此为止。

eng: But remember...
chn: ……希望你能记住，

eng: Should you rise, as the Lord of Chaos,
chn: 如果你真的当上了浑沌之王……

eng: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
chn: 我会对你痛下杀手。

eng: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
chn:
这是我的责任──
因为我让你获得了卢恩的力量。

eng: Goodbye, my companion.
chn: ……永别了。

eng: Goodbye, Torrent...
chn: 托雷特，再见了……

eng: You...have inherited the frenzied flame.
chn: ……你受赐癫火了。

eng: A pity. You are no longer fit.
chn: 那么，你我已经不能共存。

eng: Our journey together ends here.
chn: 此时此刻，就是旅行的终点。

eng: And remember...
chn: ……希望你能记住，

eng: Should you rise as the Lord of Chaos,
chn: 如果你真的当上了浑沌之王……

eng: I will kill you, as sure as night follows day.
chn: 我会对你痛下杀手。

eng: Such is my duty, for allowing you the strength of runes.
chn:
这是我的责任──
因为我让你获得了卢恩的力量。

eng: Goodbye, my companion.
chn: ……永别了。

eng: Goodbye, Torrent...
chn: 托雷特，再见了……

eng: You, please, I can read them.
chn: ……你啊，过来吧，过来老太婆这吧……

eng: Your fingers, please, your fingers...
chn: 拜托吶，让我解读你的指头吧……

eng: Oh, bless you.
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
Within the fog, a gaping hole. Beyond the fog, one cursed by blood.
chn:
……迷雾中有座深不见底的洞穴，
迷雾彼端有血的诅咒。

eng: Below the surface, traces of those who lurk in the shadows.
chn: ……地底有着潜伏者的片鳞半爪。

eng: In the east, the east. Should you desire…
chn: ……想要一探究竟，朝东边，朝东边去！

eng: Oh, bless you.
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
Heavens, how can this be!
chn: ……天吶，有这种事……

eng: A dreadful sign! Truly dreadful!
chn: 不祥的预兆！这是不祥的预兆吶！

eng: You will face wrath, then madness, and finally, chaos.
chn: 穿过怒潮，会有疯狂，会有浑沌等着。

eng: Turn back.
chn: ……最好折返吶。

eng: This is a path you must forsake.
chn: 你不可以往这条路前进。

eng: Dread awaits you in the south. Blackest dread!
chn: 南方有不祥之兆，不祥之兆啊！

eng: Dragon slayer...
chn: ……龙杀手……

eng: Ohhh, dragon slayer...
chn: ……哦，龙杀手……

eng: You unfeeling barbarian.
chn: 不知天高地厚的野人。

eng: Planning to feast? On dragon?
chn: 你想把龙吃下去吗？

eng: At an abandoned church on that wee isle.
chn: 想到那座小岛的废弃教堂，

eng: You would devour the heart of an ancient?
chn: 把古老心脏吃下去吗？

eng: You wretched, undeserving brute!
chn: 你这罪该万死，不知天高地厚的野人！

eng: Oh, bless you.
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
Head to the foundation of gold, Tarnished...
chn: ……褪色者啊，往黄金树脚前进吧。

eng: Traverse Raya Lucaria; "Glintstone Eventide"…
chn: 穿越雷亚卢卡利亚──辉石星夜，

eng: …and reunite the half crescents, at the Grand Lift.
chn: 在大升降梯重合半月吧。

eng: Oh, but the bridge is collapsed, and cannot be crossed.
chn: 哦，是吶。这座桥坏了，过不得。

eng: Only, why should that matter!
chn: 但那又何妨！

eng: Stormveil Castle still stands tall!
chn: 史东薇尔城仍然屹立不摇吶！

eng: Oh, bless you.
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
Miquella's favour can be yours…
chn: ……你和米凯拉大人有缘分啊。

eng: Slaughter, slaughter, slaughter... The all-hearing slaughtered, but alas, it was for naught.
chn:
屠杀、屠杀、再屠杀……
但百耳小子却无法得逞。

eng: But all you need do, is snatch it from the big pot.
chn: 因为你会从大壶之中抢走那东西嘛。
嘻嘻，嘻嘻嘻……

eng: Pity the poor, poor fool!
chn: 活该啊，真是活该啊……

eng: Oh, bless you.
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
…Are you one for festivals? Or flowers?
chn: ……你喜欢祭典吗？还是喜欢花？

eng: To the South, a grand festival to make the stars turn.
chn: 南边有催动星辰的大祭典；

eng: To the East, the hardened bud of a flower to be.
chn: 东边有含苞待放的花蕾吶。

eng: But dare you enter?
chn: ……那你要去吗？

eng: Into the heart of the scarlet rot?
chn: 投身进那片吓人的猩红腐败之中吶？

eng: Ah...ahhh...
What a pity it is, to be without the right.
chn: ……没有资格这档事，说来也真悲哀吶。

eng: All you can do is stand, at a loss.
chn: 你也只能束手无策──

eng: Without even the half crescents that wish to be whole.
chn: 拿不到重合用的半月，

eng: Before the unmoving, unfeeling Grand Lift ahead.
chn: 呆站在这条路前方，那一动也不动的大升降机前头。

eng: Or, are you planning to throw yourself to the waters?
chn: 还是说，你要投身水中？

eng: To find the coward's passage, through the dim cavern?
chn: 走向那不光彩的路，潜入黑暗的地底？

eng: What a pity it is, to be without the right.
chn: ……没有资格这档事，说来也真悲哀吶。

eng: Oh, bless you...
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Bless you...
chn: ……谢天谢地。

eng: You. The one who holds both half crescents.
chn: ……你身怀重合用的半月，

eng: Take the path to the Grand Lift ahead.
chn: 那去这条路前方的大升降机吧。

eng: For you...are the one who will be Lord.
chn: ……你会当上王。

eng: Bear witness, one and all! The Lord is returned!
chn: 所有人啊，看仔细了！回朝啦！

eng: The Elden Lord is come again!
chn: 艾尔登之王，回朝啦！

eng: Oh, bless you...
chn: ……谢天谢地啊。

eng: Oh..ohh!
To the east...ruins of gold. To the west...the serpent's sacrilege.
chn: 东边有崩毁的黄金，西边有亵渎的蛇。

eng: Wherever the path leads, so shall you follow.
chn: ……要选哪一边去，都无妨吶。

eng: Wherever the path leads, only more sorrow.
chn: 去哪一边，都半斤八两吶！

eng: Tis a curse! A curse! The curse of Queen Marika!
chn: 这是诅咒啊──玛莉卡女王的诅咒！

eng: Ah...ahh... Ha...ha...
chn: 噫──嘻嘻嘻！

eng: The Fingers I served once prophesied...
chn: ……指头大人以前说过：

eng: A Tarnished would one day become Elden Lord and restore the Golden Order.
chn: 褪色者终有一天会当上艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法。

eng: Surely you see it, too?
chn: 你也有看见吧？

eng: The gold that enshrouds the heavens. The great tree which begets the pillars of light.
chn: 铺天盖地的黄金──那光柱源头的大树。

eng: O Tarnished, hasten to the foot of the tree.
chn: 褪色者啊，朝大树的树脚迈进吧。

eng: And whatever you might face...
chn: 要是你因此，遭遇了什么……

eng: The Fingers will surely guide you...
chn: 指头大人肯定会引导你吶。

eng: Turn back.
chn: ……快折返吶。

eng: Ahead lies the Land of the Giants' Flame.
chn: 往前走就是巨人火焰之地，

eng: And the way forth is forbidden.
chn: 不准继续靠近。

eng: Hear me. The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin.
chn: 燃烧黄金树是初始的重罪啊，你有听懂吗？

eng: Doing so will unbind Destined Death, and slay the world itself.
chn: 那会释放命定之死，最后会毁了世界。

eng: Who would dare put you up to such a task?
chn: 谁准你做这种事的吶！

eng: Most certainly not the Fingers!
chn: 指头大人肯定不会准！

eng: Ohh...
chn: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

eng: Oh, Lord Godwyn...
chn: ……噢，葛德文大人。

eng: Such cruelty, such humiliation...
chn: 这事，多么地不堪啊。

eng: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
chn: 少爷，您本该丧命的呀。

eng: As the first of the demigods to die.
chn: 您应该是半神中的第一位死者，

eng: As a martyr to Destined Death.
chn: 因为命定之死而殒命。

eng: But why must it yet bring such disgrace?
chn: 那为什么，您会化成这身丑陋的模样？

eng: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
chn: 黄金之子竟然变成死诞者，

eng: How could such a thing come to be...
chn: 还有什么事，比这更不堪？

eng: <sobbing>
chn: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

eng: Ohh...
chn: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

eng: Oh, Lord Godwyn...
chn: ……噢，葛德文大人。

eng: My poor, sweet lordling should have died a true death.
chn: 少爷本该丧命的呀。

eng: A scion of the golden bough, sentenced to live in Death...
chn: 黄金之子竟然变成死诞者，

eng: How could such a thing come to be...
chn: 还有什么事，比这更不堪？

eng: <sobbing>
chn: 呜呜、呜呜呜……

eng: Ha, ha, ha!
chn: 噫──嘻嘻嘻！

eng: A curse! A curse upon you!
chn: 罪该万死的！你这罪该万死的东西！

eng: Your path leads only to death!
chn: 最后等着你的，只有死亡吶！

eng: You godless brute.
chn: ……不知天高地厚的野人。

eng: You'll soil your hands soon enough.
chn: 要犯下滔天大罪，

eng: With mortal sin!
chn: 也是迟早的事吶！

eng: Are you that new Tarnished?
chn: ……新来的褪色者吶？

eng: You've done well. I am Enia, the Finger Reader.
chn: 一路辛苦了，我是“解指”恩雅。

eng: I interpret the words of the Fingers, envoys to the Greater Will.
chn:
指头大人是无上意志的使者，
而我是传达大人所言的老太婆。

eng: Look there. The Fingers tremble. To welcome you, shardbearer.
chn:
仔细瞧，指头大人在颤动──
这代表祂在欢迎你这大卢恩的持有者吶。

eng: Let their wisdom wash over you.
chn: ……来，听好指头大人的话：

eng: "Great Elden Ring, root of the Golden Order."
chn: “伟大的艾尔登法环是黄金律法──”

eng: "Anchor of all lands, giver of grace, wellspring of all joy."
chn: “让世界规律不乱，让生命蒙受福祉与赐福。”

eng: "Until it was shattered."
chn: “然而，艾尔登法环已经破碎。”

eng: "The tragic corruption of the Order has taken its toll."
chn: “破坏律法是滔天大罪，带来的恶果当然无可避免……”

eng: "Across the realm, life lies in ruin. Fallen to pieces."
chn: “如今世界与生命毁坏得无以复加，”

eng: "Foul curses and misery spread, unabating."
chn: “诅咒与不幸蔓延四处。”

eng: "But the Greater Will has not abandoned the realm, nor the life that inhabits it."
chn: “即使如此，无上意志也不会弃世界、生命于不顾，”

eng: "So it is that the Tarnished are guided by grace. Called to act."
chn: “因此你们褪色者才会受到赐福指引，被赋予使命。”

eng: "Brave Tarnished, your Great Rune is a handsome shard of the Elden Ring."
chn: “褪色者啊，你持有的大卢恩是艾尔登法环的大碎片，”

eng: "Seek another of its kind."
chn: “再去取得另一个吧。”

eng: "To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order."
chn: “成为艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法吧。”

eng: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
chn: ……别忘了指头大人的话。

eng: Ahh, Great Runes are the stuff of demigods;
chn: ……对了，大卢恩都是由半神持有。

eng: the children of the goddess, Queen Marika. She who is vessel of the Elden Ring.
chn:
半神是指艾尔登法环的宿主──
神祇女王玛莉卡，祂的孩子们。

eng: Tainted by the strength of their runes, her children warred, but none could become Elden Lord.
chn:
那群孩子都因为大卢恩的力量堕入歧途，彼此争斗……
但是没有人能当上艾尔登之王。

eng: And so grace was extended, to your kind, the Tarnished.
chn: 所以你们褪色者才会受赐福指引吶。

eng: Listen, the Fingers speak.
chn: ……听吧，指头大人也说了：

eng: "The Greater Will has long renounced the demigods."
chn: “在许久许久以前，无上意志早已舍弃那群半神。”

eng: "Tarnished, show no mercy. Have their heads. Take all they have left."
chn: “褪色者啊，无须踌躇──尽情杀戮、掠夺他们吧。”

eng: "The Fingers have willed it so."
chn: “此为指头的引导。”

eng: ...Indeed. But remember one thing.
chn: ……话虽如此，你也要小心吶。

eng: The demigods are each and all the direct offspring of Queen Marika.
chn: 半神全部都是玛莉卡女王的孩子，

eng: Godrick the Grafted was but a distant relation...
chn: 其中只有“接肢”葛瑞克是后代子孙……

eng: The runt of the litter, his divine blood sorely diluted.
chn: 所以继承到的神祇血统最为稀薄，力量也最为弱小。

eng: Well, well… I see…
chn: ……哦，还有啊……

eng: A remembrance of gold has found its way into your possession.
chn: 你身上好像有黄金追忆吶。

eng: Demigods, and even the greater of the champions,
chn: ……半神还有伟大的诸位英雄，

eng: are hewn by the Erdtree upon their end, into remembrances.
chn: 身形消失之后，会受黄金树雕琢，成为追忆。

eng: They are…valuable indeed.
chn: ……你手上的东西，就是这样来的。

eng: These remembrances yet house the power of their former masters.
chn: 黄金追忆会保存追忆之主的力量，

eng: And should you wish to wield that same power, well…
chn: 如果你希望得到那力量，尽情施展……

eng: I will lend you the strength of the Fingers.
chn: 指头大人能助你一臂之力。

eng: Heh… Do not recoil from my offer.
chn: ……有什么好犹豫的吶？

eng: The Fingers guide us all. And you Tarnished, you are here to take, are you not?
chn: 指头大人都出言引导了──要你们褪色者动手争夺。

eng: Ah. You have returned. What is it?
chn: ……啊，是你啊。有什么事吶？

eng: Now, go forth.
chn: ……好啦，快出发吧。

eng: Let the words of the Fingers guide you.
chn: 别忘了指头大人的话。

eng: I had my doubts, but...my, look at you.
chn: ……哦，真不简单……

eng: Only once before have I seen two Great Runes together.
chn: 从以前到现在，这是我第二次同时看到两片大卢恩吶。

eng: Look there. The Fingers shudder with exuberance.
chn: 瞧啊，指头大人也十分激动：

eng: "Fine work, brave Tarnished. The Greater Will is pleased."
chn: “褪色者啊，做得很好。无上意志肯定会欢欣无比。”

eng: "You have earned the right to become Elden Lord."
chn: “如此便证明，你拥有成为艾尔登之王的资质。”

eng: "Now, seek the Erdtree, and an audience with Queen Marika."
chn: “褪色者啊，朝着黄金树前进，觐见玛莉卡女王吧。”

eng: "To become Elden Lord, and restore the Golden Order."
chn: “成为艾尔登之王，修复黄金律法吧。”

eng: The Fingers expect...
chn: ……指头大人很期待你的表现吶。

eng: As much from you as they do young Gideon.
chn: 嗯，大概跟基甸小鬼头不相上下。

eng: Take this. A token of farewell.
chn: 收下吧，这是老太婆的一点心意。

eng: Now, go forth.
chn: ……好啦，快出发吶。

eng: Become Elden Lord.
chn: 你要当上艾尔登之王啊。

eng: Queen Marika is the vessel of the Elden Ring, carrier of its vision.
chn: 玛莉卡女王是艾尔登法环的宿主，能见到相关的虚像。

eng: A god, in truth.
chn: 也就是说，祂是神吶。

eng: But after the Elden Ring's shattering, she was imprisoned in the Erdtree.
chn: 然而祂在艾尔登法环破碎之后，被囚禁在黄金树之内──

eng: A grim punishment for shattering the Order, despite her godhood.
chn: 作为神却让律法破碎，那是犯下大错的惩罚。

eng: The Fingers speak...
chn: ……指头大人说了：

eng: "Marika's trespass demanded a heavy sentence."
chn: “玛莉卡犯下的滔天大罪，处以重罚也不为过。”

eng: "But even in shackles, she remains a god, and the vision's vessel."
chn: “但即使祂受到重罚，仍旧是神，也是虚像的容器。”

eng: "Confer Great Runes to become Elden Lord, and join Queen Marika as her consort."
chn:
“只要向那容器献上大卢恩，
你就会成为她的伴侣──成为艾尔登之王。”

eng: "The Fingers have willed it so."
chn: “此为指头的引导。”

eng: Now, you may go.
chn: ……好啦，快出发吧。

eng: Well, you managed to return.
chn: ……你回来啦。

eng: You know what this means. The Erdtree has spurned you.
chn: 我很清楚吶，黄金树拒绝你了。

eng: The Fingers remain still.
chn: ……指头大人也静止不动了──

eng: Shaken by this turn of events, they are busy consulting the Greater Will.
chn: 发生预料之外的事，感到困惑，正在与无上意志沟通。

eng: When they are finished, the Fingers will again offer their guidance.
chn: 等到沟通结束，指头大人会再出言引导你们。

eng: But thousands, if not tens of thousands, of moons must first pass.
chn: ……只是这可能要等上数千、数万个日子吶。

eng: No matter for me. But you? How will you ever manage the wait...
chn: 我是无妨，但你们等不得吧？

eng: My, oh, my...
chn: ……好啦，会怎样发展……

eng: It may be thousands upon thousands of moons before the fingers again offer their guidance.
chn:
……指头大人再出言引导，
可能要等上数千、数万个日子吧。

eng: My, oh, my. Whatever will you do…
chn: ……好啦，会怎样发展……

eng: Heavens forbid...
chn: ……你这是……

eng: That is not the domain of mere men.
chn: 那是身为人之子万万不得做出的事。

eng: The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. And you say you seek the power of the Rune of Death, too?
chn:
烧毁黄金树是最为原始的重罪，
更别提追求死亡卢恩的力量……

eng: The Rune of Death goes by two names; the other is Destined Death.
chn: 死亡卢恩就是“命定之死”──

eng: The forbidden shadow, plucked from the Golden Order upon its creation…
chn: 是黄金律法诞生之初，首先去除、封印的黑暗影子。

eng: Unleashing the rune now would be unthinkable...
chn: 你却打算释放它……

eng: The Fingers would never permit it. Nor would the Greater Will.
chn: ……这件事指头大人，不，无上意志绝对不会点头。

eng: But here we are...
The Fingers, dormant, severing our link to the Greater Will.
chn:
……现在指头大人静止不动，
我们也无从感知无上意志。

eng: The realm, and all life, in ruins. Impossible events transpire, beyond the ken of the Fingers.
chn:
世界与生命愈发崩坏，
甚至发生指头大人也无从预知的事……

eng: Who is to say that the cardinal sin must be cardinal forever?
chn: 又怎能说，重罪如今仍是重罪？

eng: Go on. Finish the job.
chn: ……你放手去做吧。

eng: Take the course you deem most worthy.
chn: 只要你认为自己的做法没错，就去做吧。

eng: You must find kindling.
chn: ……去找火种吧。

eng: Only the smoldering flame in the Great Forge of the Giants, on the highest peak in the Lands Between, can burn the Erdtree.
chn:
在交界地最高的地方，那里有个冒出袅袅轻烟的巨人大锅──
能烧毁黄金树的火就在锅里。

eng: But special kindling is required to reignite the flame.
chn: 然而想让锅里的火窜起，必须要有特殊的火种。

eng: For the flame to burn the Erdtree, a sacrifice is needed. Of one who envisions the flame.
chn:
……要有能看见火焰虚像的人。
唯有把那人当祭品，才能用大锅的火烧毁黄金树。

eng: And can lead you to the Rune of Death.
chn: 前往死亡卢恩的路，也会随之明朗。

eng: You've done it, I see.
chn: ……做得还真彻底啊。

eng: What use do you have for me, now?
chn: 现在我们应该没有交集了？

eng: I am a Finger Reader. I will remain here, until their dialogue ends, and the Fingers speak again.
chn: 我是“解指”，正在等待沟通结束，指头大人的发声。

eng: Do as you please. Take whatever course seems most worthy to you.
chn: 去贯彻你认为正确的事吧。

eng: Now, you may go.
chn: ……好啦，快走吧。

eng: Heh, heh, heh.
chn: ……咯咯。

eng: You'd force this tired old crone to work, even now?
chn: 要我老太婆继续替你工作吗？

eng: A harder taskmaster have I never met.
chn: 你还真是不懂得顾忌吶。

eng: Don't worry, my dear.
chn: ……也无妨吶。

eng: I'll see it to the end with you, if it please.
chn:
只要你不嫌弃，
我老太婆愿意陪你走到最后。

eng: Now, go forth.
chn: ……好啦，快走吧。

eng: Do what you believe is right.
chn: 去做你认为正确的事吧。

eng: Oh, such a fine gift, I will gladly accept.
chn: ……感谢你的好意。

eng: But don't raise your hopes;
chn: 只是你误判了吶，

eng: I have no secrets for you to plunder.
chn: 我老太婆没有什么秘密。

eng: I lost my appetite for them a lifetime ago, or more.
chn: ……那早在很久以前，就忘得一乾二净了。

eng: <sleeping>
A pleasure to meet thee, Tarnished.
chn: ……初次见面啊，褪色者。

eng: I am the witch Renna.
chn: 我是魔女蕾娜。

eng: I'd heard tell of a Tarnished hurtling about atop a spectral steed.
chn: 听说有褪色者骑着灵马，

eng: And upon looking into the matter,
chn: 让我花了点时间去找……

eng: the talk, I surmise, is of thee.
chn: 看来就是你啊。

eng: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
chn: 那名为托雷特的灵马──

eng: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
chn: 你能召唤它，没错吧？

eng: Ah. As I had hoped.
chn: ……嗯，答得好。

eng: I was entrusted this, for thee.
chn: 有物品要转交给你。

eng: By Torrent's former master.
chn: 是托雷特的前主人托给我的。

eng: Tis a bell for calling forth spirits.
chn: 那物品叫作召魂铃。

eng: Summon them with it, from ash unreturned to the Erdtree.
chn: 没有回归黄金树的骨灰，能从中召唤出灵魂。

eng: The spirits will obey thine command but briefly, as they recall battles past.
chn:
而那些灵魂会暂时认你为主人，
重现生前战斗的模样。

eng: Now it is thine. To do with as thou wishest.
chn: ……哎，照你的意思使用吧。

eng: Forgive mine intrusion, Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者啊，打扰你了。

eng: I doubt we shall again meet. But all the same, learn well the Lands Between.
chn:
我想不会再见面了，
仔细品尝交界地的滋味吧。

eng: How long will it be, I wonder...
chn: ……我很期待啊──

eng: Before the Tarnished tire of obeisance to the Two Fingers?
chn: 你们褪色者会服从双指到什么时候？

eng: This way, Tarnished.
chn: ……褪色者啊，来这里吧。

eng: May I have a word?
chn: 能不能过来聊个几句？

eng: Trifle not with me, Tarnished.
chn: ……扯这种无谓的谎。

eng: Or didst thou merely forget?
chn: 你想说自己忘了吗？

eng: The name of the spectral steed thou callest?
chn: 忘了那匹灵马的名字。

eng: I will ask thee again.
chn: ……我再问你一次。

eng: Thou'rt possessed of the power, no?
chn: 那名为托雷特的灵马──

eng: To call forth the spectral steed named Torrent.
chn: 你能召唤它，没错吧？

eng: Quite the stubborn one, aren't we?
chn: ……倒有趣了，想否定到底吗？

eng: Wise, in a way. The Lands Between are home to liars and cheats aplenty.
chn:
哎，这也无妨。
交界地本来就充斥着谎言。

eng: Perhaps thine ample mistrust will be to thy benefit.
chn: 不信任他人，反而是有益无害啊。

eng: I shall leave this for thee, at the behest of Torrent's former master.
chn: 托雷特的前主人托付的物品，我放在这。

eng: Take it, shouldst thou overcome thy suspicion.
chn: 等你有兴趣了，再捡起来吧。

eng: What hopest thou to profit?
chn: 你这是做什么？

eng: No sense in arguing, I see.
chn: ……不分青红皂白吗？

eng: Thou'rt a wild one, indeed.
chn: 无谓地逞凶斗狠。

eng: Torrent hath quite the ruffian chosen...
chn: 托雷特怎会选了如此匹夫……

eng: Let us speak of the past, a while.
chn: ……稍微聊聊过去的事吧。

eng: I was once an Empyrean.
chn: ……我曾是神人。

eng: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
chn: 半神之中只有我、米凯拉，还有玛莲妮亚是神人。

eng: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika, to become the new god of the coming age.
chn:
我们各自被不同的双指找到，成为神祇候选人──
预定继玛莉卡女王之后，成为下一个时代的神祇。

eng: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
chn: ……但是我拒绝了双指。

eng: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
chn: 我窃走死亡卢恩，杀害、抛弃自己身为神人的身体，

eng: I would not be controlled by that thing.
chn: 因为我拒绝受那种存在操控。

eng: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
chn: ……从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此，

eng: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
chn: 而灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

eng: Oh, again we cross paths.
chn: ……哦，好久不见了。

eng: I believe I said my name was Renna, when last we met.
chn: 记得当时我自称蕾娜。

eng: It pleaseth me to see Torrent hale and hearty...
chn: 很高兴看到托雷特过得不错。

eng: But Tarnished, what business hast thou here?
chn: 那么，褪色者啊。你是为了什么而来？

eng: I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
chn: ……我应该没有发邀请函给你。

eng: Mm? a Tarnished, here?
chn: ……哦，是褪色者啊。

eng: Thou must have some business in mind, to come all this way.
chn: 你是为了什么，来到这里？

eng: Though I have no memory of inking thee an invitation.
chn: ……我应该没有发邀请函给你。

eng: I see. Quite the sleuth, aren't we.
chn: ……原来如此，调查得真仔细。

eng: Indeed, I am the witch Ranni.
chn: 没错，我是魔女菈妮。

eng: I stole a fragment of the Rune of Death, and used it to forge the godslaying black knives through fearsome rite.
chn:
曾经窃走部分死亡卢恩，
再经由仪式，化成弒神用的黑刀──

eng: I did it all.
chn: 我是做过这些事。

eng: But sadly for thee, the cursemark thou seekest is not to be found here.
chn: ……再来，你想找的咒痕，不在这里。

eng: I have slain the body I was born into, and cast it away.
chn: 我杀害、抛弃与生俱来的身体──

eng: And it is upon that flesh the cursemark is carved.
chn: 而咒痕就刻在那身体上。

eng: Hah!
chn: ……哈哈。

eng: And why should I reveal that to thee?
chn: ……为什么非得告诉你？

eng: I performed the act not to bury the past, nor in shame of the deed,
chn: 我不隐瞒过去，不为此感到后悔，

eng: but all the same, thy begging compels me not a jot.
chn: 但也不会有人乞讨就乐于施舍。

eng: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
chn: ……你想找的咒痕不在这里，我言尽于此。

eng: Now, begone.
chn: 好了，尽快离开。

eng: The cursemark thou seekest is not here. That is all I will say.
chn: ……你想找的咒痕不在这里，我言尽于此。

eng: Now, begone.
chn: 好了，尽快离开。

eng: Oh, is that so?
Thou wouldst render me aid, is that thy proposal?
chn: 你的意思是，要替我做事？

eng: Affording thyself opportunity to grope about for the cursemark's location, no doubt?
chn: 你认为这么做，就能找到咒痕的所在地？

eng: Very well...
chn: ……也行。

eng: There's nothing wrong with a well-laid scheme.
chn: 我不讨厌心怀鬼胎的人。

eng: What's more, if my past and past wounds beckon to thee,
chn:
况且，如果是以前的作为──
那伤痕将你带来……

eng: I am curious enough to see what thy destiny portends...
chn: 这命运也颇有意思。

eng: I'll allow it. Enter my service.
chn: 我准许你替我做事。

eng: And good hunting to thee.
chn: 努力寻找咒痕的下落吧。

eng: Hah!
chn: ……哈哈。

eng: No reason in particular, thou claimest?
chn: 没事吗？这样啊。

eng: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this reunion.
chn: 倒有趣了。那我们在此重逢，可说是命运从中牵线。

eng: Intriguing. Then mayhaps fate hath steered thee to this encounter.
chn: 倒有趣了。那我们在此邂逅，可说是命运从中牵线。

eng: Wilt thou enter into my service?
chn: 你要替我做事吗？

eng: I am the witch Ranni. I stole Death long ago, and search now for the dark path.
chn:
我是魔女菈妮。
过去窃走死亡，如今找寻深入黑暗的路。

eng: That I might one day upend the whole of it, and rid the world of all that came before.
chn: 总有一天，我会背叛一切，也会舍弃一切。

eng: Well? Has that roused thy interest?
chn: ……怎么样？听起来有趣吧？

eng: I see. A choice well made.
chn: ……这样啊，那很好。

eng: Thou'rt a rare sort. Not many would have accepted the offer.
chn: 你真是奇人，那种邀请也肯答应。

eng: But I require as much of those under my command.
chn: 但我的门槛也不过如此。

eng: I anticipate good work from thee.
chn: 期待你往后的表现。

eng: I see. More's the pity.
chn: ……这样啊，真遗憾。

eng: Come to me again, shouldst thou change thy heart.
chn: 等你改变心意了，再回头也不迟。

eng: Surrendering thyself into the service of a doll-witch...
chn: 顺着命运的牵动，替人偶魔女做事──

eng: Is not as frightful as thou fearest...
chn: 可能也是不错的安排啊。

eng: Ah, art thou persuaded to my cause?
chn: 哦？改变心意了？

eng: Then, again I shall ask, wilt thou enter into my service?
chn: 那我再问一次。你要替我做事吗？

eng: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
chn: ……那么，立刻有事派给你。

eng: There is, in my service, a half-wolven warrior by the name of Blaidd.
chn: 有一位名叫布莱泽的半狼战士，他也在替我做事。

eng: I would have thee join him in searching for the hidden treasure of Nokron, the Eternal City.
chn:
我要你和他联手，
找出“永恒之城”诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏。

eng: I have called for Blaidd to greet thee below. Take from him the particulars.
chn:
我已经召来布莱泽，他人在楼下。
详情去问他吧。

eng: Ah, and there wilt thou find Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, also.
chn: 对，还有，军师伊吉、魔法教授赛尔维斯应该也在。

eng: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
chn: 他们颇为特立独行，有必要时善加利用吧。

eng: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
chn: ……各取所需，他们肯定也不会客气。

eng: Speak with the three who await thee below.
chn: ……去和楼下的那三个人聊几句吧。

eng: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
chn: 不要求你融入，但你免不了受他们打量。

eng: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
chn: ……毕竟很久没有新人加入了。

eng: Good, then I ask we proceed with haste.
chn: ……那么，立刻有事派给你。

eng: Art thou aware of the star that struck Limgrave?
chn: 宁姆格福地区有星星坠落，这事你知道了吧？

eng: It left a vast crater, and through it lieth the Eternal City of Nokron.
chn:
星星打穿地面，形成大洞──
“永恒之城”诺克隆恩就在大洞的前头。

eng: Go there to find the city's hidden treasure.
chn: 我要你从大洞下去，找出诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏。

eng: Ah, yes. Iji, my war counselor, and Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts, can be found below.
chn:
对，还有，军师伊吉、魔法教授赛尔维斯
应该都在楼下。

eng: Like thee, they are in my service.
chn: 那两位也在替我做事。

eng: Heed not their peculiarities; feel secure in gaining from them what advantage thou canst.
chn: 他们颇为特立独行，有必要时善加利用吧。

eng: I am sure the others will be doing just the same.
chn: ……各取所需，他们肯定也不会客气。

eng: Speak with the three who await thee below.
chn: ……去和楼下的那三个人聊几句吧。

eng: Thou needst not indulge them unduly, but they too wish to appraise thy worth.
chn: 不要求你融入，但你免不了受他们打量。

eng: It hath been a passing long time since a newcomer entered my service, after all.
chn: ……毕竟很久没有新人加入了。

eng: Ah, allow me to forewarn thee.
chn: ……啊，还有一件事。

eng: I shall soon enter my slumber.
chn: 我就要进入深眠，

eng: And it will be some time before I wake.
chn: 短时间内不会醒来。

eng: This doll's body is not without its hindrances...
chn: 人偶的身体也不如想象中地自由。

eng: Still, I have high hopes for thee.
chn: ……我会期待──

eng: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
chn: 下一次睁眼的时候，能听见好消息。

eng: I shall soon enter my slumber.
chn: 我就要进入深眠，

eng: And it will be some time before I wake.
chn: 短时间内不会醒来。

eng: I have high hopes for thee.
chn: ……我会期待──

eng: I look forward to the good news when I arise.
chn: 下一次睁眼的时候，能听见好消息。

eng: Ahh...It was thee.
chn: ……啊，是你。

eng: Not Blaidd, it seemeth.
chn: 结果不是布莱泽。

eng: Even in my slumber, I sensed it.
chn: 我知道。即使在深眠之中，我还是感觉得到。

eng: It is in thy possession, is it not? The hidden treasure of Nokron?
chn: 你拿到诺克隆恩的秘密宝藏了，对吧？

eng: My thanks. Finally, all the pieces are in place.
chn: 谢谢。这么一来，所有条件都凑齐了。

eng: Soon must I begin my journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
chn:
接着只需要我动身──
踏上只有我能走的，深入黑暗的路。

eng: Ah, but before I leave, I must entrust thee with this.
chn: ……在踏上旅途以前，有样物品必须交给你。

eng: Take it.
chn: 拿去吧。

eng: My discarded flesh lieth beyond the seal unlocked by it.
chn: 用那物品解除封印之后，我抛弃的身体就在前头。

eng: Upon which is carved the cursemark of thy desire.
chn: 你想找的咒痕，刻在那身体上。

eng: I can fathom what thy purpose might be.
chn: ……至于你想做什么，我大致料想得到。

eng: Neither of us is welcomed by the brighter path, I see.
chn: 看来我们都无缘走在光明道路上。

eng: You may leave now.
chn: ……你可以离开了。

eng: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
chn: 时间不长，但你表现得很好。

eng: What is it?
chn: ……怎么了？

eng: Thy purpose in approaching me was to obtain the cursemark, was it not?
chn: 你是因为咒痕才接近我，对吧？

eng: You may leave now.
chn: 那你可以离开了。

eng: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
chn:
我也要踏上旅途了──
走上属于我的，深入黑暗的路。

eng: Ah, but before I leave, I shall entrust thee with this.
chn: ……在踏上旅途以前，这物品先交给你。

eng: My thanks, for thy sterling efforts.
chn: 你带来了丰硕成果，这是谢礼。

eng: A strange gift, perhaps, but a rare sort such as thee would welcome it, I am sure.
chn:
……那物品颇为奇特，
但送给你这奇人，肯定会爱不释手。

eng: I am certain now, fate steered us to our reunion.
chn: 话说回来，这次重逢真的是命运牵线。

eng: I am certain now, fate steered us to our first encounter.
chn: 话说回来，这次邂逅真的是命运牵线。

eng: I must thank Torrent too, for his part.
chn: 我也该谢谢托雷特。

eng: You may leave now.
chn: ……你可以离开了。

eng: It was but brief, but thou gavest me fine service.
chn: 时间不长，但你表现得很好。

eng: What is it? You may go.
chn: ……怎么了？你可以离开了。

eng: I, too, am to depart on a journey. Upon the dark path only I may tread.
chn:
我也要踏上旅途了──
走上属于我的，深入黑暗的路。

eng: Oh? A dogged fellow, aren't we?
chn: ……唉，没想到你这么缠人。

eng: Or is it merely thy habit, to talk to dolls?
chn: 还是说，你有和人偶说话的习惯？

eng: Fine...fine.
chn: ……唉，算了。

eng: I hadn't expected any soul to recognise me in this guise.
chn: 原本不打算让这模样公诸于世……

eng: But now the cat is out the bag, I cannot allow thee thy freedoms.
chn: 既然被发现了，你也别想全身而退。

eng: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
chn: 我要你助我一臂之力──

eng: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
chn: 去寻找、消灭这块土地上的灾厄影子。

eng: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
chn: ……你让魔女菈妮蒙羞，

eng: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
chn: 我不允许你回绝。

eng: Perform for me a service, as recompense.
chn: ……我要你助我一臂之力，

eng: Eliminate the Baleful Shadows which prowl these lands.
chn: 去寻找、消灭这块土地上的灾厄影子。

eng: The name of Ranni the Witch is already sullied by thee.
chn: ……你让魔女菈妮蒙羞，

eng: I will not brook disobedience in this matter.
chn: 我不允许你回绝。

eng: Let us speak of the past, a while.
chn: ……稍微聊聊过去的事吧。

eng: I was once an Empyrean.
chn: ……我曾是神人。

eng: Of the demigods, only I, Miquella, and Malenia could claim that title.
chn: 半神之中只有我、米凯拉，还有玛莲妮亚是神人。

eng: Each of us was chosen by our own Two Fingers, as a candidate to succeed Queen Marika, to become the new god of the coming age.
chn:
我们各自被不同的双指找到，成为神祇候选人──
预定继玛莉卡女王之后，成为下一个时代的神祇。

eng: Which is when I received Blaidd. In the form of a vassal tailored for an Empyrean.
chn: 我因此得到了布莱泽，他是神人的特殊随从。

eng: But I would not acquiesce to the Two Fingers.
chn: ……但是我拒绝了双指。

eng: I stole the Rune of Death, slew mine own Empyrean flesh, casting it away.
chn: 我窃走死亡卢恩，杀害、抛弃自己身为神人的身体，

eng: I would not be controlled by that thing.
chn: 因为我拒绝受那种存在操控。

eng: The Two Fingers and I have been cursing each other ever since...
chn: ……从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此，

eng: And the Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
chn: 而灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

eng: I turned my back on the Two Fingers and we have each been cursing the other since.
chn:
……我拒绝了双指。
从那之后，我和双指诅咒彼此。

eng: The Baleful Shadows...are their assassins.
chn: 灾厄影子就是祂送来的刺客。

eng: Even when I turned my back upon the Two Fingers.
chn: ……当我拒绝双指的那个时候，

eng: Blaidd remained my loyal ally.
chn: 布莱泽还是站在我这边。

eng: Heh.
chn: 呵呵。

eng: Though he was created a vassal for an Empyrean,
chn: 他明明是神人的特殊随从。

eng: He was a colossal failure, on the part of the Two Fingers.
chn: 以双指的角度来看，这想必是非常严重的瑕疵。

eng: Blaidd, and Iji both... Art willing to give too much to me.
chn: ……对布莱泽、伊吉，我真的无以回报。

eng: Yet they both understand. What lieth beyond the dark path...
chn:
他们明明知道，
我要走上的黑暗道路，终点会有什么。

eng: That I must betray everything, and rid the world of what came before.
chn: 也知道我总有一天会背叛一切、舍弃一切。

eng: Ah, should I add thee to the list?
chn: ……啊，也许我该把你算进去？

eng: Another one, kind of heart. As kind of heart as they.
chn: 在滥好人这一点上，你们可说是不分轩轾。

eng: Ach, this form hath loosened my tongue.
chn: ……用这模样，心情就是会比较放松。

eng: I've let slip too much.
chn: 不自觉说得太多了……

eng: Forget what thou'st heard. Forget.
chn: 忘掉我说的话，听到没有？

eng: O Shadow, thou'rt the last.
chn: ……影子啊，你是最后一个了。

eng: Tell the Two Fingers,
chn: 告诉双指吧：

eng: That Ranni the Witch cometh, to rend thy flesh.
chn: 魔女菈妮就要替你刻下伤痕──

eng: With a fateful wound, ne'er to heal.
chn: 那永不愈合的命定伤痕。

eng: Beautifully fought.
chn: ……战斗得很精采。

eng: My thanks. 'Twas more of a challenge than I envisioned.
chn: 劳烦你了，谢谢。

eng: Now I can finally stand before them.
chn: 如此一来，我总算能见到祂。

eng: This is farewell, my dear.
chn: ……该道别了。

eng: Tell Blaidd, and Iji...
chn: 帮我转达给布莱泽和伊吉……

eng: I love them.
chn: 我爱他们。

eng: So, it was thee, who would become my Lord.
chn: ……你是我的王吗？

eng: Perhaps I needn't have warned thee.
chn: 我送出警告，看来是徒劳。

eng: I am pleased, however. Thou'rt a fitting choice.
chn:
……其实，我很高兴。
我很庆幸自己的王是你。

eng: I go now, to the night sky. It is there I shall find mine order.
chn: 我要前往夜空──我的律法所在。

eng: I bid thee travel the path of the Lord.
chn: 你就继续走在王的道路上吧。

eng: And once all is done, we shall see each other, once more.
chn: 等到彼此的事情都完成了，再见面吧。

eng: I take it thou'st noticed? I shouldn't be surprised.
chn: ……还是被发现了？你真厉害。

eng: I thought I might expound a little further...
chn: 我想再多聊一下，

eng: Upon the order I envision.
chn: 关于我的律法。

eng: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
chn:
我的律法不是黄金──
而是星星与月亮，冰冷黑夜的律法。

eng: I would keep them far from the earth beneath our feet.
chn: ……我想让他们远离这块土地。

eng: As it is now, life, and souls, and order are bound tightly together, but I would have them at a great remove.
chn:
现下的生命、灵魂都与律法同在，
我希望能远离，让一切远为他方。

eng: And have the certainties of sight, emotion, faith, and touch...
chn: 那些能明确看见的、感觉的、相信的、触碰的……

eng: All become impossibilities.
chn: 我希望由可能，化为不可能。

eng: Which is why I would abandon this soil, with mine order.
chn: 所以我要和律法一起抛弃这块土地。

eng: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
chn:
即使如此，你也会跟来，对吧？
我唯一的王啊。

eng: Mine will be an order not of gold, but the stars and moon of the chill night.
chn:
我的律法不是黄金──
而是星星与月亮，冰冷黑夜的律法。

eng: And I would abandon this soil, with mine Order.
chn: ……而且，我要和律法一起抛弃这块土地。

eng: Wouldst thou come to me, even now, my one and only Lord?
chn:
即使如此，你也会跟来，对吧？
我唯一的王啊。

eng: Well, this is a most unpleasant awakening.
chn: ……这次睁开眼，真令人不悦。

eng: The depths of wickedness never fail to surprise me.
chn:
得寸进尺的鼠辈。
遇见几次，心烦几次。

eng: I am saddened. That thou wouldst succumb to such depravity.
chn: ……很遗憾。我竟然会因为你，感受到这些情绪。

eng: Led astray by Seluvis, with devious tonic in hand,
chn:
上了赛尔维斯的贼船，
厚颜无耻地带来下流的药物。

eng: Didst thou think to have thy way with me?
chn: 你真以为能得逞？

eng: Be gone. Hapless scum.
chn: ……消失吧，下贱之辈。

eng: I won't have another whiff of thy rotten breath.
chn: 别再让我感受到你骯脏的气息。

eng: I have spoken. Away from my sight.
chn: ……我说了，要你消失。

eng: This is the third time, fiend.
chn: ……这是第三次了，下贱之辈。

eng: Enough of thy unbearable breath.
chn: 你的气息太过骯脏，烦人。

eng: What hopest thou to profit?
chn: 你这是做什么？

eng: To think such was thy plot.
chn: ……原来如此，这才是你的目的？

eng: Well, I refuse to indulge thy fantasies.
chn: 很遗憾，我无法满足你的期望。

eng: I relinquished a natural death long, long ago.
chn: 早在很久以前，我就抛弃了正常死去的机会。

eng: What hopest thou to profit?
chn: 你这是做什么？

eng: Hmph.
chn: ……哈哈。

eng: So, this is the measure of my Lord?
chn: 原来如此，我的王显露本性了？

eng: Perhaps it is precisely what I deserve.
chn: 倒也是，这才是常理。

eng: …For surrendering myself to delusion.
chn: ……我到底在期待什么……

eng: Come, sweetings, become what ye desire.
chn: 来，乖孩子，变成你们希望的样子吧……

eng: Come, sweetings, time to be born, anew.
chn: 来，乖孩子，是时候再一次诞生了唷……

eng: Be not afeard, little culver.
chn: 来，不用怕喔……

eng: Hush, little culver.
chn: 哎呀……不用担心……

eng: Hush, fair maid.
chn: 哎呀……不用担心……

eng: I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
chn: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

eng: Come, Oath-sworn giant!
chn: 我的盟友，巨人啊！

eng: Come, Oath-sworn dragon!
chn: 我的盟友，龙啊！

eng: Come, Oath-sworn beasts!
chn: 我的盟友，野兽啊！

eng: Come, Blaidd, my child!
chn: 我的子民，布莱泽啊！

eng: Fair child, Hermes!
chn: 我的子民，赫密斯啊！

eng: Thy fate lieth under my moon.
chn: ……命运与我等之月同在。

eng: Guide thy moon as thou wishest.
chn: ……你的月，会是由你的意志而成。

eng: Ranni, my little baby...
chn: 菈妮，我可爱的女儿啊。

eng: I thank thee...
chn: 谢谢你……

eng: Oh little Ranni, my dear daughter.
chn: ……啊，菈妮，我可爱的女儿啊。

eng: Weave thy night into being...
chn: 迈向属于你的黑夜吧……

eng: Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
chn: ……我的乖孩子，你们去哪里了呢？

eng: Come out, from whence ye hide. There are books and light aplenty.
chn:
不要玩捉迷藏了，快点出来吧。
我准备了好多书和灯火唷。

eng: Dither not; come out say I!
chn: 快点出来吧。

eng: Or will ye be gravestones? To be better born anew?
chn: 还是说你们又变成墓碑了呢？是不是才要诞生呢？

eng: Ah...thou...
Is it thy wish to be born anew?
chn: 你也想要再一次诞生，所以过来了吗？

eng: To become a sweeting, reborn of my beloved egg?
chn:
你也想从我可爱的孩子──
从卵里再一次诞生吗？

eng: Ah...thou...
Is it thy wish to yet again be born anew?
chn: 又想要再一次诞生吗？

eng: Now, bear this sweeting into life anew.
chn: 来，诞生成乖孩子吧……

eng: Be not alarmed, nor afeard.
chn: 不用害怕唷，

eng: I would birth thee as a sweeting, fair and fine.
chn: 我一定会让你诞生成乖孩子……

eng: Ah...thou...
Art thou now assured of thy want, to be born anew?
chn: 你还是想再一次诞生吗？

eng: Ah, it seemeth thou'rt a sweeting rather fair.
chn: ……哎呀，你有一点乖孩子的样子了，

eng: And if thou wert born anew once more, thou wouldst be fairer still.
chn: 再多诞生几次，一定会变成更乖的孩子。

eng: Ye will be countless born, forever.
chn: 你们会一直、一直诞生唷……

eng: Ah, thou'rt now a sweeting full fine and fair.
chn: ……你变成了很乖、很乖的孩子。

eng: My thanks. For being born of my beloved egg, time and time again.
chn:
谢谢你从我可爱的孩子，
从卵里一直、一直诞生出来。

eng: Oh...my thanks to thee.
chn: ……哎呀，谢谢你……

eng: <sleeping>
Where did ye flee, my sweetings?
chn: ……我的乖孩子，你们去哪里了呢？

eng: Come out, from whence ye hide. Of the dark, be not afeard.
chn: 不要玩捉迷藏了，快点出来吧。不用怕黑唷。

eng: My beloved egg is with us. Come out, I prithee.
chn:
我可爱的孩子、卵在这里唷。
所以不用怕，快点出来吧。

eng: <giggling>
Who's that? Who could it be?
chn: 那是谁？会是谁？

eng: A new child, Mother's newborn.
chn: 是妈妈的孩子，会变成妈妈的孩子。

eng: A new friend. A new playmate for us.
chn: 所以我们是朋友。对，是朋友。

eng: Just watch, he'll be born again.
chn: 又快要诞生了耶。

eng: Just watch, she'll be born again.
chn: 又快要诞生了耶。

eng: Then Mother will hold him tight.
chn: 那一定会抱抱喔。

eng: Then Mother will hold her tight.
chn: 那一定会抱抱喔。

eng: He'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
chn: 对啊、对啊，热呼呼、软绵绵的。

eng: She'll be so warm, warm and cosy.
chn: 对啊、对啊，热呼呼、软绵绵的。

eng: That'd be nice, so very nice.
chn: 好好喔。好羡慕。好羡慕喔。

eng: If we're turned to stone, will we be born again?
chn: 如果变成墓碑的话，还会再被生下来吗？

eng: Will Mother hold us again?
chn: 妈妈还会再抱抱吗？

eng: Will we? Will she?
chn: 会再抱抱吗？

eng: <giggling>
<giggling>
That hurts. Please, stop that.
chn: 好痛、好痛喔。真的好过分喔。

eng: Did he just die? And him, too?
chn: 那边的还有这边的小孩，都死翘翘了耶。

eng: Is he not a friend? I can't tell…
chn: 朋友会这样吗？是不是弄错了？

eng: Is she not a friend? I can't tell…
chn: 朋友会这样吗？是不是弄错了？

eng: Maybe he's something else?
chn: 是不是我们弄错了？

eng: Maybe she's something else?
chn: 是不是我们弄错了？

eng: Can we still be friends, if we try?
chn: 那再加油一点，变成朋友吧。

eng: Yes, we can be friends, I'm sure.
chn: 对啊、对啊。嗯，对啊。

eng: He'll understand, if we just explain.
chn: 只要说清楚，他一定就会明白的。

eng: She'll understand, if we just explain.
chn: 只要说清楚，她一定就会明白的。

eng: <giggling>
<giggling>
Catch!
There!
Off you go!
Squish him!
Squish her!
Smoosh him!
Smoosh her!
Sleep tight, bound tight
chn: 依偎吧、安睡吧，

eng: by Mother's amber.
chn: 蜷曲母亲的琥珀里；

eng: Sleep tight, find life,
chn: 安睡吧、诞生吧，

eng: in Mother's umbra.
chn: 降生母亲的黑夜里。

eng: I smell it... Death...
chn: 闻到了……是死亡……

eng: Feed it me...
chn: 让我吞下。

eng: Tarnished...bring more...Death...
chn: 褪色者……献上更多死亡吧……

eng: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
chn: 我愿授予眼与爪，

eng: Feed me...more.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: More... I am not...sated.
chn: 不够……饿了……

eng: Feed me more...Death.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: My thanks...Tarnished...
chn: 感谢你……褪色者……

eng: Death... My sin... Should not be touched...by the hand of man...
chn: 人不该接触死亡……这是我的罪孽……

eng: I shall grant thee...my claws...
chn: 我愿授予爪，

eng: Feed me...more.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: I shall grant thee... eye...and claw.
chn: 我愿授予眼与爪，

eng: Feed me...more.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: More... I am not...sated.
chn: 不够……饿了……

eng: Feed me more...Death.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: I shall grant thee...my claws...
chn: 我愿授予爪，

eng: Feed me...more.
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: <chewing>
It is... It is all...consumed.
chn: 全部……吞下了……

eng: Still, I am not sated... Not nearly sated...
chn: 但还是饿……非常地饿……

eng: Rrarrgh!
Marika... Is this...what it is...to sin?
chn: 玛莉卡啊！这就是罪孽吗？

eng: Will things...never be the same...again?
chn: 无法回到当初了吗？

eng: Tarnished...my thanks...for thy long...labour.
chn: ……褪色者，感谢你长久以来的帮助。

eng: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
chn: 能在这片土地做的事情，都完成了。

eng: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
chn: 我要与这份饥渴长存──

eng: Farewell.
chn: 永别了。

eng: <plaintive howl>
Tarnished...my thanks...for thy long...labour.
chn: ……褪色者，感谢你长久以来的帮助。

eng: But I have done...all I can...in this land...
chn: 能在这片土地做的事情，都完成了。

eng: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.
chn: 我要与这份饥渴长存──

eng: Farewell.
chn: 永别了。

eng: <plaintive howl>
<pained howl>
O Marika...
chn: ……玛莉卡啊，

eng: What...happened?
chn: 发生什么事了？

eng: Was I...myself the fool?
chn: 是因为我太愚笨？

eng: Or was I tricked...by thee?
chn: 还是……你欺瞒了我？

eng: O Marika...
chn: ……玛莉卡啊，

eng: Why wouldst thou...relinquish...
chn: 为何动手击碎？

eng: Why...
chn: 为何……

eng: Strange... There's something else...
chn: ……奇了，有其他东西……

eng: But the Death...yet quenches...
chn: 有死亡……这样就够了……

eng: Bring more...
chn: 献上更多死亡，让我吞下。

eng: <pained howl>
<growl>
Put it away.
chn: ……放过我吧。

eng: I won't forget...again...
chn: 我不会再次遗忘──

eng: mine appetite... My sin...
chn: 自身的饥渴、自身的罪孽……

eng: So please...enough...
chn: 放过我吧……

eng: <growl>
<chewing>
I won't forget...again...
chn: ……我不会再次遗忘──

eng: mine appetite... My sin...
chn: 自身的饥渴、自身的罪孽……

eng: I must have more... I must consume more...
chn: ……吞下更多、吞下更多……

eng: Thou, who approacheth Destined Death.
chn: 渴望接近命定之死的人啊，

eng: I will not have it stolen from me again.
chn: 我不会让它失窃第二次。

eng: Tarnished. Why wouldst thou...
chn: 褪色者……没想到是你……

eng: Why...
chn: 为何如此……？

eng: Tis no matter. I hereby vow,
chn: ……不会再发生第二次，

eng: that Destined Death shall not be stolen again.
chn: 我不会让命定之死再次失窃。

eng: I shall not part with it again.
chn: 我不会让它失窃第二次……

eng: Stay away from Destined Death.
chn: 不准靠近命定之死……

eng: Cower. Before Maliketh, the Black Blade.
chn: 对“黑剑”玛利喀斯心存畏惧吧……

eng: Cower. Before Maliketh, Marika's Black Blade.
chn: 畏惧“玛莉卡的黑剑”玛利喀斯吧……

eng: Witless Tarnished... Why covet Destined Death?
chn:
褪色者……
你一心抢夺命定之死──

eng: To kill what?
chn: 是为了杀害何物？

eng: To destroy what?
chn: 是为了破坏何物？

eng: Forgive me, Marika...
chn: 玛莉卡，抱歉……

eng: The Golden Order...cannot be restored.
chn: 黄金律法……难以复原……

eng: I must consume more...
chn: 要吞下更多……

eng: Marika...why...
chn: ……玛莉卡啊，为何……？

eng: wouldst thou...gull me?
chn: 你欺瞒了我……？

eng: Why...shatter...
chn: 为何动手击碎……？

eng: I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella.
chn:
充分感受到了吗？
何谓“米凯拉的锋刃”玛莲妮亚。

eng: Let your flesh be consumed.
chn: 用你的身体牢牢记住吧……

eng: By the scarlet rot.
chn: 猩红腐败的滋味。

eng: Is this...my first...defeat?
chn: ……这就是战败吗？

eng: Bravely fought, sir.
chn: 打得漂亮……

eng: Bravely fought, my lady.
chn: 打得漂亮……

eng: But remember...
chn: 但别忘了……

eng: One day, the scarlet bloom will flower again...
chn: 终有一天，猩红花朵会再次怒放……

eng: Your strength, extraordinary...
chn: 那股力量……

eng: The mark...of a true Lord...
chn: 是为王的器量啊……

eng: O, dear Miquella...
chn: 啊，哥哥……

eng: O, dearest Miquella, my brother...
chn: 啊，哥哥、哥哥……

eng: I'm sorry. I finally met my match...
chn: 对不起，玛莲妮亚输了……

eng: Well, thou art of passing skill.
chn: ……哦，不容小觑啊……

eng: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者不愧是战士的后代。

eng: As I thought, thou'rt of passing valour...
chn: ……哦，不容小觑啊。

eng: but the dark of night is yet to lift.
chn: 然而潜伏暗处的黑，不会轻易消散。

eng: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
chn: “恶兆”绝不会放过你……

eng: Foul Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者啊，

eng: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
chn: 遗忘那愚昧的野心吧。

eng: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
chn: 黄金树是坚不可摧……

eng: I'll remember thee, Tarnished.
chn: ……我记住你了，褪色者啊。

eng: The flame of ambition leadeth thee astray.
chn: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

eng: Come, hands of the Fell Omen. Snuff out this wretch's flame.
chn: “恶兆妖鬼”绝对会捏熄你的火焰……

eng: I see thee, little Tarnished.
chn: ……褪色者啊，找到你了。

eng: Smould'ring with that wretched flame of ambition.
chn: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

eng: Tremble now, with fear.
chn: 尽管害怕吧──

eng: For the hands of the Fell Omen will soon be upon thee.
chn: “恶兆”就快笼罩你的全身……

eng: To put out thy little flame.
chn: 想必捏熄你的火焰，也是迟早的事……

eng: Hrghraah!
The thrones...stained by my curse...
chn: ……竟敢以诅咒玷污王座……

eng: Such shame I cannot bear.
chn: ……奇耻大辱……

eng: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
chn: ……我绝对饶不了你……

eng: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
chn: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

eng: Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings.
chn: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名。

eng: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
chn: ……蒙受诅咒而死吧，

eng: An apt reward for thy brash ambition.
chn: 这倒适合任由野心摆弄的蠢人……

eng: Tarnished, thou art mistaken.
chn: ……褪色者啊，你实在愚昧至极……

eng: The Erdtree welcometh no man.
chn: ……黄金树绝不敞开……

eng: No one will be Elden Lord again.
chn: ……没有人能当得上艾尔登之王……

eng: Not even I.
chn: ……我也不例外……

eng: Well, thou art of passing skill.
chn: ……哦，不容小觑啊。

eng: Warrior blood must truly run in thy veins, Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者不愧是战士的后代。

eng: Foul Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者啊，

eng: Put these foolish ambitions to rest.
chn: 遗忘那愚昧的野心吧。

eng: The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.
chn: 黄金树是坚不可摧……

eng: I shall remember thee, Tarnished.
chn: ……我记住你了，褪色者啊。

eng: Smould'ring with thy meagre flame.
chn: 受野心之火摆弄之人啊。

eng: Cower in fear. Of the night.
chn: 尽管害怕那潜伏暗处的黑吧──

eng: The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
chn: “恶兆”绝不会放过你……

eng: Hrghraah!
The thrones...stained by my curse...
chn: ……竟敢以诅咒玷污王座……

eng: Such shame I cannot bear.
chn: ……奇耻大辱……

eng: Thy part in this shall not be forgiven.
chn: ……我绝对饶不了你……

eng: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:
chn: ……在你那愚昧的墓志铭上，

eng: Felled by King Morgott! Elden Lord!
chn: 刻上我“末代之王”蒙葛特之名！

eng: May the curse seep to thy very soul.
chn: ……蒙受诅咒而死吧。

eng: Tarnished, thou'rt but a fool.
chn: ……褪色者啊，你实在愚昧至极……

eng: The Erdtree wards off all who deign approach.
chn: ……黄金树拒绝着一切，

eng: We are...we are all forsaken.
chn: 我们早已被舍弃。

eng: None may claim the title of Elden Lord.
chn: ……没有人能当得上艾尔登之王……

eng: Thy deeds shall be met with failure, just as I.
chn: ……我也不例外……

eng: Tarnished Warrior. 'Twas nobly fought.
chn: 褪色者啊，打得很出色。

eng: Dearest Marika...
chn: ……玛莉卡啊，

eng: I am returned.
chn: 我回来了。

eng: A crown is warranted with strength!
chn: 力量正是为王的理由！

eng: O Marika!
chn: 玛莉卡啊！

eng: I will take thee in mine arms once more!
chn: 我要再一次拥你入怀！

eng: Brave Tarnished...
chn: 褪色者啊……

eng: Thy strength befits a crown.
chn: 你拥有的力量，正是为王的理由。

eng: One day, we'll return together.
chn: 终有一天，我等将返家。

eng: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
chn: 一同返回黄金树脚的故乡。

eng: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
chn: 人言正统为主枝，主枝其下为旁枝，

eng: That bathe in true rays of gold.
chn: 主枝之于黄金树脚，名正言顺──

eng: Not the fool Omen King.
chn: 弃子的恶兆之王，不可企及；

eng: Nor the rank malformed twins.
chn: 不成熟的畸形兄妹，望洋兴叹。

eng: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
chn: 噢，我等为黄金之民、正统之民。

eng: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
chn: 纵然大地贫瘠、乌云满布，

eng: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
chn: 抬头一望，大树蓊郁如常。

eng: One day, we'll return together.
chn: 终有一天，我等将返家。

eng: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
