eng: Cheers for that.
chn: 铭谢惠顾──

eng: What, do I have to beg?
chn: 啧，铁公鸡喔……

eng: Give us a coin or two next time around, will you?
chn: 下次再请多多惠顾啦。

eng: Forgot something on your shopping list?
chn: 哦，漏了东西没买吗？

eng: No trouble to me.
chn: 我最欢迎回头客了。

eng: Booze, eh? Good stuff, by the look of it.
chn: ……哦，是酒啊？看起来挺赞的。

eng: But, er, I'm alright, thanks.
chn: 但不劳费心了。

eng: As my dear nan used to say, "there's no such thing as a free lunch"...
chn: 我家的祖母最常讲：“免费的东西最贵”。

eng: Ngh!
chn: 哇！

eng: What are you playing at? That bloody well hurts!
chn: 痛死啦！你干么啦！

eng: What's wrong with you?
chn: 你怎么啦？

eng: It's me, Patches. Patches!
chn: 是我啊！帕奇啊！

eng: Enough now, stop!
chn: 快住手啦！

eng: Ugh. Hard of hearing, are we?
chn: 啧！不甩人喔！

eng: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming!
chn: 好啊，要打就来啊，打就打嘛！

eng: Don't go thinking I'm a soft touch!
chn: 劝你不要看扁我！

eng: Last chance to surrender, mate.
chn: 想投降的话趁现在啊，

eng: Grovel...and I'll forgive you.
chn: 只要下跪求饶，我就愿意原谅你喔！

eng: Well... It was bound to happen some day...
chn: ……我就知道迟早会这样，

eng: What a shit show...
chn: 混账东西……

eng: Try not to be so slow on the uptake, eh.
chn: 不听人话，小心惹人嫌啊……

eng: There's a special circle, for rotten thieves like you.
chn: 不要脸的小偷，活该遭天谴啊……

eng: Well, it looks like you've seen the error of your ways.
chn: ……你好像有在反省嘛。

eng: Water under the bridge. Am I wrong?
chn: 那就当作没发生吧。

eng: We'll call it a momentary lapse of judgment. "All's well", as you know.
chn: 彼此的恩恩怨怨就归零，不算数了。

eng: So, what can I do you for today?
chn: 好啦，找我有什么事？

eng: Okay, I can see you mean it.
chn: ……跪得真标准啊。

eng: Consider it water under the bridge.
chn: 事情就当作没发生吧。

eng: A momentary lapse of judgment. "All's well", as you know.
chn: 彼此的恩恩怨怨就归零，不算数了。

eng: So. Do you need something from me?
chn: 好啦，找我有什么事？

eng: Hello? Is somebody there?
chn: ……有人在那里吗？

eng: Might I bend your ear for a moment, please.
chn: 拜托您，请听我说。

eng: My name is Irina. I've escaped from Castle Morne, to the south.
chn:
我的名字是伊蕾娜，
是从南方的摩恩城逃出来的。

eng: The servants there...have rebelled.
chn: 城里的仆人群起叛乱，

eng: I-I can't be sure what it is; my eyesight's been weak since birth you see...
chn: 我生来眼睛不方便，没办法全盘了解发生什么事，

eng: But I swear I heard frightful howling from all over.
chn: 但是我听到恐怖的嘶吼声从四方传来。

eng: My good father secreted me out the castle,
chn: 父亲让我逃了出来……

eng: but decided himself to stay. He says it's his duty, as commander.
chn:
但是他还留在那座城里面，
认为那是掌权者应尽的职责。

eng: I understand.
chn: ……我明白了。

eng: I fear some of the castle's servants are still prowling nearby.
chn: ……说不定那些仆人还在附近徘徊，

eng: Do take care on the road. I pray your journey comes to fruition.
chn:
请您一路小心，
希望您在旅途的终点能如愿以偿。

eng: And if you happen to change your mind...
chn: ……还有如果您改变心意了，

eng: Please come to see me again.
chn: 请再和我说一声。

eng: Hello? Is somebody there?
chn: ……有人在那里吗？

eng: Ah, you're the one from before, aren't you?
chn: 难道是刚才那位吗？

eng: Please, I implore you.
chn: ……拜托您了。

eng: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
chn: 能不能把这封信交给留在城里的父亲？

eng:
My sole wish is that he escape,
even if his honour should be the price.
chn:
就算会背负弃城懦夫的骂名，
我也希望父亲离开那座城。

eng: Please...I just need him to be safe...
chn: ……我希望父亲活下来。

eng: Thank you, dearly.
chn: 噢，谢谢您。

eng: Then please, take this.
chn: 那么，请收下……

eng: Deliver it to my father, who remains in the castle, if you please.
chn: 拜托您，请交给留在城里的父亲。

eng: Please, if you wouldn't mind. Deliver the letter to my father at the castle.
chn: 拜托您了，请把那封信交给留在城里的父亲。

eng: He can be stubborn, but I'm sure he'll come around.
chn: 他的个性顽固，但看过信之后一定会改变心意。

eng: I...I fear for father's life.
chn: ……我很担心父亲。

eng: The servants are full wroth. Filled with hatred for every one of us.
chn: 仆人非常愤怒，恨着我们所有人，

eng:
They've since come for every one of the companions I escaped with.
They haven't spared a soul.
chn: 那些一起逃出来的人都受他们攻击……全部消失了。

eng: I fear it's no different at Castle Morne...
chn: 摩恩城会不会也是同样情况……

eng: Please, I implore you.
chn: ……我想拜托您。

eng: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
chn: 能不能把这封信交给留在城里的父亲呢？

eng:
My sole wish is that he escape,
even if his honour should be the price.
chn:
就算会背负弃城懦夫的骂名，
我也希望父亲离开那座城。

eng: Please...I just want him to be safe...
chn: ……我希望父亲活下来。

eng: Hello? Is someone there?
chn: ……有人在那里吗？

eng: My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light.
chn:
初次见面，您好。我的名字是海妲，
正为了找寻彼岸灯火而旅行。

eng: If I might be so bold as to ask...
chn: 在此，我有一个不情之请……

eng: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
chn: 如果您有夏玻利利葡萄，能不能请您让给我呢？

eng:
My eyesight has been weak since birth, you see.
I can't tell which way I'm supposed to go next.
chn: 我自出生眼睛就不方便，看不清该何去何从，

eng:
But when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel a distant light
in the back of my eyes.
chn:
但只要吃了那葡萄，
就能从眼睛深处感觉到彼岸灯火。

eng: It will lead me, to my true duty, as a Finger Maiden.
chn: 朝着灯火前进，成为指头女巫──就是我的使命。

eng: Hello? Is someone there?
chn: ……有人在那里吗？

eng: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
chn: 如果您有夏玻利利葡萄，能不能请您让给我呢？

eng: I'm on a pilgrimage in search of the distant light.
chn: 我正为了找寻彼岸灯火而旅行。

eng:
And when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel the light
in the back of my eyes.
chn:
只要吃了那葡萄，
就能从眼睛深处感觉到它。

eng: Oh, many thanks to you.
chn: 啊，谢谢您。

eng: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
chn: 这么一来，我就能再次感受到彼岸灯火了。

eng: You are most kind, indeed.
chn: 我很感谢您的好心，

eng: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
chn: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

eng: You're not like the others who give me grapes, are you...
chn: ……您真的很特别。

eng: They rest their trembling hands upon me.
chn:
其他给我葡萄的人，
每个人都颤抖着手碰触我，

eng: Howling wordlessly, they gently stroke my eyes.
chn:
一边发出不成话语的嘶喊，
一边轻轻地摸过我的眼睛。

eng: Their frail fingers, emaciated... Yet still, they give me the grapes.
chn: 那些非常干瘦的手给了我葡萄。

eng: But you...seem somehow...firmer.
chn: 而您带给我的……是很强大的印象。

eng: Oh, many thanks to you.
chn: 啊，谢谢您。

eng: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
chn: 这么一来，我就能再次感受到彼岸灯火了。

eng: That aside, I wonder what Shabriri grapes really are?
chn: 话说回来，夏玻利利葡萄到底是什么模样呢？

eng: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
chn: 咬起来粘稠又柔软，甘甜又有些烫口……

eng: What a sight they must be to behold.
chn: 那肯定是很美丽的果实吧？

eng: N-No... That's not possible...
chn: ……怎么会……

eng: Not all of those people... Their own...
chn: ……可是那代表……大家……

eng: So those noises I heard were...
chn: 那声音……

eng: <retching>
Sorry... I'm alright now.
chn: ……不好意思，我已经没事了。

eng: Don't mind me...
chn: 请您不必挂心。

eng: Ah, is that you over there?
chn: ……噢，您人在那里吗？

eng: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
chn: ……您让我察觉了很棒的事情：

eng: The reason why it was eyes I had to eat.
chn: 葡萄等同眼眸，以及我吃下它有什么意义。

eng: The distant light is far and frail.
chn: 彼岸灯火距离遥远，火光细小。

eng: So faint it can't be seen by the naked eye.
chn: 所以单靠一个人的眼眸，实在无法分辨。

eng: But with everyone's eyes together, it appears.
chn: ……将大家的眼眸集中起来，就能感觉到它了。

eng: Finally, it all makes sense.
chn: ……我终于明白了。

eng: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
chn: 我一定能够成为指头女巫。

eng: You are most kind, indeed.
chn: 感谢您的好心。

eng: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
chn: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

eng: You are most kind, indeed.
chn: 感谢您的好心。

eng: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
chn: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

eng: I wonder, what are Shabriri grapes?
chn: ……夏玻利利葡萄到底是什么模样呢？

eng: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
chn: 咬起来粘稠又柔软，甘甜又有些烫口……

eng: What a sight they must be to behold.
chn: 那肯定是很美丽的果实吧？

eng: I apologise. You only did as I asked.
chn: ……不好意思，您特意告诉我，我还这种反应。

eng: I'll be fine. Think no more of it.
chn: 已经没事了，请您不必挂心……

eng: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
chn: ……您让我察觉了很棒的事情。

eng: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
chn: 我一定能够成为指头女巫。

eng: Oh hello, is that you over there?
chn: ……噢，您人在那里吗？

eng: Have you ever heard of fingerprint grapes?
chn: 您知道指痕葡萄吗？

eng:
They're special grapes which only grow on those
who've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
chn:
那是只长在烧伤手指抓过的生物身上，
很特殊的葡萄……

eng: I would truly love to try one...
chn: 我想要尝尝那种葡萄。

eng: The distant light seems far closer than before,
chn: 彼岸灯火已经比之前更加靠近了，

eng: But I can't sense a thing from the usual grapes anymore...
chn: 但是以普通的葡萄，我感觉不到任何改变。

eng: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
chn: 拜托您，请将指痕葡萄带来给我。

eng: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
chn: 如果吃不到那葡萄，啊啊，我好像就快发疯了。

eng: Oh, Oh!
chn: 啊，啊啊！

eng: A fingerprint grape, tried and true, what a wondrous thing! A fingerprint grape!
chn: 指痕葡萄、指痕葡萄，这个就是，对吧？

eng: Ohh, how sweet, yet, how it burns...
chn: ……啊，多么地甘甜，多么地烫口呀……

eng: Thank you. I've composed myself again.
chn: ……谢谢您。我的心总算平静下来了。

eng: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
chn: 愿您也有指头的庇护。

eng: Oh, that's right.
chn: ……啊，我想起来了。

eng: ...Might I ask a boon of you?
chn: 可以拜托您一件事情吗？

eng: Look after this for me, if you please.
chn: 我想把这件物品托付给您。

eng:
It's been so long, I don't know how I came upon it,
but I've been looking for its owner.
chn:
它跟着我似乎有一阵子了，
但我不知道属于谁，想找出它的所有人。

eng: Now I'm to be a Maiden though, it'll never find its way home.
chn:
只是我一直找不到。
在成为女巫之后，就没办法一边旅行，一边寻找了。

eng: Which is why I'd like you to have it.
chn: 所以我想要把它交给您。

eng: It must be very, very precious indeed.
chn: 这肯定是很重要的物品……

eng:
They're special grapes which only grow on those
who've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
chn:
那是只长在烧伤手指抓过的生物身上，
很特殊的葡萄……

eng: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
chn: 拜托您，请将指痕葡萄带来给我。

eng: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
chn: 如果吃不到那葡萄，啊啊，我好像就快发疯了。

eng: Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
chn: ……谢谢您。

eng: I'm sure I'll be a Finger Maiden.
chn: 我一定会成为指头女巫。

eng: Ah, so you're here as well, are you?
chn: ……噢，您也抵达这里了。

eng: ...I realised as we've talked.
chn: ……每和您攀谈一次，就更明白──

eng: I'll be a Maiden, and you... Surely, a Lord.
chn: 我是女巫，而您一定会成为王。

eng: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
chn: 请卸下一切，往前方的门前进。

eng: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
chn: 门一定会为您而开，您也会见到叁指大人。

eng: May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.
chn: ……愿浑沌火焰能深植于您。

eng: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
chn: 请卸下一切，往前方的门前进。

eng: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
chn: 门一定会为您而开，您也会见到叁指大人。

eng: Ahh, the flame of chaos has nestled within you.
chn: ……啊，浑沌火焰深植您的体内了。

eng: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
chn: 可以请您碰触我吗？

eng: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
chn: 请用那火焰燃烧我，让我成为您的女巫……

eng: Oh, it burns...
chn: ……啊啊，好烫……

eng: My eyes, my eyes, they're melting...
chn: 我的眼睛、我的眼睛要熔化了。

eng: Aaargh!
chn: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊……

eng: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
chn: 可以请您碰触我吗？

eng: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
chn: 请用那火焰燃烧我，让我成为您的女巫……

eng: Thank...thank you...
chn: 谢谢、您。

eng: I have touched them. The words of the Three Fingers.
chn: ……我感应到叁指大人的话了。

eng: As your maiden, allow me to divine them.
chn: 身为您的女巫，请让我转达。

eng: All that there is came from the One Great.
chn: “……万事始于巨大的一，由一产生区别。”

eng: Then came fractures, and births, and souls.
chn: “产生区别后，生命诞生，也拥有了心智。”

eng: But the Greater Will made a mistake.
chn: “然而这就是无上意志犯下的错误。”

eng: Torment, despair, affliction. Every sin, every curse.
chn: “痛苦、绝望、诅咒──所有的罪恶与苦痛，”

eng: Every one, born of the mistake.
chn: “全是由‘错误’而生。”

eng: And so, what was borrowed must be returned.
chn: “所以我们必须重回起点──”

eng: Melt it all away, with the yellow chaos flame.
chn: “用浑沌的黄色火焰熔化一切，”

eng: Until all is One again.
chn: “熔化一切，重回巨大的一……”

eng: Those who gave me grapes howled without words.
chn:
……那些给我葡萄的人，
虽然不成话语，但所有人在嘶喊。

eng: Saying they wished they were never born.
chn: 说着：自己不是自愿诞生世上。

eng: Become their lord.
chn: ……请您成为他们的王。

eng: Take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse.
chn: 成为痛苦、绝望、诅咒，所有的罪恶与苦痛──

eng: And melt it all away. As the Lord of Chaos.
chn: 都能熔化消失的，浑沌之王……

eng: No more fractures. No more birth...
chn: 让所有人不再有区别，不再诞生……

eng: Agh!
chn: 呜！

eng: What's happened to you?
chn: 您怎么了？

eng: Please, you must stop this.
chn: 请您住手，拜托。

eng: Ah, why on earth?
chn: 唉，为什么要这么做呢？

eng: I do not wish to cause anyone harm.
chn: 我不想伤害任何人。

eng: Oh, bless the stars.
chn: ……啊，终于。

eng: You've chosen to reconsider.
chn: 您愿意好好谈一谈了吗？

eng: Father...
chn: ……父亲啊……

eng: Please, be safe...
chn: 请您一定、要平安……

eng: Ahh, the distant light...fades...
chn: ……啊，彼岸灯火、在消失……

eng: I'm so sorry, my dears...
chn: 大家，对不起……

eng: Ah, there's a face I've not seen before.
chn: ……哦，我没见过你。

eng: I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself.
chn:
我是艾德格。
奉葛瑞克大人之命，固守这座城……

eng: But you can see how things have turned out.
chn: 但你也见识到现在的窘态。

eng: The menials have all rebelled.
chn: ……仆人全都造反了。

eng:
They gave me good service, or so I thought,
but it seems it was all an act.
chn: 才以为他们安份工作，没想到只是障眼法。

eng:
Foul creatures, as it's said.
And true enough they're foul inside and out.
chn: 真是名副其实的玷污者，连心也一样污秽。

eng: I'm sorry to disappoint you,
chn: ……对你很不好意思，

eng:
But whatever you've come here to do,
I'm afraid Castle Morne won't hold much longer.
chn: 即使你有任何请托，摩恩城也无法回应。

eng: Take this, by way of apology.
chn: 这是表示歉意的薄礼，你收下吧。

eng: Now then, away with you.
chn: 好了，快离开吧。

eng: You've no reason to risk your neck dawdling here, eh.
chn: 你没有理由在这里赌上性命。

eng: I see, from Irina...
chn: ……原来，伊蕾娜她……

eng: Thank you. I'm in your debt.
chn: 谢谢你，你照顾了我女儿。

eng: But I can't leave yet.
chn: 但我还不能离开。

eng: Even if the castle should fall, as commander, I must remain.
chn: 即使城已经失守，身为掌权者还是有事得做。

eng: To ensure the treasured sword of Morne does not fall into the wrong hands.
chn:
那把剑，摩恩的无价之宝，
绝不能落入玷污者手里……

eng: If you see Irina, do tell her.
chn: 在你遇到伊蕾娜之后，帮我传话吧：

eng: That her father will come for her, once he's fulfilled his duty.
chn: 等到该尽的责任完了，父亲一定会去接她。

eng: I'm in your debt.
chn: ……承蒙相助。

eng: For keeping the sword from those fallen creatures.
chn: 那把剑总算免除落入玷污者手中的命运。

eng: I'm no longer bound by duty.
chn: ……我的责任已了。

eng: Once I've rescued Irina, I will spend my remaining days with her.
chn: 该动身去接伊蕾娜。从今以后，我要为她而活。

eng: Thanks to you, I will be reunited with Irina.
chn: 承蒙相助，我才有办法去接伊蕾娜。

eng: And devote my remaining days to her.
chn: 从今以后，我要为了女儿而活。

eng: Irina has a gentle nature, though.
chn: ……只是伊蕾娜实在太过善良。

eng: I only hope it remains intact.
chn: 希望她没有被意图不轨的人算计。

eng: Irina...
chn: ……伊蕾娜。

eng: How could this be…
chn: 为什么……

eng: My daughter deserved better…
chn: 我的女儿做了什么……

eng: The fault lies...with me.
chn: ……都该怪我。

eng: I chose duty over my daughter's safety.
chn: 因为我把职责摆在最前头，

eng: And that is how fate has answered…
chn: 才会受到这种报应……

eng: I'll find them.
chn: ……我要找出来。

eng: The foul wretches responsible for this.
chn: 那群让你沦落这种下场的畜牲，

eng: I'll hunt them down, and exterminate every last one of them.
chn: 我一定会全找出来，把他们杀得片甲不留……

eng: Rest assured, Irina. It will be done.
chn: 唉，伊蕾娜啊。为父肯定说到做到……

eng: Ugh!
chn: 呜。

eng: What's this about?
chn: 这是做什么？

eng: We need not fight, I assure you.
chn: 我们没有必要交战。

eng: I haven't a clue what's got into you,
chn: ……我不了解你的意图。

eng: but as Lord of this castle, I will stand for it no longer!
chn: 但我艾德格不会轻饶！

eng: And now even your ilk have complicated matters.
chn: ……连你这种分子都混了进来。

eng: Please, enlighten me.
chn: 我真的不明白，

eng: What was the purpose of such folly?
chn: 你到底图的是什么？

eng: Please forgive me, Lord Godrick.
chn: 万分抱歉，葛瑞克大人……

eng: No, not here, not yet…
chn: ……不该是在这种时候……

eng: Forgive me, Iri…na…
chn: 为父对不起你，伊蕾、娜……

eng: Ugh!
chn: 呜。

eng: What's the matter?
chn: 你是在做什么？

eng: Cease this at once.
chn: 还不住手。

eng: Ah, now I see!
chn: ……该不会吧。

eng: You had a hand in Irina's undoing!
chn: 杀害伊蕾娜这档事，你也有份吗！

eng: What could she have done to deserve that?
chn: 那孩子做了什么，必须有这种下场！

eng: I will not rest until they are eliminated.
chn: 为父一定会将他们杀得片甲不留。

eng: Forgive me, Irina…
chn: 为父对不起你，伊蕾、娜……

eng: I will join you soon enough…
chn: 现在就去、接你……

eng: Oh, Tarnished, are you?
chn: 哦，是褪色者啊。

eng: How did you slip inside, with the gate closed?
chn: 城门早就关闭了，你从哪里混进来的吶？

eng: Hmph. No matter.
chn: 罢了，不深究。

eng: If you can fell one of them, you're a champion, in my book.
chn: 有能耐打赢那群家伙，想必也有资格成为勇士。

eng: I am Jerren. Foolish old warrior, and witness.
chn: 我叫杰廉，只是个不起眼的老战士……还有见证人。

eng: Incidentally, do you like a good festival, from time to time?
chn: 我问你，你喜欢祭典吗？

eng: Well, it's true, this fortress houses only the vanquished.
chn: 目前这地方只是座败战军的要塞，

eng: But when the stars align, we celebrate.
chn: 等到天空布满繁星，就会化成祭典的舞台。

eng: A war festival honoring the last battle and death of General Radahn,
chn:
那是为了凭吊破碎战争中
最为强大的半神──拉塔恩将军，

eng: the mightiest demigod of the Shattering, and bearer of a Great Rune.
chn: 纪念他的最后一战，还有继承大卢恩的战斗祭典。

eng: Well, good.
chn: 哦，这样啊。

eng: As you should. The festival affords glory to warriors.
chn: 也是啊，祭典能让战士获得名誉嘛。

eng: Then all you need is a little patience.
chn: 有兴趣的话，稍待片刻吧。

eng: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
chn: 等到繁星出现，也会带来祭典开始的信号。

eng: Well, you're not much fun, are you, chum?
chn: 哦，你这人还真没趣。

eng: No matter. One day you will see.
chn: 算了，也罢。只是时间问题，你迟早会明白──

eng: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
chn: 参与祭典才能获得战士的名誉吶。

eng: Have patience, mm.
chn: 稍待片刻吧。

eng: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
chn: 等到繁星出现，也会带来祭典开始的信号。

eng: Go on, now.
chn: ……好啦，离开吧。

eng: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
chn: 现在你哪有事情需要找我？

eng: One day you will see, chum.
chn: 你迟早会明白──

eng: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
chn: 参与祭典才能获得战士的名誉吶。

eng: Go on, now.
chn: ……好啦，离开吧。

eng: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
chn: 现在你哪有事情需要找我？

eng: Well, I haven't heard that name in an age.
chn: 哦，这名字真让人怀念吶。

eng: Then you must serve Princess Ranni?
chn: 你隶属菈妮大人吗？

eng: The next time you speak to Iji, tell him this:
chn: 那帮我带话给伊吉吧：

eng: The festival of Radahn will surely set Ranni's fate back into motion.
chn:
拉塔恩的战斗祭典
肯定能带动菈妮大人的命运。

eng: By the by… Is that old fool still hammering out weapons?
chn: ……对了，那家伙还在锻造武器吗？

eng: His enormous frame, cramped in that little place...
chn: 看他把巨大的身体缩得小小的，好像很不自在……

eng: Bit of a haughty sort. Strange fella, when I knew him.
chn: 而且还啰唆得很，真是奇怪无比的巨人吶。

eng: And funny thing, his swords were all blunt as stone.
chn: 嗯，不过啊……他锻造的武器虽然钝到不行，

eng: But not one of them decayed when faced with the scarlet rot...
chn: 但是在对上猩红腐败，却不会受到腐朽侵蚀……

eng: Champions, welcome!
chn: 诸位勇士啊，欢迎你们！

eng: The stars have aligned! The festival is nigh!
chn: 繁星布满天空，祭典的时刻到了！

eng: General Radahn, mightiest demigod of the Shattering, awaits you!
chn: 破碎战争中最强大的半神，拉塔恩将军正在等着你们。

eng: Champions, prepare for battle! Defeat the General, claim glory, and grab that Great Rune!
chn:
勇士啊，战斗吧！
满怀荣誉击败强敌，取得大卢恩吧！

eng: A celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
chn: 战斗祭典开始啦！拉塔恩祭典开始啦！

eng: Are you good and prepared, young chum?
chn: ……你准备好了吗？

eng: The festival begins!
chn: 拉塔恩祭典要开始了。

eng: But now, we must make merry.
chn: ……好啦，该开始了。

eng: O gathering of champions, the revels begin!
chn: 勇士啊，祭典拉开序幕啦！

eng: The celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
chn: 战斗祭典开始啦！拉塔恩祭典开始啦！

eng: You will find the field of battle past the church ahead, upon the shore under the fort.
chn:
从前方的教堂进到要塞底下的海岸吧，
战场就在那里。

eng: General Radahn is there, even now.
chn: 拉塔恩将军还留在原地。

eng: Divested of his wits, devouring corpses…
chn: ……依旧失去神智，啃食尸体。

eng: And howling at the sky...
chn: ……依旧朝天空发出痛心的哭喊。

eng: I see...
chn: ……还没好啊。

eng: When you are ready, come to me again.
chn: 等你准备好之后，再和我说一声吶。

eng: At last, the war festival has ended.
chn: ……战斗祭典结束了，是吧？

eng: Brave champion, you have our gratitude.
chn: 勇士啊，我要对你表示谢意。

eng: The celebration was spectacular. General Radahn is surely pleased.
chn: 这场战斗祭典很不错，将军肯定很满意。

eng: Festering with rot, and crippled by madness, all he wanted was an honourable death.
chn:
比起受腐败侵蚀，陷入发狂与腐朽的境地，
这结果名誉得多。

eng: Finally, my work is done.
chn: ……这下总算尽了我的责任。

eng: I am no longer bound to this fortress.
chn: 没必要继续留在这座要塞了。

eng: I have a task in mind.
chn: 我打算出门旅行，

eng: Old business you could say. You wouldn't understand.
chn: 我也有自己的过去吶。

eng: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
chn: 有缘再见吧，勇士。

eng: It's time I went on my way.
chn: 好啦，我要准备出门旅行了。

eng: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
chn: 有缘再见吧，勇士。

eng: Ah, well met.
chn: 哦，是你啊。

eng: I hardly expected to see the champion of the festival here of all places.
chn: 没想到会在这里和祭典的勇士相会。

eng: You didn't...know Sellen, did you?
chn: 难道你和瑟濂有牵扯？

eng: Well, whatever the case, she's dead now.
chn: 无论如何，这女人已经死了。

eng: Just put it behind you.
chn: 劝你忘了关于她的一切吶。

eng: She was known as the Graven Witch.
chn: ……她是“魔块魔女”──

eng: Obsessed by the primeval current, countless sorcerers fell to her hand.
chn: 沉迷于起源论调，对无数魔法师狠下毒手，

eng: The most dangerous mage in the entire history of Raya Lucaria's Academy.
chn: 是雷亚卢卡利亚学院有史以来最为棘手的灾难。

eng: Oh, a Tarnished, are you?
chn: 哦，是褪色者啊。

eng: You didn't...know Sellen, did you?
chn: 难道你和瑟濂有牵扯？

eng: It is strange, though...
chn: ……只是，有些蹊跷……

eng: The woman, she was like a husk, her soul already fled.
chn: 这女人让我感觉，像是没了灵魂的空壳。

eng: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
chn: 瑟濂的实体可能还幸存，

eng: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
chn: 未来也许会透过其他身体，再一次现身……

eng: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
chn: 真是不吉利，但我忍不住这么想。

eng: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
chn: 瑟濂的实体可能还幸存，

eng: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
chn: 未来也许会透过其他身体，再一次现身……

eng: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
chn: 真是不吉利，但我忍不住这么想。

eng: My thanks, for the aid given.
chn: ……承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

eng: I heard from Iji that Lady Ranni might have found herself a champion.
chn:
我有听伊吉提起，
说菈妮大人可能遇见了英雄，

eng: But I didn't know he was talking about you.
chn: 没想到那个人就是你吶。

eng: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
chn:
……有了你的帮忙，
我才得以实现以前的约定。

eng: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
chn: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

eng: My thanks, for the aid given.
chn: ……承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

eng: Always a pleasure to witness the festival champ put on a display.
chn: 祭典的勇士果然不是省油的灯。

eng: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
chn:
……有了你的帮忙，
我才得以实现以前的约定。

eng: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
chn: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

eng: My thanks, Tarnished, for the aid given.
chn: ……褪色者啊，承蒙拔刀相助，感激不尽。

eng: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
chn:
……有了你的帮忙，
我才得以实现以前的约定。

eng: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
chn: 这是聊表谢意的薄礼，拿着吧。

eng: Well, I must be leaving now.
chn: ……好啦，我要准备动身了。

eng: Brave warrior, if the fates deign it...
chn: 勇士啊，有缘……

eng: No, we shall indeed meet again, at the next glorious tourney.
chn: 不对，在下一次的盛大祭典再会吧。

eng: Well, I must be leaving now.
chn: ……好啦，我要准备动身了。

eng: If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.
chn: 有缘再见吧，褪色者。

eng: Ugh!
chn: 唔。

eng: What's the matter with you?
chn: ……发生什么事？

eng: You trying to get revenge?
chn: 难不成，你想复仇？

eng: Very well.
chn: ……也罢。

eng: If the Graven Witch put you under her spell, you must be eliminated...
chn: 既然一心向着魔女，迟早也会是卡利亚的敌人。

eng: Before you can pose a threat to Caria.
chn: 趁早斩除祸根吧。

eng: Rest now. Alongside the witch's corpse.
chn: ……陪着魔女的身体一起安眠吧……

eng: You...are a menace...
chn: ……你、很危险……

eng: Iji...beware...
chn: 当心啊，伊吉……

eng: Sellen, Graven Witch, enemy of Caria.
chn: ……“魔块魔女”瑟濂，卡利亚的敌对者啊。

eng: I vow this time to crush both your frame and your primal glintstone.
chn: 这一次，我会连同源辉石一起粉碎。

eng: I am Jerren, bringer of your death. Do not forget.
chn: 牢牢记住──我杰廉的存在，就代表你的死亡。

eng: You must be eliminated...
chn: 你迟早会是卡利亚的敌人。

eng: Hello... Hello...
chn: 那边那位……

eng: Please... Over here...
chn: 就是您……请来我身边……

eng: Hello... Hello...
chn: 那边那位……

eng: Right over here...
chn: 请来我这边……

eng: Hello.
chn: 您好，初次见面。

eng: It's rather chilly here, isn't it?
chn: 这附近有一点冷呢。

eng: My mistress sent me off on an errand...
chn: 我奉主人的命令，出外旅行……

eng: But I was accosted by a ruffian, and now I'm in a bind.
chn: 但是受到流氓攻击，正在发愁。

eng: Could I ask you lend a hand, perhaps?
chn: ……我能不能拜托您一件事？

eng: That thug made off with a precious necklace. I need someone to retrieve it.
chn:
刚才说的流氓，他拿走了我重要的项链，
想请您帮忙拿回来。

eng: I would be sure to provide ample reward.
chn: 当然，我会给出应有的谢礼。

eng: Only... He, too, is Tarnished.
chn: 只不过……他和您一样是褪色者，

eng: If you've any qualms confronting your own, I shall find another...
chn: 如果您不愿与同胞战斗，我也不会勉强……

eng: Ohh, thank you dearly.
chn: 啊，谢谢您。

eng: What a blessing that we've met like this.
chn: 我很庆幸能遇见您。

eng: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
chn: ……那位流氓可能在前面的空屋休息。

eng: Please, I must have the necklace back.
chn: 拜托了，请帮我把项链拿回来。

eng: Yes, I see. Most unfortunate, but I'll have to make do.
chn: ……这样啊。虽然遗憾，但也只能接受。

eng: I know that some Tarnished balk at the thought of harming their own.
chn: 我想也是有人不愿与同胞战斗。

eng: But if you should change your mind, do not hesitate to speak to me again.
chn: 如果您改变想法了，请再告诉我。

eng: Have you had a change of heart?
chn: 您改变想法了吗？

eng: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
chn: ……那位流氓可能在前面的空屋休息。

eng: Please, I must have the necklace back.
chn: 拜托了，请帮我把项链拿回来。

eng: Oh, yes, that is my missing necklace.
chn: 对，这的确是我被抢走的项链。

eng: Thank you kindly. I am in your debt.
chn: 谢谢，您是我的恩人。

eng: Did I forget to announce myself?
chn: ……我还没有自我介绍吧？

eng: I am Rya, in the service of Lady Tanith of the Volcano Manor.
chn: 我是菈雅，侍奉火山官邸的主人，塔妮丝大人。

eng: I seek stalwart Tarnished who might join our house.
chn:
邀请拥有英雄资质的褪色者前往官邸，
是我身为招募者的职责。

eng: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
chn: ……您很强，这不单指擅长战斗，

eng: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
chn: 您还拥有强韧的心，勇于和同胞刀剑相向。

eng: Such strength is precisely what my mistress seeks.
chn: 我的主人渴求的，就是这些特质。

eng: Please, take this.
chn: 请您收下此物。

eng: Brave Tarnished, seek the Altus Plateau, the realm of the Erdtree.
chn:
……拥有英雄资质的褪色者啊，
请您朝着黄金树大地的亚坛高原前进。

eng: Most Tarnished are doomed to wander the outskirts of the Lands Between, peering wistfully at the towering Erdtree...
chn:
受到赐福引导，却只能在交界地边陲徘徊，
眺望远方的黄金树……

eng: But you are no ordinary Tarnished. And once that is proven,
chn:
您绝对不是这种凡夫俗子。
只要您的强大获得证实，

eng: the Volcano Manor will fully extend its invitation. To fight, amongst a family of champions.
chn:
火山官邸肯定会正式邀请您，
成为并肩作战的英雄──成为族人。

eng: Ohh, and... One more thing, only for you...
chn: ……对了，还有……我个人想要告诉您一件事。

eng: This land of Liurnia is connected to the Altus Plateau by the Grand Lift of Dectus, beyond the High Road.
chn:
这个地方，利耶尼亚地区原本和亚坛高原，
能透过街道尽头的迪可达斯大升降机往来，

eng: But the lift has been defunct for an age, meaning there's no simple means of passage.
chn:
但是大升降梯已经很久没有运转，
道路也早就年久失修。

eng: Instead, you must seek the old ruins in the cliff.
chn: ……所以，请先去找出古遗迹断崖吧。

eng: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
chn:
那座古遗迹位在大升降梯旁的谷底，
是一座古老的坑道……

eng: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
chn:
听说是从利耶尼亚与亚坛高原，
两个方向共同开采而成的坑道。

eng: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
chn: ……您一定会是英雄，我相信您。

eng: I do hope that we can meet again.
chn: 期待下次与您相见。

eng: I've been waiting for you.
chn: 我等您很久了。

eng: I knew you had the stuff of champions.
chn: 果然和我说得一样，您就是英雄。

eng: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
chn: 我想正式邀请您前往火山官邸。

eng: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
chn: 请牵住我的手，会见我的主人吧。

eng: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
chn: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

eng: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
chn: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

eng: Very well.
chn: ……我知道了。

eng: Speak to me again once you are ready.
chn: 那么在您准备好之后，请告诉我。

eng: You will find me here.
chn: 我会在这里等您。

eng: Are you ready, then?
chn: 您准备好了吗？

eng: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
chn: 那么，我想正式邀请您前往火山官邸。

eng: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
chn: 请牵住我的手，会见我的主人吧。

eng: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
chn: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

eng: Give me your hand.
chn: ……那么，请把手交给我。

eng: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
chn: ……愿您与塔妮丝大人走在同一条路上，我衷心期盼。

eng: Hello... Hello...
chn: 那边那位……

eng: Right over here...
chn: 请来我这边……

eng: But I hardly hold him in high regard.
chn: ……但是我对他的印象，实在算不上太好。

eng: He seems to bear animosity toward the Volcano Manor.
chn: 我感觉得到，那个人的心中有着对火山官邸的敌意，

eng: Perhaps it is to be expected, only...
chn: 还有就是，我时不时会感觉到……

eng: his intent, while vicious, is also tenuous, as if his heart is not in it.
chn:
那敌意带有英勇的意念，
却又有股淡淡的，犹疑不定的味道。

eng: Doesn't really seem like champion material, to me...
chn: 这样的人有资格称为英雄吗……？

eng: Brave Tarnished, what is your business here?
chn: ……褪色者大人，您怎么会在这里？

eng: I'm afraid this is not a guest room.
chn: 各位的房间不是在这个方向……

eng: What's that peculiar look upon your face?
chn: ……为什么您的表情那么诧异？

eng: <gasp>
Goodness, am I still a serpent?
chn: 不会吧，我还维持着蛇的模样吗？

eng: Oh, how dreadful...
chn: 啊啊，怎么会……

eng: How dreadful indeed...
chn: 怎么会……

eng: Forgive my distress.
chn: ……对不起，我乱了方寸。

eng: I ought to be thanking you for treating me as usual, despite this appearance.
chn:
即使看到我的模样，
您待我依旧温暖，我太失礼了。

eng: Brave Tarnished.
chn: ……拥有英雄资质的褪色者啊，

eng: This is my true form. My real name is Zorayas.
chn:
这才是我真正的模样。
我真正的名字是泽菈雅丝。

eng: Please forgive the deception.
chn: 没有以真面目与您相见，我由衷致歉。

eng: Do understand. This duplicity is my own doing.
chn: 但是请您相信我，虚假的只有我本身。

eng: Lady Tanith speaks no falsehoods, and the Volcano Manor is just as it seems.
chn:
关于火山官邸，不对，不只这样，
还有塔妮丝大人说的一字一句，这些绝无虚假。

eng: Lady Tanith is my mother.
chn: ……塔妮丝大人是我的母亲。

eng: I am told I was born by the grace of a glorious king.
chn: 据说母亲受到伟大王者的恩宠，我因此诞生。

eng: That my mother cherishes this form I inhabit.
chn: 所以我这身模样，也是母亲喜悦的象征。

eng: I am proud of what I am.
chn: ……这模样是我的荣耀。

eng: But people are cruel. If they saw my true form, they wouldn't speak to me.
chn:
然而并不是所有人都这么认为──
如果展现蛇的模样，他们就不愿再听我说话。

eng: And so I assume a guise when seeking new recruits.
chn: 所以我才会伪装真面目，好善尽招募者的职责。

eng: But you are not like the rest.
chn: ……但是您和他们不一样呢。

eng: My serpentine form, and the name Zorayas,
chn: ……这身蛇的模样，还有泽菈雅丝这个名字，

eng: were secrets known only to Lady Tanith and I.
chn: 是我和塔妮丝大人之间的秘密。

eng: Now I share the secrets with you, as well.
chn: ……现在您也共享了这个秘密。

eng: Please keep them safe from anyone else.
chn: 这件事，请不要向他人张扬。

eng: Seek the old ruins in the cliff.
chn: ……请先去找出古遗迹断崖。

eng: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
chn:
那座古遗迹位在大升降梯旁的谷底，
是一座古老的坑道……

eng: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
chn:
听说是从利耶尼亚与亚坛高原，
两个方向共同开采而成的坑道。

eng: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
chn: ……您一定会是英雄，我相信您。

eng: I do hope that we can meet again.
chn: 期待下次与您相见。

eng: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

eng: As a scout, I am pleased to see you again here at the Volcano Manor.
chn: 能够在火山官邸与您相会，身为招募者喜不自胜。

eng: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
chn: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

eng: Have you ever...
chn: ……话说回来，褪色者大人……

eng: heard any strange sounds here at the manor?
chn: 您在这座官邸里，有没有听过奇怪的声音？

eng: Something beyond the walls, like breathing, or slithering scales...
chn:
那声音从墙壁另一侧传来，
还有类似呼吸声、鳞片摩擦的声音？

eng: Oh fie, what am I saying?
chn: ……抱歉，问了这么奇怪的问题。

eng: It just isn't possible. I must be tired.
chn: 怎么可能有这种事，应该是我太累了吧。

eng: Um, oh, it's you.
chn: ……啊，是您。

eng: Forgive me. My mind never ceases to churn of late.
chn: 不好意思，我正在想事情。

eng: Hmm, well...
chn: ……不，仔细一想，

eng: I know I can trust you...
chn: 还是和您说吧。

eng: I saw something, slithering in the pitch black of night.
chn: 我在晚上的时候，看到走廊上有蠕动的黑影……

eng: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
chn: 那黑影走进对面的房间之后，就没有出来了。

eng: If I'm not mistaken,
chn: 还有，如果我没有看错，

eng: it took the form of a serpent, just like me...
chn: 那黑影有着蛇的轮廓，和我一样。

eng: Does the Volcano Manor hide some secret,
chn: ……火山官邸有着我不知道的秘密……

eng: that Lady Tanith has kept from me?
chn: 塔妮丝大人到底对我隐瞒了什么？

eng: I realise that I shouldn't impose but,
chn: ……这件事情本来不该请求您，

eng: if you discover anything, would you please share?
chn: 但如果您有任何发现，能不能告诉我？

eng: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
chn: 那黑影走进隔壁的房间之后，就没有出来了。

eng: The serpent that lurked in the shadows that night...
chn: ……那天夜里出现的蛇形黑影……

eng: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
chn: 走进对面的房间之后就没有出来。

eng: Perhaps the manor yet holds some secrets.
chn: ……火山官邸可能有着我不知道的秘密。

eng: If you discover anything, would you please share?
chn: 如果您有任何发现，能不能告诉我？

eng: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
chn: 走进隔壁的房间之后就没有出来。

eng: Really...
chn: ……原来是这样。

eng: Oh, so there was a secret after all...
chn: 果真有秘密啊……

eng: Oh my...
chn: 啊啊……

eng: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
chn: 塔妮丝大人──母亲她对我说了谎……

eng: Was I not...
chn: 那么，我真的是……

eng: born by the grace of a king?
chn: 因为母亲受到恩宠而诞生的吗？

eng: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

eng: It is a shame that I did not beckon you here with my own hand,
chn: 无法亲自邀请您前来火山官邸，虽然略感遗憾……

eng: but I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
chn: 但能够在此与您相会，我依旧喜不自胜。

eng: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
chn: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

eng: Hello again. Brave Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者大人，好久不见了。

eng: Do you remember me? I am Rya. We spoke once in Liurnia.
chn:
您还记得吗？我是菈雅。
我们曾经在利耶尼亚交谈过一次。

eng: I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
chn: 能够在火山官邸与您相会，实在喜不自胜。

eng: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
chn: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

eng: A pleasure to meet you. Brave Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者大人，初次见面，您好。

eng: I am Rya, the scout. Very pleased to welcome you to the Volcano Manor.
chn:
我是“招募者”菈雅。
能够在火山官邸见到您，我深感荣幸。

eng: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
chn: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

eng: Brave Tarnished.
chn: ……褪色者大人。

eng: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
chn: 请您与塔妮丝大人同行，走在英雄的路上。

eng: Sometimes I hear strange sounds beyond the walls.
chn: 我曾经听过墙壁另一侧传来奇怪的声音。

eng: Like breathing, or slithering scales.
chn: 也有类似呼吸声、鳞片摩擦的声音。

eng: Oh, perhaps I'm just feeling tired.
chn: ……应该是我太累了吧。

eng: Hmm, what is this?
chn: ……这是什么？

eng: I remember this scent, distinctly.
chn: 有一股非常怀念的味道……

eng: Funny, isn't it.
chn: ……啊，真不可思议。

eng: I am certain of it. I was born inside this.
chn: 我明白了，这是我出生的地方……

eng: It's a part of my birth mother.
chn: 是生母的一部分。

eng: You have my gratitude.
chn: ……谢谢您。

eng: Thanks to you, I am no longer afraid.
chn: 多亏有您的帮忙，我终于下定决心。

eng: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
chn:
我想知道自己的出身，
也想知道是如何与塔妮丝大人相遇。

eng: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
chn:
……还有，我想要打从心底，
再一次称呼那位大人“母亲”。

eng: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
chn: 塔妮丝大人──母亲她对我说了谎……

eng: Was I not...
chn: 那么，我真的是……

eng: born by the grace of a king?
chn: 因为母亲受到恩宠而诞生的吗？

eng: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
chn:
我想知道自己的出身，
也想知道是如何与塔妮丝大人相遇……

eng: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
chn:
……还有，我想要打从心底，
再一次称呼那位大人“母亲”。

eng: Oh, it's you...
chn: 啊，是您……

eng: I'm afraid... there is something I must tell you.
chn: ……对了……我是该知会您。

eng: I was an unwanted child. Born not of grace, but of a hideous ritual.
chn:
我是被抛弃的孩子，并不是生于恩宠，
而是生自可怖仪式的孩子。

eng: Something that can never be accepted, not by men, nor serpents.
chn: 那种存在不见容于人类，也不见容于蛇……

eng: Even Lady Tanith shouldn't accept me.
chn: 更不该被塔妮丝大人所接受……

eng: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
chn: ……您很强，这不单指擅长战斗，

eng: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
chn: 您还拥有强韧的心，勇于和同胞刀剑相向。

eng: I know that you have done so much for me.
chn: ……我向您提过许多无理的请求，

eng: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
chn: 但拜托您，这是最后一次了。

eng: Kill me, please.
chn: 请您杀了我。

eng: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
chn: 我自认下定决心了，但是……

eng: Free me from this accursed frame.
chn: 请让我摆脱这副受诅咒的身躯，获得自由。

eng: Agh...
chn: 呜……呜呜……

eng: Thank you... My champion...
chn: 谢谢您……我的英雄……

eng: Mother...
chn: 母亲……

eng: I'm to drink this, then?
chn: ……喝下这个就可以了吗？

eng: Yes, of course. You always were very kind.
chn: ……我明白了，您真的很温柔。

eng: Ahh... How delightfully sweet...
chn: 啊……好甜……

eng: And yet...
chn: 可是，好像……

eng: I know that you have done so much for me.
chn: ……我向您提过许多无理的请求，

eng: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
chn: 但拜托您，这是最后一次了。

eng: Kill me, please.
chn: 请您杀了我。

eng: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
chn: 我自认下定决心了，但是……

eng: Free me from this accursed frame.
chn: 请让我摆脱这副受诅咒的身躯，获得自由。

eng: You're not willing to kill me, are you.
chn: ……无论如何，您都不愿意动手杀了我。

eng: Hah...
chn: 呵呵……

eng: You've always been so kind. And uncompromising.
chn: 您一直以来都很温暖……却也非常地严格呢。

eng: I suppose I knew in my heart of hearts.
chn: ……我可能早就知道了。

eng: How kind, and uncompromising, you always were.
chn: 您一直以来都很温暖……却也非常地严格。

eng: Oh, it's you.
chn: ……啊，是您。

eng: Heaven knows what happened here,
chn: 我还不清楚发生了什么事。

eng: but Lady Tanith, and all the Tarnished champions, are gone.
chn:
塔妮丝大人，拥有英雄资质的所有褪色者，
全都消失不见了。

eng: It feels rather quiet without them.
chn: ……让人感到有些寂寥。

eng: But with you here, things will be just fine.
chn: 但是您还在，我就放心了。

eng: I await Lady Tanith.
chn: 我要等塔妮丝大人回来。

eng: I am her daughter, born by the grace of a great king.
chn: 身为母亲与伟大王者，因为恩宠诞生的女儿……

eng: I do not wish to burden her, or cause concern.
chn: 我不希望擅自行动，造成困扰、让人担心。

eng: Brave Tarnished. Do tread the path of valour.
chn: 褪色者大人，请您走在英雄的路上。

eng: I'm certain that this is what Lady Tanith wishes.
chn: 塔妮丝大人肯定也是如此期盼。

eng: Please, stop, Brave Tarnished.
chn: 褪色者大人，请住手。

eng: You will only tire by striking this barrier.
chn: 攻击防护障壁对您没有好处。

eng: Besides, I am no foe of yours.
chn: 我绝对不是敌人。

eng: Please, think this over.
chn: 拜托您，请停下来。

eng: I see that you have reconsidered.
chn: ……您冷静下来了吗？

eng: Thank goodness.
chn: 太好了……

eng: Ah, hello. You must be new here.
chn: 哦，我没看过你。
我的名字是……

eng: Well, just call me Diallos.
chn: 嗯，叫我狄亚罗斯就好。

eng: The honor of one's house holds little import in these lands.
chn: 在交界地讲出再响亮的姓氏，也没有意义。

eng: By the way, have you met a young woman named Lanya on your travels?
chn:
话说回来，有事相问。
你有见过名叫勒妮亚的女孩吗？

eng: She's my servant, but fickle as the wind.
chn: 她是我的随从，但很随心情做事，

eng: Take your eyes off her for but a moment and she's good as gone.
chn: 常常一转眼就不见人影。

eng: If you find her, please be sure to tell me.
chn: 如果你有看到人，能不能告诉我？

eng: Be sure to tell me if you meet a young woman named Lanya.
chn: 如果你看到名叫勒妮亚的女孩，麻烦告诉我。

eng: She's a servant to my house.
chn: 她是我的随从。

eng: She's been my companion since childhood.
chn: 我们从小一起长大，

eng: I've lost count of the number of times I've had to find her like this.
chn: 已经懒得数这是第几次找人了。

eng: Honestly, she's such a little tomboy.
chn: 真受不了那失控的家伙。

eng: Lanya... Lanya...
chn: 勒妮亚……勒妮亚……

eng: It's me, Diallos. Answer me, would you?
chn: 是我，狄亚罗斯，听到就回应一声吧……

eng: Hello, friend. Tell me if you know, would you.
chn: ……如果你知道的话，麻烦告诉我，

eng:
The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.
The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
chn:
叛律者──狩猎同胞的褪色者，
那群卑劣鼠辈的藏身处在哪？

eng:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
chn:
那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，
我要让他们受到应有的报应。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

eng: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
chn: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

eng: Ah, you again, is it?
chn: 是你啊。

eng: The recusants sent a lackey.
chn: 叛律者的使者找过我了，

eng:
Can you believe they invited me to join them?
Now! After what they did...
chn: 他们竟然还想找我入伙……

eng: I can scarcely believe it myself. Do they think me a fool?
chn: 说什么鬼话！认为我是无能之辈吗！

eng: You might be surprised to learn I took them up on the offer.
chn: ……不过，我还是故意答应他们的邀请，

eng: Then I only had to ask. The location of the recusant hideout.
chn: 因此打听到那群叛律者的藏身处。

eng:
It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads west
from the town of windmills.
chn: 从风车镇的旧道路往西走一段距离后，会到格密尔火山，

eng: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
chn: 那群家伙躲在山顶的官邸里。

eng: Just you wait, wretched recusants.
chn: ……卑劣的叛律者，给我脖子洗干净等着。

eng: You'll rue the day you insulted my name by laying hands on Lanya.
chn:
对勒妮亚动手，侮辱我狄亚罗斯，
我肯定要让你们悔不当初。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”。

eng: Who on earth are you?
chn: ……你是什么人？

eng: Hmph, never mind. But tell me if you know, would you.
chn:
算了，是谁不重要。
如果你知道的话，麻烦告诉我，

eng:
The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.
The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
chn:
叛律者──狩猎同胞的褪色者，
那群卑劣鼠辈的藏身处在哪？

eng:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
chn:
那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，
我要让他们受到应有的报应。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

eng: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
chn: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

eng:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
chn:
……那群人对我的随从勒妮亚动手，
我要让他们受到应有的报应。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”──

eng: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
chn: 我狄亚罗斯会让他们切身体会。

eng:
It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads west
from the town of windmills.
chn: ……从风车镇的旧道路往西走一段距离后，会到格密尔火山，

eng: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
chn: 那群家伙躲在山顶的官邸里。

eng: Just you wait, wretched recusants.
chn: ……卑劣的叛律者，给我脖子洗干净等着。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”。

eng: Ah. Oh... I-it's you, is it?
chn: 啊、啊……是你……

eng: Well. Nice to see you again.
chn: 嗯，好久不见了。

eng: So you've been invited as well, I see.
chn: 你也受到邀请啦？

eng:
Then we're comrades in arms, henceforth.
You watch my back, and I'll watch yours, yes?
chn: 这么一来，我们就是同伴了。再请多关照。

eng: I, um, I can tell... You're wondering about Lanya...
chn: ……嗯，我知道你想说什么，关于勒妮亚的事情吧？

eng: Well, you see, I...
chn: 嗯，不过我……

eng: After much internal debate, I've come to realise...
chn: 决定不复仇了。

eng: Revenge is not the answer.
chn: 这是我苦苦思索后，得到的答案……

eng: According to Lady Tanith...
chn: 据塔妮丝女士所说……

eng: I've got the stuff of champions.
chn: 我有走上成为英雄之路的资质。

eng: And champions, ironic as it is, are oft forced to walk a tainted path.
chn: 还有真正的英雄会刻意挑污秽不洁的路走。

eng: It hit me like a bolt from the blue...
chn: ……听完之后，我感到茅塞顿开。

eng: That my former thoughts were simple naiveté.
chn: 啊，这就是我没做好心理准备的地方。

eng: Of course, my heart weeps for Lanya.
chn: 当然我也认为勒妮亚很可怜，

eng: That unfortunate incident was a cruel twist of fate indeed.
chn: 她的下场实在可悲又残酷。

eng:
But succumbing to the pain and sadness caused won't
make me a champion, will it.
chn:
只是被那“可悲”、“残酷”的感受影响，
我就无法成为英雄。

eng: Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both.
chn:
所以勒妮亚一定也能谅解，
明白这是我和她的命运。

eng: But such is true of any road trod by champions.
chn: 这就是所谓的英雄之路啊。

eng: I always resented these hands.
chn: ……我一直被瞧不起。

eng: Their pale complexion, a far cry from any warrior's. The shame of House Hoslow.
chn:
这双白净的手，没有战士该有的样子……
我被认为是霍斯劳的耻辱。

eng: But that won't be the case for long.
chn: 所以我很期待──

eng: They'll be darkened by grit, once I've set out on the path of champions.
chn: 有机会玷污这双手，走上英雄之路。

eng: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
chn: ……“霍斯劳以血代言”。

eng: Ah, it's you, is it.
chn: ……是你啊。

eng: I'm terribly sorry, but would you mind giving me some time to myself?
chn: 抱歉，能不能让我静一静……？

eng: I haven't achieved anything at all thus far.
chn: 我又成不了任何事，

eng: Even though I've dirtied my hands time and time again.
chn: 这双手已经玷污了一次，又一次，

eng: I'm still yet to achieve anything.
chn: 但我还是一事无成。

eng: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
chn: 我真的只是一介无能之辈吗……？

eng:
No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on the
path of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
chn:
不对，还要更糟。
我放弃复仇，也让家族蒙羞，

eng: What an easy mark I must have been...
chn: 只是一个不知耻的蠢货……

eng: How did it take me so long to realise, honestly...
chn: 怎么没有早一点察觉呢……

eng: There's just no end to my foolishness, is there...
chn: 自己真是无能至极……

eng: It's just as my noble brother says.
chn: ……唉，哥哥，你说得对。

eng:
I'm a complete fool. I can't believe I thought I could become
a champion.
chn: 我无能至极，根本不该妄想成为英雄……

eng: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
chn: ……我真的只是一介无能之辈吗……？

eng:
No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on the
path of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
chn:
不对，还要更糟。
我放弃复仇，也让家族蒙羞，

eng: What an easy mark I must have been...
chn: 只是一个不知耻的蠢货……

eng: Well. Aren't you full of beans.
chn: 哼……你精神不错嘛……

eng: No wonder you're covered in muck.
chn: 怪不得弄得那么脏。

eng: Oh? My friend, it's been far too long.
chn: ……嗯？好久没看到你了。

eng: I have to say you caught me at a rather low point.
chn: 抱歉让你看到这副窘样。

eng: But...as you see, I've put all that behind me.
chn: ……对，没错，我逃出来了。

eng:
Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now.
Making my own choices.
chn:
离开火山官邸了……更准确一点，
是逃离所有曾选择，曾决心去做的任何事。

eng: Even a fool like me can look after some simple jars.
chn: 即使像我一样无能，也有办法照顾壶。

eng:
Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first time
in my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
chn:
你认为我很可悲吗？
可是直到现在，我才感觉到自己活着。

eng: A fool I may be, but I can look after some simple jars.
chn: ……即使像我一样无能，也有办法照顾壶。

eng:
Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first time
in my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
chn:
你认为我很可悲吗？
可是直到现在，我才感觉到自己活着。

eng: ...Ah, you...
Are the jars...they alright?
chn: 壶都没事吧……？

eng: Did I defend them?
chn: 我有成功保护他们吗……？

eng: Then all is well...
chn: ……这样啊，好险……

eng: This fool proved his worth, in the end...
chn: 我这无能的人，也能在最后……

eng: Ha...ha ha...
chn: 哈哈、哈哈哈……

eng: I see... I see...
chn: 是吗？我想也是……

eng: I've been a fool...to the last...
chn: 我这无能至极……

eng: Agh!
chn: 唔。

eng: What on earth was that for!
chn: 你做什么！

eng: Now I see. You're a wretched recusant!
chn: ……原来，你是叛律者吗！

eng: May you rue the day that you thought to trample me!
chn: 侮辱我狄亚罗斯，我肯定要让你悔不当初！

eng: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”！

eng: In blood!
chn: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

eng: Lanya, your honour has been restored.
chn: ……勒妮亚，我替你报仇了。

eng: As a charge of House Hoslow, you can rest easy.
chn: 你不用再担心了。

eng: Ha ha...ha...
chn: ……哈哈。

eng: I am the shame of House Hoslow after all...
chn: 我真的只是霍斯劳的耻辱……

eng: Ugh!
chn: 唔。

eng: What's the matter? Please, stop!
chn: 你怎么了？住手吧！

eng: I've no quarrel with the Volcano Manor.
chn: 我不打算与火山官邸为敌，

eng: I will never brandish a sword again, I swear!
chn: 我已经不再拿剑了！

eng: Why on earth...?
chn: ……你，为什么……

eng: Wait, you're a poacher, aren't you?
chn: 你是盗猎者吗？

eng: I'll turn my back on duty no more.
chn: 那么，我不会再逃了。

eng: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
chn: “霍斯劳以血代言”！

eng: In blood!
chn: 唔喔喔喔喔喔！

eng: Unharmed, thank the stars.
chn: ……勉强守住了。

eng: Ahh, just what I deserve...
chn: ……啊，这是报应吗？

eng: For absconding from my duties...
chn: 因为我逃离一切……

eng: I'm sorry, my dear jars...
chn: 对不起啊，壶……

eng: Tarnished, are we? A wonder you should turn up here.
chn: ……哦，是褪色者啊？难得有这么稀奇的客人。

eng: I am Sellen, a sorcerer, quite plainly.
chn: 我名为瑟濂，如你所见，是一名魔法师……

eng: Why are you here?
chn: 那么，有何贵干？

eng: Ahh, a yen for glintstone sorceries?
chn: ……哦，你想学习辉石魔法？

eng: Well, your aptitude does appear...passable.
chn: 看起来的确有最基本的资质……

eng: But one must choose one's masters wisely.
chn: 然而拜师要慎选对象──

eng: I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria,
chn: 我被逐出雷亚卢卡利亚学院，

eng: as a reviled, apostate witch.
chn: 是众人避之唯恐不及，所谓的异端魔女。

eng: Do you still wish to learn from me?
chn: 即使如此，你还坚持拜师吗？

eng: Well, you are a piece of work.
chn: ……哈，你真是怪人。

eng: Very well. You are now my protégé in glintstone sorcery.
chn: 好吧，我愿意收你为徒，传授辉石魔法。

eng: But I refuse to coddle. Or cast kind words. Never.
chn: 但我很严格，不走温和教导那一套。

eng: Anticipate grievances, young apprentice.
chn: 可别后悔啊。

eng: Really.
chn: ……是吗？

eng: It's not every day I meet a Tarnished just milling about.
chn: 褪色者还真是奇特，没有事也会找人攀谈。

eng: What is it now? Why are you here again?
chn: 怎么了？不是没有事吗？

eng: You are quite the enigma, aren't you...
chn: 你真的很奇特……

eng: I dare say your proclivities are far from ideal...
chn: 但老实说，我不认为你能学好辉石魔法……

eng: Oh well, perhaps nurture will defy nature, with a bit of luck.
chn: 学习魔法并不是只看资质。

eng: Yes, I think that would be wise.
chn: 嗯，这样比较妥当。

eng: We must choose our masters wisely.
chn: 拜师要慎选对象啊。

eng: Well? Have you made up your mind?
chn: 怎么样？考虑清楚了吗？

eng: Young apprentice. First things first.
chn: 徒弟啊，第一步该做的是“理解”。

eng: You are a tadpole when it comes to magic. Infantile. Without the legs to walk.
chn:
你在魔法的领域还是个婴儿，
极度不成熟，甚至连路都不会走。

eng: So, to become a sorcerer, first, you must face your ignorance.
chn: 然而认知到自己不成熟，才能成为魔法师……

eng: Now, shall we start learning?
chn: 我们开始上课吧。

eng: There you are, my apprentice.
chn: 徒弟啊，你来了。

eng: Shall we commence the lesson?
chn: 我们开始上课吧。

eng: You wish to continue the lesson?
chn: 还想继续上课吗？

eng: Very well, I have time aplenty.
chn: 我乐意奉陪。

eng: Our art draws upon the powers embedded in glintstone.
chn: 辉石魔法是找出辉石内的力量，并加以施展的魔法。

eng: But what is the nature of such power?
chn: 你可能会疑问：那股力量是从何而来？

eng: Glintstone is the amber of the cosmos.
chn: ……所谓的辉石，就是由星星形成的琥珀。

eng: Golden amber contains the remnants of ancient life, and houses its vitality,
chn: 金色琥珀蕴含古老生命碎屑拥有的力量，

eng: while glintstone contains residual life, and thus the vitality of the stars.
chn: 以此类推，辉石也蕴含星星生命碎屑所拥有的力量。

eng: It should not be forgotten,
chn: 你要记好：

eng: that glintstone sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
chn: 辉石魔法意在探索星星以及星星的生命。

eng: A fact lost on most sorcerers, these days...
chn: 现下有一群不入流的魔法师，根本忘记这一点。

eng: Your appetite for learning is impressive.
chn: ……你真好学。

eng: You make me proud. To have grown little legs so readily.
chn: 我的徒弟真不简单，这么快就开始学走路了。

eng: You must have a fabulous teacher.
chn: 但也多亏为师教导有方啊。

eng: Hmm? What's on your mind?
chn: ……怎么了，你想说什么？

eng: Well, well...
Seluvis is not a name I ever wanted to hear again...
chn: 赛尔维斯──又让我想起这讨人厌的名字。

eng: But, fine. If it will help you, my apprentice, I offer my knowledge.
chn: ……好吧，既然能帮到你，我知无不言，言无不尽。

eng: The stars alter the fate of the Carian royal family. And the fate of your mistress, Ranni.
chn:
卡利亚王室的命运会随着星星变动──
这点连你侍奉的菈妮也不例外，

eng: But long ago, General Radahn challenged the swirling constellations, and in a crushing victory, arrested their cycles.
chn:
然而当拉塔恩将军击碎星星流转的定律，
固有的流转戛然而止……

eng: Now, he is the force that repulses the stars.
chn: 那个男人本身就是星星的封印。

eng: If General Radahn were to die, the stars would resume their movement.
chn: 只要拉塔恩将军死亡，星星又会开始流转，

eng: And so, too, would Ranni's destiny.
chn: 当然菈妮的命运也是。

eng: My apprentice, what happened to your nail?
chn: ……徒弟啊，你的手指怎么了？

eng: Perhaps you have a different view, but...
chn: 我是不知道你怎么想，

eng: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
chn: 但那是用来监视你、支配你的印记，堪称恶意的化身。

eng: May I remove it for you?
chn: 我来替你解除吧？

eng: A wise choice. Let me neutralize it.
chn: ……你听懂了啊，立刻来解咒吧。

eng: But first...
chn: 但在那之前……

eng: Listen up, wretched curse-peddler.
chn: 咒印之主啊，你有在听吧？

eng: This is a vile craft in which you engage.
chn: 胆敢做出这种行为，真是瞧不起人啊。

eng: Let it be known.
chn: 给我记好了，

eng: This is the beloved apprentice of Sellen, Graven Witch.
chn: 这个人是我“魔块魔女”瑟濂的爱徒，

eng: I set a curse upon you and your meddling hand.
chn: 诓骗他的罪行，足以构成受我诅咒的理由。

eng: Your death will not be a pleasant one.
chn: 别以为你能死得痛快。

eng: May you shudder between breaths in your sleep...
chn: ……尽管怕得夜不成眠吧。

eng: If you prefer not, that is your prerogative.
chn: ……既然你拒绝，我也不再多说。

eng: But let it be known.
chn: 但是你要记得，

eng: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
chn: 那是用来监视你、支配你的恶意化身。

eng: If what I have told you one day rings true,
chn: 如果你愿意听进我的话……

eng: by all means, come to me again.
chn: 记得，随时来找我。

eng: What's this sorcery, my apprentice?
chn: ……哦，那魔法……

eng: Ah, then you have seen Master Azur.
chn: 徒弟啊，你见到亚兹勒大师了吧？

eng: Master Azur was a founding glintstone sorcerer, and my first teacher.
chn: 亚兹勒大师是辉石魔法的创始者，也是我的第一位师父。

eng: A stern judge of men, but he must see something in you.
chn: 那位严格闻名的亚兹勒认同你了。

eng: You make us both proud.
chn: 这可不是件简单的事。

eng: We can speak more later, my apprentice.
chn: ……徒弟啊，等会儿好好聊一聊吧。

eng: If you recall, I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
chn:
我曾提过自己被逐出雷亚卢卡利亚学院，
你还记得吧？

eng: It was for attempting to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
chn: 背后的原因，是因为我想要复兴辉石魔法的起源。

eng: The toothless pedantry peddled by the Carian royal family can rot for all I care.
chn:
不是那个受卡利亚王室摆布，
失去核心、只懂得卖弄的学问，

eng: I want glintstone sorceries that open our minds, unbound by terrestrial taboos.
chn:
我所追求的是毫无禁忌，
有着纯粹探索精神的辉石魔法。

eng: No matter what we give in return.
chn: ……为了实现愿望，我不惜牺牲一切。

eng: My apprentice. I presume nothing.
chn: 徒弟啊，我不强求。

eng: Teacher and student are not bound to tread the same path.
chn: 即使分道扬镳，也是师徒间的常态。

eng: But hear me out, my apprentice.
chn: 在这前提下，我想拜托你：

eng: I need your help to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
chn:
复兴辉石魔法起源──
这件事你愿意出一份力吗？

eng: Perhaps this is a journey we could take together?
chn: ……愿意和我共同努力吗？

eng: Splendid. I thank you.
chn: ……这样啊，谢谢你。

eng: This pleases me. It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
chn: 很久没有遇见志同道合的人了，我很高兴。

eng: You must have a fabulous teacher.
chn: ……肯定是为师教导有方吧。

eng: Forgive me, it was an outlandish idea to begin with.
chn: ……抱歉，拜托你这种诡异的事情。

eng: And I fear quite presumptuous of me, as well.
chn: 我可能太过依赖你了。

eng: Don't give it another thought, my apprentice.
chn: 徒弟啊，忘了这件事吧。抱歉了。

eng: Really? My apprentice.
chn: ……徒弟啊，你真的愿意？

eng: You must have given this quite some thought.
chn: 原来你一直在考虑吗？

eng: Splendid. I thank you. This pleases me.
chn: 啊，谢谢你，我很高兴。

eng: It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
chn: 很久没有遇见志同道合的人了……

eng: There you are, my apprentice.
chn: 徒弟啊，你来了。

eng: Shall we commence the lesson?
chn: 我们开始上课吧。

eng: You wish to resume the lesson?
chn: 还想继续上课吗？

eng: Indeed, that would be the wiser option.
chn: 继续上课的确比较好。

eng: I need your help, my apprentice.
chn: 徒弟啊，有事需要你的帮助。

eng: Master Lusat is another founding glintstone sorcerer.
chn:
辉石魔法创始者共有两位，
另外一位是卢瑟特大师。

eng: And like Master Azur, he was banished from the academy. Now he languishes, imprisoned somewhere.
chn: 他和亚兹勒大师一样被逐出学院，幽禁在某处。

eng: My apprentice, can you find Master Lusat?
chn: 徒弟啊，能不能去找出卢瑟特大师？

eng: With this glintstone key, you should be able to cross the boundary that encloses him.
chn:
只要有这把辉石钥匙，
应该就能穿过囚禁大师的那道障璧。

eng: I need him to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
chn:
想要复兴辉石魔法的起源，
我们需要卢瑟特大师──

eng: He's nigh a child of the stars, such is his body now...
chn: 尤其是那副最为接近星之子的身体……

eng: After his expulsion from the academy, I heard that Master Lusat returned to his home.
chn:
我听说卢瑟特大师被学院放逐之后，
就回到了自己的故乡──

eng: A place called Sellia, in the eastern Caelid Wilds.
chn: 那位在盖利德原野东方的瑟利亚镇。

eng: Thinking about it, I obtained the glintstone key I gave you from a Sellian sorcerer.
chn:
……刚才拿给你的那把辉石钥匙，
原本的持有人是来自瑟利亚的魔法师。

eng: It wouldn't be too much of a leap to suppose he's still cooped up nearby...
chn: 我想大师可能就被囚禁在那座小镇附近……

eng: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
chn: ……原来卢瑟特大师在那种地方……

eng: You have my gratitude. This is all your work.
chn: 谢谢，这件事肯定只有你才能办到。

eng: I am truly pleased to have you as an apprentice, and a kindred spirit.
chn: 我很庆幸能收你当徒弟，有你这位知己。

eng: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
chn: 这是一点谢礼，收下吧。

eng: This brings us a full step closer.
chn: 这么一来，我们又前进了一步。

eng: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the Academy.
chn:
亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师──
这么一来，就能随时将他们的身体接回学院。

eng: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
chn: ……只要没有那个可恨的制约……

eng: This brings us a full step closer.
chn: 这么一来，我们又前进了一步。

eng: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the academy.
chn:
亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师──
这么一来，就能随时将他们的身体接回学院。

eng: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
chn: ……只要没有那个可恨的制约……

eng: My apprentice. Give me a moment later.
chn: ……徒弟啊，等等有话要说。

eng: I have a favour to ask.
chn: 不好意思，又有事需要你的帮忙。

eng: The form you see before you is merely a projection.
chn: ……目前在你眼前说话的我，是幻象。

eng: My body lies elsewhere. But the academy's shackles prevent it being moved.
chn: 我的身体在别的地方，因为学院的制约动弹不得。

eng: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
chn: 我的身体在交界地南方的啜泣半岛，

eng: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
chn:
穿越有灵庙漫步的平原后，
玛莉卡教堂下方的一座废墟里。

eng: Can you make the journey to my body?
chn: 徒弟啊，你能不能到那里一趟？

eng: I have something that I can only trust with you.
chn: 我有物品想要交给你保管。

eng: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
chn: 我的身体在交界地南方的啜泣半岛，

eng: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
chn:
穿越有灵庙漫步的平原后，
玛莉卡教堂下方的一座废墟里。

eng: Can you make the journey to my body?
chn: 徒弟啊，你能不能到那里一趟？

eng: I have something that I can only trust with you.
chn: 我有物品想要交给你保管。

eng: My apprentice, thank you for coming.
chn: 徒弟啊，一路辛苦了。

eng: These shackles take a toll on us all.
chn: 都因为制约，让你费了点工夫。

eng: There is something I need you to look after.
chn: ……这物品想交给你保管。

eng: My primal glintstone.
chn: 收下我的源辉石吧。

eng: A star has fallen, and my fortunes waver.
chn: ……当星星坠落，我的命运也开始运转。

eng: Someone may come for my life. And so, I entrust it with you.
chn:
我可能会被杀。
所以在事情发生以前，先把这交给你──

eng: My self.
chn: 这就是我。

eng: <groaning in pain>
<panting>
Thank you...my apprentice...
chn: 徒弟啊……谢谢你……

eng: This...is my essence. Please, treat it with care.
chn: 那就是我……万事拜托了……

eng: <shivering moans>
It will do no good, I swear it...
chn: ……再怎么做都是徒劳……

eng: ...and yet you persist, you frothing degenerates...
chn: ……真不厌其烦啊，一群心理变态……

eng: A...argh!
chn: 啊！啊啊啊……

eng: <shivering moans>
Treat it with care, my apprentice...
chn: ……徒弟啊，万事拜托了……

eng: What you hold is my very being...
chn: ……那就是我……

eng: My apprentice, just how long has it been?
chn: ……徒弟啊，好久没见到你了。

eng: Thank you. You've helped me fill a new body, once again.
chn: 谢谢，幸亏有你，我又获得了新的身体。

eng: And it's truly a gem. Young and full of vigor, a snug fit for my Primal Glintstone.
chn: 这个身体很不错──既年轻又健康，与源辉石很契合。

eng: Better still, I've shed those awful shackles.
chn: ……而且那可恨的制约已不复存在。

eng: Finally, I can return to the academy.
chn: 我终于能够回去学院了──

eng: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
chn: 能够回去废除卡利亚王室，复兴起源了。

eng: My dear apprentice, I owe this all to you.
chn: 徒弟啊，这全都是你的功劳……

eng: Finally, I can return to the academy.
chn: 我终于能够回去学院了──

eng: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
chn: 能够回去废除卡利亚王室，复兴起源了。

eng: My apprentice, shall we commence the lesson?
chn: ……徒弟啊，要开始上课吗？

eng: As thanks for procuring this new form, I'll be holding you to a higher standard.
chn:
机会难得，这次课程会比较难。
当作是帮忙获得新身体的谢礼。

eng: You wish to resume the lesson?
chn: 还想继续上课吗？

eng: Have I not been strict enough, I wonder?
chn: ……难道课程不够难吗？

eng: Ahh, my apprentice.
chn: ……啊，徒弟啊。

eng: You've saved my skin once again.
chn: 我又受到了你的帮助。

eng: Do you see this? The Queen of Caria is no more.
chn: 看啊，卡利亚女王不存在了。

eng: With the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat returned, the academy can hone the primeval current.
chn:
亚兹勒大师、卢瑟特大师的身体也接回学院，
这么一来，学院就有办法全然领会起源。

eng: So that we, fallen children of the stars, shall beam with brilliance once again.
chn:
总有一天，我们这群弃子
也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

eng: My apprentice. Will you stay with us, here at the academy?
chn: 徒弟啊，可能的话，希望你继续留在学院……

eng: Oh, I know it's not possible.
chn: 但我清楚，这无法如愿。

eng: You have your own calling. To be the next Elden Lord.
chn: 因为你有自己的使命──要当上艾尔登之王。

eng: But do think of me.
chn: 只是希望你记得──

eng: Of your teacher. On the eve of your crowning.
chn: 即使成为王，我还是你的师父；

eng: You will always be my darling pupil.
chn: 你还是我心爱的徒弟。

eng: Rest assured that I...
No, the entire academy, will swear allegiance to the new monarch.
chn: 不对，我们学院会对新王宣示效忠。

eng: My apprentice. Become Elden Lord.
chn: 徒弟啊，当上艾尔登之王吧。

eng: Hmm, perhaps I'm jumping ahead,
chn: ……可能心急了一点，

eng: but here is a symbol of my allegiance, and the academy's.
chn: 这是我和学院表示忠诚的证明。

eng: Do you recall what once I told you?
chn: ……我之前曾经教过你：

eng: That glintstone is the amber of the cosmos, and sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
chn:
辉石是星星形成的琥珀，
辉石魔法是在探索星星与星星的生命。

eng: When you become Elden Lord, please illuminate me.
chn: 等你当上艾尔登之王，再反过来教我吧──

eng: Lay bare the secrets of life which course the Elden Ring.
chn: 艾尔登法环潜藏了什么样的生命奥秘。

eng: Next time, I will be your student.
chn: 我很期待那一刻到来。

eng: Oh, one last thing.
chn: 对了，还有啊，

eng: If you fail to claim your throne,
chn: 如果你没能当上王，

eng: you can always pay me a visit.
chn: 就回来我身边吧。

eng: Oh, don't fret. Even my dullest pupils will always have a place here.
chn:
……别担心，即使徒弟不成材，
还是会准备个地方让他待着啊。

eng: What is it? My apprentice.
chn: 徒弟啊，怎么了？

eng: Ahh, I am glad to see you. My apprentice.
chn: 啊，徒弟啊，你来了。

eng: Would you like a lesson? I'm always glad to further your education.
chn:
要上课吗？
你要上课，我随时欢迎。

eng: It warms my heart. That you still think of me.
chn:
哦，真高兴。
看来这件事你一直放在心上。

eng: Yet I still yearn, for you to find Master Lusat.
chn: 对，没错，希望你帮忙找出卢瑟特大师。

eng: His body is needed. At the academy, to hone the primeval current...
chn: 学院要全然领会起源，大师的身体不可或缺……

eng: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
chn: ……原来卢瑟特大师在那种地方……

eng: Oh, this is wonderful news. Now, his body will be brought home.
chn:
啊，实在太棒了。
这么一来就能接回大师的身体了。

eng: And when the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat are together, the academy can hone the primeval current.
chn:
有了亚兹勒大师与卢瑟特大师的身体，
学院肯定能全然领会起源。

eng: So that we, fallen children of the stars, will beam once again.
chn:
总有一天，我们这群弃子
也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

eng: I am most grateful. There are no others who would have done this.
chn: 谢谢，这件事肯定只有你才能办到。

eng: What a joy to have you as an apprentice, and kindred spirit.
chn: 我很庆幸能收你当徒弟，有你这位知己。

eng: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
chn: 这是一点谢礼，收下吧。

eng: You wish to resume the lesson?
chn: 还想继续上课吗？

eng: Good. Indeed, it is better to finish what one starts, is it not?
chn:
我很乐意奉陪。
既然如此，来彻底学习一回吧。

eng: With the body of Master Azur returned, the academy can restore the primeval current.
chn: 接回亚兹勒大师的身体，学院就能回归起源──

eng: So that we, fallen children of the stars, might beam with brilliance once again.
chn:
总有一天，我们这群弃子
也能成为闪闪发亮的星之子。

eng: Jerren, bringer of my death.
chn: ……杰廉，我的死亡啊。

eng: You have my gratitude. For freeing me from my shackles.
chn: 我必须感谢你，你让我脱离制约的束缚。

eng: But I am afraid your work is done.
chn: ……但你对我没有用处了。

eng: Join the school. To reflect on your mistake.
chn: 成为我教室的一部份，后悔自身的愚蠢吧……

eng: U...urgh
M-my...apprentice...
chn: ……徒、徒弟啊……

eng: My...apprentice...
chn: ……徒、徒弟啊……

eng: Oh, is that a scroll? Takes me back to my academy days.
chn:
……哦，是卷轴啊。
让我回想起学院的时光。

eng: Very well. This is sorcery with which I'm not entirely unfamiliar.
chn: 好吧，其中也没有完全陌生的魔法。

eng: I'll be sure to incorporate it into one of your lessons.
chn: 就把这些魔法加入教材吧。

eng: Never lose that inquisitive spirit, my apprentice.
chn: ……徒弟啊，别忘了这份求知欲。

eng: What's the meaning of this?
chn: 你有什么企图？

eng: How unfortunate.
chn: 是吗？我很遗憾。

eng: That we should part ways in this manner...
chn: 没想到会以这种形式分道扬镳……

eng: Ngh!
Why, you. Are you mad?
chn: ……你有什么企图？

eng: My death would only be temporary.
chn: 杀了我也只是逞一时之快，

eng: Your savagery achieves nothing.
chn: 我不认为有什么意义……

eng: Agh!
chn: 呜呜！

eng: Why, you. Are you mad?
chn: 你有什么企图？

eng: Another moment of this, and no amount of grovelling will spare you.
chn:
再继续动手，
我就不打算轻轻放下了。

eng: You sadden me, my apprentice.
chn: ……是吗？徒弟啊，很遗憾。

eng: Ahh, how can this be...
chn: ……啊，为什么……

eng: ...every fallen child... must shine again...
chn:
为什么弃子……
无法成为闪闪发亮的星……

eng: For a time, I believed us kindred spirits.
chn: 我真心以为遇到了知己。

eng: My apprentice...
chn: 徒弟啊……

eng: If it isn't Nerijus. The Bloody Finger.
chn: ……找到你了，“血指”涅利乌斯。

eng: The end is nigh. For you, and your cessblood.
chn: 与你那份咒血，一起画下句点吧。

eng: Just joining the fray, Tarnished?
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: Well, you fought Nerijus and survived. That alone deserves commendation.
chn: 和涅利乌斯交战又幸存，看来有一点本事。

eng: I am Yura. Hunter of Bloody Fingers.
chn: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

eng: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
chn:
……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，
一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

eng: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
chn:
在这块土地上游走，
肯定免不了与他们一战。

eng: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
chn:
听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，
那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

eng: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
chn: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

eng: Well, you fought Nerijus and made good your escape. Fortune favours you, it seems.
chn:
和涅利乌斯交战又顺利脱逃，
至少你算是运气不错。

eng: Oh, one other thing...
chn: 对了，还有啊……

eng: There are other Tarnished, like me, who hunt the Bloody Fingers.
chn:
除了老夫以外，
还有其他担任血指猎人的褪色者。

eng: If a Bloody Finger threatens you, use this ring.
chn: 当你被血指攻击的时候，就用这枚戒指吧。

eng: If fortune takes your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
chn: 只要你运气够好，血指猎人会助你一臂之力。

eng: Just joining the fray, Tarnished?
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: I am Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
chn: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

eng: Have you ever faced a Bloody Finger?
chn: 你有和血指交战过吗？

eng: They are Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
chn: 那群袭击同胞，为咒血痴狂的褪色者。

eng: If you stay the path, you will face this blight, sooner or later.
chn:
只要在这块土地上游走，
他们就是避无可避的灾厄……

eng: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
chn:
听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，
那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

eng: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
chn: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

eng: If fortune remains on your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
chn:
只要你像这次一样，运气够好，
血指猎人会助你一臂之力。

eng: One last word of warning.
chn: 最后再给你一个建议：

eng: Stay clear of Agheel Lake. A great dragon roosts there.
chn: 别靠近亚基尔湖，那里是龙的地盘。

eng: Be on your way.
chn: ……快离开吧。

eng: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
chn: 彼此有缘会再相见。

eng: Well, we meet again.
chn: ……哦，是你。又见面啦。

eng: Beware. A great dragon roosts at Agheel Lake.
chn: 你要小心了，这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘。

eng: And it's as fearsome as it is majestic.
chn: 龙兼具强大与美丽，但也十分可怕。

eng: So, unless you're mad, or wish to be burned alive...
chn: 除非你是希望龙焰烧死自己的长生者……

eng: stay clear of the lake.
chn: 否则贸然靠近，算不上聪明。

eng: Hmm, I gave you fair warning.
chn: ……哦，老夫警告过你了：

eng: To stay clear of Agheel Lake, a known dragon roost.
chn: 这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘，别靠近。

eng: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
chn: 不是笨蛋的话，现在折返还来得及。

eng: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
chn: 不是笨蛋的话，现在折返还来得及。

eng: Ah, we meet again.
chn: ……又见面了。

eng: To have fought Nerijus and lived, you must have seen your share of battle.
chn: 和涅利乌斯交战又幸存，你确实有一点本事。

eng: To have fought Nerijus and escaped, fortune must smile upon you indeed.
chn:
和涅利乌斯交战又顺利脱逃，
你算是运气不错。

eng: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
chn: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

eng: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
chn:
……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，
一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

eng: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
chn:
在这块土地上游走，
肯定免不了与他们一战。

eng: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
chn:
听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，
那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

eng: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
chn: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

eng: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: You'd do well to steer clear of Agheel Lake, fledgling. A dragon roosts there...
chn: 那你要小心了，这座亚基尔湖是龙的地盘……

eng: You bloody halfwit.
chn: ……你真的是个笨蛋啊，

eng: Picking a fight with a dragon?
chn: 竟然异想天开，想挑战龙。

eng: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
chn: 老夫不再阻止你了，反正也是徒劳。

eng: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
chn: ……看来，老夫似乎和笨蛋特别有缘。

eng: Ah, we meet again.
chn: ……又见面了。

eng: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
chn: 老夫叫尤拉，是猎杀血指的猎人。

eng: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
chn:
……他们是为咒血痴狂的褪色者，
一群袭击同胞的恶徒。

eng: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
chn:
在这块土地上游走，
肯定免不了与他们一战。

eng: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
chn:
听好了，就算你念在彼此是同胞，
那群家伙也早就疯了，不可能和他们沟通。

eng: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
chn: 可别因为犹豫就手下留情。

eng: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: And quite the fool, by the look of it.
chn: 而且看来，是个笨蛋──

eng: Picking a fight with a dragon? Hah.
chn: 竟然异想天开，想挑战龙。

eng: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
chn: ……但老夫不阻止你，反正也是徒劳。

eng: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
chn: ……看来，老夫似乎和笨蛋特别有缘。

eng: I can tell you want to see it through.
chn: ……老夫不会阻止你。

eng: Fools will be fools. Fight all the dragons you like.
chn: 不够聪明的，就继续挑战龙吧。

eng: There you are. That was my first dragon hunt in quite some time.
chn: ……是你啊。好久没有狩猎龙了。

eng: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
chn: 又是和笨蛋联手，真怀念。

eng: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
chn:
……而且你还成功打倒了龙。
既然如此，该告诉你。

eng: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
chn: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

eng: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
chn:
等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，
心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

eng: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
chn:
记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，
到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

eng: You must not forget, though.
chn: ……不过，你也要记得──

eng: Those who partake in Dragon Communion will one day shed their humanity.
chn: 所有执行龙飨的人，都会渐渐成为非人。

eng: Their hunger for dragon, their yearning, only worsens.
chn: 渴望龙的念头不会消失，而是会逐渐累积……

eng: Until the floodgates burst, unleashing eternal torment.
chn: 最后那念头会充斥全身，不断折磨着你。

eng: The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.
chn: 龙的力量既强大又美丽，却十分可怕──

eng: It's no surprise that Dragon Communion is ruinous.
chn: 也因此，执行龙飨等同踏上毁灭的不归路。

eng: Beautiful work, felling that dragon.
chn: ……你成功打倒了龙啊。

eng: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
chn: 既然如此，该告诉你。

eng: Wretched worms, leave me be...
chn: 天杀的寄生虫，越来越痛……

eng: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: That was my first dragon hunt in quite a while.
chn: ……好久没有狩猎龙了。

eng: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
chn: 又是和笨蛋联手，真怀念。

eng: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
chn:
……你成功打倒了龙。
既然如此，该告诉你。

eng: The heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
chn: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

eng: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
chn:
等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，
心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

eng: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
chn:
记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，
到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

eng: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
chn: ……你是新来的褪色者吧？

eng: Beautiful work, felling that dragon.
chn: 而且你还成功打倒了龙……

eng: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
chn: 既然如此，该告诉你。

eng: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
chn: 你手上那颗龙心脏，是龙飨用的供品。

eng: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
chn:
等到某一天，当你为了获得力量吃下它，
心中因此萌生渴望，难以克制的时候……

eng: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
chn:
记得到西边海岸的尽头，那里有座小岛，
到岛上的废弃教堂一趟。

eng: Ah, oh, it's you. Thanks for your help there.
chn: ……哦、哦，是你啊。受你关照了。

eng: That Bloody Finger was a thorn in my side. And now I'm finally rid of him.
chn: 那个血指很棘手，终于解决掉他了。

eng: Here's a token of thanks. Please, take it.
chn: 这是一点心意，收下吧。

eng: I may not have much time.
chn: ……嗯，所剩的时间也不多了。

eng: I'm dying to see you, Eleonora... Violet Bloody Finger...
chn: 真想尽快找到“纯紫血指”艾琉诺拉……

eng: Yes, I've been tracking Eleonora for quite some time.
chn: ……对，老夫一直在追杀艾琉诺拉。

eng: She is the deadliest of all Bloody Fingers. She's felled many an old hand already.
chn:
她是最具威胁性的血指，
技术纯熟的战士前仆后继，已经死了不少人……

eng: But in spite of her cessblood zealotry, Eleonora is a proud knight.
chn:
艾琉诺拉即使为咒血痴狂，
依旧保有荣誉感，会用全力战斗。

eng: If she comes for you, do not think twice. You must flee.
chn:
老夫不会害你，
如果被她攻击了，直接逃跑吧。

eng: There is no shame in self-preservation.
chn: 这种情况逃亡也算不上耻辱，要记住了。

eng: Be on your way.
chn: ……快离开吧。

eng: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
chn: 彼此有缘会再相见。

eng: Eleonora, it seems I am no match for you.
chn: ……艾琉诺拉啊，虽说远不及你，

eng: But I've learned a thing or two myself, you see.
chn: 但老夫也没有虚度光阴。

eng: I've sliced the finger off.
chn: 老夫砍下你的指头了，

eng: Please, please, Eleonora, yield to the cessblood no longer.
chn: 所以别再心向着咒血──

eng: Do not stain the immaculacy of your sword, your flesh, your fire...
chn:
别再让你的剑、你的身躯，
还有你那美丽的龙焰染上任何一点阴霾……

eng: Finally, we meet.
chn: ……望穿秋水，终于遇见您了──

eng: The Tarnished, who would be Lord.
chn: 必定为王的褪色者啊。

eng: Oh my, why the long face?
chn: ……哎呀，看您的表情有些诧异，

eng: I fear that you were previously acquainted with this vessel.
chn: 难道说您认识这副身体的原主人？

eng: Well, that is most unfortunate. For he is dead.
chn:
事情真是如此，那我很遗憾──
他已经往生了。

eng: As for his flesh, he gave it to me, Shabriri.
chn: 他将这副身体托付给我──夏玻利利。

eng: I hope you can make your peace with that.
chn: 今后还请您多多关照。

eng: You are about to sacrifice something precious.
chn: ……您正面临做出牺牲的时刻──

eng: The life of a fair maiden, that you would toss into the fiery forge.
chn: 那可怜的女孩将投身火焰大锅，焚烧自己……

eng: Only so that you may be Lord.
chn: 就为了让您步上为王的路。

eng: What a horrible thing to ponder.
chn: 这情况真让人不忍卒睹。

eng: Your ascendency requires her sacrifice, whether she wishes it or not.
chn:
不提那女孩是出于自愿，您也只有牺牲她一途，
否则想步上自己的路，别无他法。

eng: But how would the Lord, crowned so, be looked upon?
chn: 综观下来，您认为众人会真心认您为王？

eng: Chosen Tarnished and would-be Lord, dare to tread the path of true rigor.
chn:
……必定为王的褪色者啊，
请步上险恶的道路吧。

eng: Spare the poor girl, and singe your own flesh in her stead.
chn:
不该焚烧那可怜的女孩，
该焚烧的，是您自己的身体。

eng: If you are prepared to show resolve,
chn: 如果您已经有所准备，

eng: and attain Lordship through righteous hardship,
chn: 认为即使路途险恶，也必须步上正统的王者之路──

eng: then heed the words of I, Shabriri.
chn: 就请将夏玻利利的话听进去。

eng: Chosen Tarnished, and would-be Lord.
chn: 必定为王的褪色者啊──

eng: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
chn: 请您朝黄金树王城底下，地底深处前进。

eng: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
chn: 接着会见叁指以及癫火。

eng: If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,
chn: 在受赐癫火之后，您会成为火种，

eng: and the girl can be spared.
chn: 就不必让那女孩接受焚烧。

eng: ...setting you on the righteous path of lordship.
chn: ……请步上正统的王者之路──

eng: The path of the Lord of Chaos.
chn: 那成为浑沌之王的路。

eng: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
chn: 燃烧、击倒黄金树──

eng: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
chn: 侵略、熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

eng: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
chn: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: May chaos take the world!
chn: 愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: Chosen Tarnished, and would-be Lord.
chn: 必定为王的褪色者啊──

eng: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
chn: 请您朝黄金树王城底下，地底深处前进。

eng: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
chn: 接着会见叁指以及癫火。

eng: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
chn: 燃烧、击倒黄金树──

eng: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
chn: 侵略、熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

eng: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
chn: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: May chaos take the world!
chn: 愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: Ugh.
chn: 唔。

eng: That will be quite enough.
chn: 住手吧。

eng: What do you stand to gain by challenging me?
chn: 老夫没有和你交手的理由。

eng: Too late for you, eh?
chn: ……莫可奈何啊。

eng: Well, if you've succumbed to cessblood...
chn: 唉，既然迟早会为咒血痴狂，

eng: it's better that I finish you here.
chn: 早点猎杀也好。

eng: I had no choice.
chn: ……这样就事成了。

eng: Your death could have been much worse.
chn: 认命受死吧。

eng: What a wretched fate.
chn: ……真可惜，

eng: Why did you turn foul...
chn: 怎么会变成恶徒……

eng: I must not die...
chn: ……在杀了她之前……

eng: until she is eradicated...
chn: 老夫不能死……

eng: What's this?
chn: 哦？

eng: Well, this is peculiar.
chn: 您的行为还真是不合常理。

eng: Is this how you express contempt?
chn: 难道说，您恨我吗？

eng: This, I did not expect.
chn: ……那就没有办法了。

eng: But if you do not care for Lordship,
chn: 既然您无意为王，

eng: I'm afraid you are of no use.
chn: 我也与您无缘了。

eng: How very unfortunate.
chn: ……唉，真是可惜。

eng: I did not take you for a fraud.
chn: 结果只是个蠢蛋啊，我看错人了。

eng: Shabriri is chaos incarnate. I cannot die.
chn: ……夏玻利利等同浑沌，绝不会死亡。

eng: Until we meet again, in another place or time.
chn: 往后肯定会以不同样貌，再次相见吧。

eng: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
chn: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: There's no mistake, is there?
chn: ……嗯，这也是……

eng: Death has left its mark once again.
chn: ……死亡又再一次扩散……

eng: I'm sorry, I cannot give you your proper rites...
chn: ……万分抱歉，我现在无法替你处理身后事。

eng: But at least you did not join Those Who Live in Death.
chn: 但既然没有遭遇“死诞”，

eng: Your soul will return to the Erdtree, in time.
chn: 灵魂终究会回归大树。

eng: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver this spirit.
chn: 黄金啊，掌管此人的魂魄吧。

eng: Ah, a Tarnished, are you?
chn: ……你是褪色者吗？

eng: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
chn:
你可以称我为Ｄ。
我正在狩猎死诞者，摘除死根。

eng: Heed my warning.
chn: ……先警告你一声，

eng: The village here has been touched by Death.
chn: 死亡已经扩散到前面的村子，

eng: And worse yet, it is home to a mariner.
chn: 大概“船”也在。

eng: If you value your life, then go no further.
chn: 不想平白送命的话，别随意靠近。

eng: The village here has been touched by Death.
chn: 死亡已经扩散到前面的村子……

eng: Turn back, while you still can.
chn: 别随意靠近。

eng: Another fool who won't listen to reason, eh?
chn: ……你是听不懂警告的蠢蛋？

eng: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
chn: 但看来是有摘除死根的实力……

eng: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
chn: 你对野兽的力量有兴趣吗？

eng: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
chn: 要是你有意愿狩猎死诞者，摘除死根，

eng: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
chn: 我会把你推荐给“野兽祭司”古兰格。

eng: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
chn: ……我有其他规划，

eng: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
chn: 古兰格大概也想换个帮手。

eng: What say you?
chn: 你怎么想？

eng: Very well. Show me your map.
chn: ……很好，借我地图。

eng: I've marked the location for you. Of a hidden gateway.
chn:
我在地图上做好标记了，
记号的地方有隐藏的传送门。

eng: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
chn: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

eng: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
chn: ……我有其他规划。

eng: I spotted the mark of the centipede here in the village.
chn: 这座村子出现了百足环的烙印，

eng: An ill-omened symbol that should not be.
chn: 那是不该有的不祥印记。

eng: Someone, or something, threatens the sanctity of the Golden Order.
chn: ……有人意图玷污黄金律法，

eng: And must be eradicated.
chn: 必须除之而后快。

eng: What is it? Still milling about?
chn: ……怎么？你还不出发？

eng: The map indicates where the gateway is hidden.
chn: 地图上的记号标着传送门隐藏的位置，

eng: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
chn: 用那传送门去见“野兽祭司”古兰格吧。

eng: Well, all right, then.
chn: ……哦，是吗？

eng: No sense in forcing you.
chn: 我不勉强。

eng: What now? Had a change of heart?
chn: ……怎么？改变心意了？

eng: Ah, a Tarnished, are you?
chn: ……你是褪色者吗？

eng: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
chn: 看来是有摘除死根的实力……

eng: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
chn:
你可以称我为Ｄ。
我正在狩猎死诞者，摘除死根。

eng: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
chn: 你对野兽的力量有兴趣吗？

eng: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
chn: 要是你有意愿狩猎死诞者，摘除死根，

eng: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
chn: 我会把你推荐给“野兽祭司”古兰格。

eng: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
chn: ……我有其他规划，

eng: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
chn: 古兰格大概也想换个帮手。

eng: Ha! Prince of Death, take a good long look!
chn: 死王子啊，看仔细了！

eng: See the wrath of the Golden Order! The Order's justice, writ in blood!
chn: 这就是黄金律法的怒火！黄金律法的正义！

eng: This is what's become of your precious witch! Naught but expired meat and bone!
chn:
你的魔女已经变成这副德性了！
迎接正确的死亡，化成尸块！

eng: This is a proper death, O Prince!
chn: 看仔细了！死王子啊！

eng: Look at this rotten whore. No more children can be got from this useless flesh!
chn: 这骯脏的娼妓，这尸块不会再怀上小孩！

eng: Behold, your mother is dead!
chn: 你的母亲已经死了！

eng: Heh heh heh heh...
chn: 哈哈哈哈哈哈！

eng: This is revenge, you witch! And you, you ghoul! This is the wrath of D!
chn:
这就是报应，Ｄ的怒火！
活该的魔女！可悲的死王子！

eng: Ah. Hello.
chn: ……哦，是你啊。

eng: The rotten witch is dead. The Golden Order, unsullied.
chn: 骯脏的魔女已经死了，黄金律法不会再受玷污。

eng: Now I can look my brother Darian in the eye.
chn: ……总算对得起我哥哥达利安了。

eng: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
chn: 黄金啊，掌管我的魂魄吧。

eng: Darian, now I have no regrets.
chn: ……总算对得起达利安了。

eng: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
chn: 黄金啊，掌管我的魂魄吧。

eng: <sleeping>
Ah, aah...
D-da...ri...
Ngh...nnngh...

chn: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！

eng: Ah, mm...
Y-You...
