eng: The Golden Order has bestowed me, talentless as I am, the great duty of documentarian.
chn: 黄金律法赐予毫无才能的我，担任记录者的任务。

eng: Master! What ever is the matter?
chn: 老师，您是怎么了呢？

eng: Please, I implore you continue! Continue your reflections, your rhythms!
chn: 请您继续思考、继续奏出旋律！

eng: I must be the one to record them!
chn: 让我把一切记录下来！

eng: What matters this issue of Radagon, really?
chn: 拉达冈不过是细微末节的小事。

eng: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
chn: 黄金树──黄金律法就近在眼前了，

eng: Why must these qualms come to you now?
chn: 您到底在犹豫什么呢？

eng: We were on the very cusp!
chn: 噢，究竟在犹豫些什么！

eng: Oh, was that you? Sorry, I hardly noticed.
chn:
……啊，是您啊。
很抱歉，我没有注意到您。

eng: I'm a little shaken since the master ceased his movements.
chn: 因为老师静止不动，我有点慌了。

eng: Did you need something else?
chn: ……还有什么事吗？

eng: Oh, was that you?
chn: ……啊，是您啊。

eng: Yes, the master is still ceased.
chn: 是的，老师一直静止不动。

eng: And after coming all this way... Why now, of all times?
chn: 唉，都走到这一步了，怎么会……

eng: The master's reflections had heightened as we neared the Erdtree.
chn: ……越靠近黄金树，老师的思考就越加繁复──

eng: While still a precise calculus, the rhythms grew increasingly wild.
chn:
基本上严谨缜密，类似数学，
但也不乏从中浮出放纵不羁的旋律。

eng: Until he simply ceased.
chn: ……只是现在，一切停了下来。

eng: Now the master is facing quite the puzzle.
chn: 老师正面临着神秘的谜题。

eng: The Golden Order is founded on the principle that Marika is the one true god. However...
chn: 在黄金律法之中，我们视玛莉卡女王为唯一神……

eng: The name of Marika's second husband, King Consort Radagon, also appeared...
chn:
事实如此，但现在却找到
玛莉卡的第二任丈夫，王夫拉达冈的名字。

eng: Who exactly was Radagon?
chn: 拉达冈究竟是何等人物？

eng: The master is stumped.
chn: 老师找不到答案。

eng: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
chn: 从找到拉达冈的名字之后，他的指头就不动了。

eng: Curse my mediocre mind.
chn: 唉，我真痛恨自己欠缺才能。

eng: The master only has me, and here I fail him...
chn: 只有我待在老师身边，却什么忙都无法帮。

eng: What on earth did you do to the master?
chn: ……您对老师做了什么？

eng: Well, not that I'm complaining.
chn: 没关系，发生过什么都无所谓。

eng: Master's finger moves again, resuming his cogitation; more than good enough for me.
chn:
老师的指头又动了起来，开始思考。
我认为这样就够了。

eng: I haven't the words to thank you.
chn: 对您真的感激不尽。

eng: So I'd like to pass this on to you instead.
chn: 说是谢礼可能不恰当，但这件事只让您听──

eng: A glimpse into the heart of the Golden Order, documented by yours truly.
chn: 关于我记录到的，黄金律法的深渊，其中部分内容。

eng: To think, that Radagon was Marika herself.
chn: ……拉达冈的真实身分，就是玛莉卡。

eng: Or at least, such is all I can interpret from the rhythm and calculus of his finger.
chn:
从老师的指头编织出的数学与旋律，
只能有这种解释。

eng: How would such a thing even have been possible, I wonder.
chn: ……但这种事情真有可能吗？

eng: Sadly, I cannot comprehend it, myself.
chn: 我完全无法吸收，真难受。

eng: Do you have a fuller understanding of the matter?
chn: 难道说，您能完全理解这件事？

eng: Well, either way, I can continue my documentation.
chn: 嗯，即使无法理解，我也会继续记录。

eng: In truth it matters very little whether I understand the master's thoughts or not,
chn:
老师的思考，还有真相──
我的理解于此，都不是必要。

eng: I am merely his scribe. It is my sole and unwavering purpose.
chn: 我只是单纯的记录者，也想贯彻这一点。

eng: Who exactly was Radagon?
chn: 拉达冈究竟是何等人物？

eng: The master is stumped.
chn: 老师找不到答案。

eng: His finger has remained still, ever since Radagon's name was discovered.
chn: 从找到拉达冈的名字之后，他的指头就不动了。

eng: But oh, how important could it really be?
chn: 唉，但那是这么重要的事吗？

eng: The Erdtree, heart of the Golden Order, lies before our very eyes!
chn: 黄金树──黄金律法就近在眼前了，

eng: Why must these qualms come to you now?
chn: 到底在犹豫什么呢？

eng: We were on the very cusp!
chn: 噢，究竟在犹豫些什么！

eng: Ah, nice to see you.
chn: ……啊，是您啊。

eng: I can't believe you've come all this way.
chn: 您居然来到这种地方。

eng: Do you need...something else?
chn: ……还有什么事吗？

eng: Ah, nice to see you.
chn: ……啊，是您啊。

eng: Do you need...something else?
chn: 还有什么事吗？

eng: I've…been gripped by a terrifying thought.
chn: 其实……我心中有个恐怖的猜测，挥之不去。

eng: The rhythms and calculus of the master's finger...
chn: ……老师的指头编织出的数学与旋律，

eng: betray a suspicion of the holism of the Golden Order.
chn: 表现出对黄金律法的完美，产生怀疑……

eng: A conceit, I am afraid, that cannot be overlooked.
chn: 我从中感受到了万万不可有的傲慢。

eng: Oh, but how could this be?
chn: 唉，那种事情不可能发生，

eng: I dread to even entertain the possibility...
chn: 也千万不能发生。

eng: but somehow, I cannot cast aside my doubts about the master.
chn: 我没办法完全信任老师了。

eng: Tell me, have I simply lost my head?
chn: 是我哪里出了问题吗？

eng: Only, if the master were true to the Golden Order,
chn: 但如果，老师对黄金律法依旧虔诚，

eng: why would he think to breach this forbidden mount of fire?
chn: 那为什么，他会考虑进入这座有着禁忌火焰的山？

eng: Oh master, put my mind at ease.
chn: 唉，老师，请您否定吧。

eng: Dispel these fearsome thoughts.
chn: 否定我这恐怖的猜测。

eng: I want to place my trust in you, to be your scribe.
chn: 我想相信老师，我想继续当您的记录者。

eng: <sobbing>
chn: ……喔喔、喔喔喔喔喔……

eng: What...is this?
chn: ……这是什么……？

eng: It will make me forget, you say?
chn: 您要我遗忘一切吗？

eng: So that I can push aside these frightful thoughts...
chn: 要我遗忘这恐怖的猜测吗？

eng: Ha...ha ha...
chn: ……哈哈、哈哈哈。

eng: Would that I could... Would that I could...
chn: 我怎么可能遗忘……

eng: Oh, it's you.
chn: ……啊，是您啊。

eng: I've finally come to understand.
chn: 我终于明白了。

eng: The master was nothing more than a madman.
chn: 老师就只是个疯子。

eng: Enchanted by a vain and ruinous delusion, he rejected the perfection of the Golden Order,
chn: 坚信那傲慢又荒诞的妄想，否定黄金律法的完美，

eng: seeking to supplant our glorious faith with his own!
chn: 还想推动独善其身的完美，只是个不虔诚的信徒！

eng: Could there be a more pitiable comedy?
chn: 哈哈，真是讽刺啊。

eng: Look at it. The culmination of perfection, burning, before our very eyes!
chn:
看啊，投注多少心血探索的完美存在，
竟然会燃烧得那么剧烈！

eng: Ha...ha ha ha...
chn: 哈哈哈哈。

eng: Master...where did you go?
chn: ……啊，老师，您在哪里？

eng: I'm right here. Please, show me.
chn: 我在这里，请让我见见您。

eng: Your finger. Your rhythms, and calculus.
chn: 您的指头编织出的数学与旋律，

eng: Let me document the motions...
chn: 拜托您，请让我记录……

eng: Master...master...
chn: 老师、老师……

eng: Where did you go?
chn: 您在哪里……？

eng: This...is a volume of incantation.
chn: ……这一本书，是祷告书啊。

eng: It's good to see your enthusiasm.
chn: 热衷学习，是好事一件。

eng: Indeed, I will happily take it off your hands.
chn: 是的，我很乐意收下。

eng: That...is a work of heresy.
chn: ……这一本书，是异端的书。

eng: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
chn: 上头记载着与黄金树不相关的祷告……

eng: My interests lie solely in the Golden Order.
chn: 我是探索黄金律法的人，

eng: I cannot accept this.
chn: 所以这本书，我不能收。

eng: That...is a work of heresy.
chn: ……这一本书，是异端的书。

eng: Its incantations bear no lineage from the Erdtree.
chn: 上头记载着与黄金树不相关的祷告……

eng: Very well...I'll take it off your hands.
chn: ……我明白了，我愿意收下。

eng: I cannot afford to maintain my innocence any longer. I must dirty my hands to test my faith.
chn: 即便我会因此不再纯净，我的信仰会不再无暇，

eng: Even if it offers only the most meagre of hints, I will do whatever I can to help my master.
chn:
只要能借此找到些什么，蛛丝马迹也好，
有办法成为老师的助力，我欣然接受。

eng: Ngh!
chn: 呜啊。

eng: What are you trying to achieve?
chn: 您怎么动手！

eng: Cease that!
chn: 请您住手！

eng: You've done it now.
chn: ……这样就没有办法了。

eng: Faith grants me strength, that I might endure.
chn: 所谓的信仰，也包含抵抗的力量。

eng: O Golden Order, shine through me.
chn: 黄金律法啊，与我们同在吧。

eng: I pray...
chn: ……我会祈求，

eng: That the guidance of grace abandons you.
chn: 希望赐福的指引能早日放弃您。

eng: Please don't trouble us again.
chn: ……请不要再妨碍我们。

eng: O guidance...of grace...
chn: ……赐福的指引啊……

eng: Why...can't I...
chn: 为什么，我看不……

eng: O, master...
chn: ……啊，老师，

eng: To be ever...at your side...
chn: 我会永远在您身边……

eng: A proper death means returning to the Erdtree.
chn: ……所谓正确的死亡，指的是回归黄金树的怀抱。

eng: Have patience. Until the time comes...and the roots call to you.
chn: 耐心等吧──等到树根呼唤你的那一刻……

eng: The mausoleum prowls. Cradling the soulless demigod.
chn: ……灵庙正在漫步，怀抱着无魂的半神。

eng: O Marika, Queen Eternal. He is your unwanted child.
chn:
噢，“永恒女王”玛莉卡啊，
安歇在它怀中的，是您丑陋的弃子。

eng: O Sapling! Sweet sapling of glorious gold.
chn: ……小树啊，生自伟大黄金树的小树啊。

eng: Has your crystal teardrop ripened?
chn: 你的结晶露滴快滴落了吗？

eng: Unthinkable. Our hallowed resting place is violated.
chn: ……我们的安眠地受玷污了，怎么有这种事？

eng: To refuse the Erdtree's call to return, to live within Death... Sickening.
chn:
竟然会有拒绝回归黄金树，
死后继续活命这种事，太可怕了。

eng: The demi-humans wax wroth, now their mother's been taken...
chn: ……那群母亲被掳走的亚人暴动了。

eng: Where are you, Lord Kenneth?
chn: 肯尼斯大人，您在哪里？

eng: The knight...bedeviled by blood.
chn: 那个骑士，为血痴狂了……

eng: Please, help me. I'm of noble blood.
chn: ……唉，救救我吧。我可是贵族啊。

eng: If those hideous mongrels eat me, I'll be forever marred...
chn: 一旦被那些杂种吃下肚，我会永不得……

eng: Anything but that, please! Think of the disgrace!
chn: 啊，我不要沦落那种下场，不要玷污我！

eng: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last...
chn: ……我想当个战士，战斗到最后一刻。

eng: So, why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?
chn: 赐福的指引啊，那为什么这扇门不开……？

eng: Maiden, dear maiden, where are you?
chn: ……女巫大人啊，女巫大人，您在哪里呢？

eng: Please, take my grapes.
chn: 请您收下我的葡萄。

eng: Ohh, there it is, the tower!
chn: ……哦，看到了，就是那座塔吧！

eng: Finally, I can return. To our home, bathed in rays of gold!
chn: 总算能回去黄金树的树脚，回到我们的故乡了！

eng: This village is done for.
chn: ……这座村子已经完蛋啦。

eng: Please, even if it's just you, old Albus, hide well and still your breath.
chn:
唉，艾尔帕斯老先生，
只有您活命也好，请千万要躲好……

eng: Ahh, Lord Vyke, it seems that you were no lord, after all.
chn: ……唉，维克大人，结果您不是王吗？

eng: Then where is he? Our true Lord, our Lord of Frenzied Flame.
chn: 我们的王，我们的癫火之王啊，您在哪里？

eng: We beg of you, incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
chn: 请熔化那分隔你我的一切事物吧。

eng: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
chn: 啊，愿浑沌充满世间！

eng: Ahh, the puppets...
chn: ……啊啊，傀儡……

eng: The puppets besiege us...
chn: 一群傀儡，攻过来了……

eng: Raya Lucaria, hallowed hall dedicated to the study of magic.
chn: ……雷亚卢卡利亚，唯我独尊的魔法学问殿堂啊。

eng: Why shut your doors to me? Am I barred from donning the crown of stone?
chn: 为什么关上了大门？就因为我没有辉石头罩？

eng: Ahh, Iji, forgive me.
chn: ……啊，伊吉大人，实在万分抱歉。

eng: These royal grounds were placed in our trust,
chn: 大人要我们守着这块王室的领地，

eng: but we stood no chance.
chn: 我们却只能眼巴巴看着，无能为力……

eng: O Celestial Globe, transmit to posterity. The wisdom of the moon and stars.
chn:
……星象仪啊，将星星与月亮的法则，
传达给后世的人们吧。

eng: And obscure, forever, the transgressions of the princess.
chn: 永远隐藏公主所犯下的罪过吧。

eng: Lady Ranni, we have long awaited you.
chn: ……菈妮大人，小的一直在等待。

eng: I pray for your house's swift revival.
chn: 请大人复兴王室。

eng: May the full moon shine upon Caria.
chn: 愿满月与卡利亚同在……

eng: Come out, one and all, from the darkness underground.
chn: ……各位，快从昏暗的地底出来吧。

eng: And let us offer unto the maiden our eyes.
chn: 为女巫大人献上我们的葡萄吧。

eng: Ahh, the poor fellow...gone perfectly mad.
chn: ……唉，那位大人也发疯了。

eng: Love...revenge...the frenzied flame melts it all away...
chn: 爱恨情仇，一切都被癫火烧熔了。

eng: It's there, somewhere.
chn: ……一定藏在某个地方，

eng: Another path, leading back to the foot of the Erdtree.
chn: 另外一条回去黄金树树脚的路……

eng: An ancient tunnel.
chn: 那座古老的坑道……

eng: Eek... I hear a festive melody...
chn: ……噫……听到庆典的歌声了……

eng: No, no, don't skin me...
chn: ……不要、我不要……不要剥我的皮……

eng: My hide is filthy, I swear...
chn: 我的皮已经受玷污了……

eng: Ohh, Erdtree, great Erdtree.
chn: ……噢，黄金树啊，黄金树，

eng: The Golden Order itself, unwavering, stretched to the sky.
chn: 屹立不摇的黄金律法啊。

eng: Confer your guidance. To our Elden Lord.
chn: 请赐下指引，引导我们的艾尔登之王。

eng: To put this weary world to rights...
chn: 让世界得以修复……

eng: Lord Rykard...
chn: ……我的主人，拉卡德啊。

eng: If this putrid field of death is what your blasphemy would bring,
chn:
如果这充满污秽的战场，
这副景象是你所盼望的亵渎……

eng: then I can no longer abide.
chn: 我就无法继续跟随你了。

eng: No one can.
chn: 不会有人继续跟随你……

eng: House Marais is ruined...
chn: ……玛雷家已经完了吶……

eng: Just deserts, for falling for that severed harpy.
chn: 竟然会爱上那种骯脏、残身的丑女，

eng: No surprise that guilty cretin took the castle and our storied sword...
chn: 还被那种罪人夺走了城和宝剑……

eng: Eek...! The wretched fools...
chn: 嘻、嘻嘻……一群蠢蛋……

eng: They'll never find me.
chn: 我才不会被你们找到……

eng: Heh heh... I'll survive, I swear it.
chn: 嘻嘻……我一定要活下去，

eng: I'll soon be back at the Volcano Manor.
chn: 活下去，回到火山官邸……

eng: Sublime, I tell you.
chn: 真是高贵吶……

eng: The very first flower of Aeonia bloomed on this very spot.
chn: 艾奥尼亚的初始之花，就是在这里绽放的吶。

eng: Malenia, may you blossom into a goddess.
chn: ……玛莲妮亚大人，请您成为女神。

eng: Convene the festival of war.
chn: ……举办祭典，战斗祭典……

eng: Honor General Radahn, with a warrior's glory.
chn: 让拉塔恩将军恢复战士的名誉……

eng: It's in your hands, Sir Jerren...
chn: 杰廉啊，万事拜托了……

eng: Let me see it, if only one last time.
chn: ……拜托，再让我看一眼吧。

eng: Your splendid blade, dancing amongst the scarlet rot.
chn: 那猩红腐败随之舞动的美妙剑舞。

eng: I'm dry, dry as a bone...
chn: ……好渴，好渴啊……

eng: Fool dragon, surrender your strength.
chn: ……龙啊，把你的力量给我。

eng: Let me feast on your heart.
chn: 让我吃下，你的心脏……

eng: It's rotting.
chn: ……全都腐败了吶。

eng: Everything, rotting scarlet.
chn: 所有的一切，都陷入猩红腐败……

eng: The very earth that Caelid rests upon, and Sellia, town of sorcery.
chn: 盖利德也好，魔法镇瑟利亚也罢，

eng: The end is nigh, for us all.
chn: 一切都完了吶……

eng: Ohh great sun! Frigid sun of Sol!
chn: ……噢，太阳啊！索尔的寒冷太阳啊！

eng: Surrender yourself to the eclipse!
chn: 请您接受侵蚀吧，

eng: Grant life to the soulless bones!
chn: 让无魂的尸骸，得以再世……

eng: Lord Miquella, forgive me.
chn: ……万分抱歉，米凯拉大人。

eng: The sun has not been swallowed. Our prayers were lacking.
chn: 太阳还未受到侵蚀，都怪我们的祈祷过于无力。

eng: Your comrade remains soulless...
chn: 您的友人还是无魂的状态……

eng: I will never set my eyes upon it now...
chn: ……我可能无缘见到……

eng: Your divine Haligtree...
chn: 您的圣树了……

eng: Show me the path, O gentle lights.
chn: ……光芒啊，照亮我的去路，

eng: The promised path to the Haligtree!
chn: 引导我前往应许的圣树！

eng: Only...a little further now...
chn: ……啊，路程肯定不远了。

eng: Show me the path, O gentle lights...the path to Elphael.
chn:
光芒啊，照亮我的去路……
前往艾布雷菲尔的路……

eng: Mohg, you rotten Omen. Your blood is cursed.
chn: ……可恶的蒙格，流着诅咒之血的恶兆之子。

eng: Give him back.
Give Lord Miquella back!
chn: ……把米凯拉大人，还来……

eng: How dare you lay hands on such precious flesh!
chn: 你这种身分的东西，竟敢触碰大人……

eng: Lord of Blood, your eminence.
chn: ……哦哦，伟大的鲜血君王啊。

eng: I beg you, grant me a seat at the table of the dynasty.
chn: 请您开恩，将小的纳入王朝的末座。

eng: Long live the Mohgwyn Dynasty.
chn: 愿蒙格温王朝，永垂不朽。

eng: Long live! The Mohgwyn Dynasty!
chn: 愿蒙格温王朝，永垂不朽！

eng: Behold. The Erdtree yet stands.
chn: ……看啊，黄金树依旧耸立。

eng: Tall and unwavering, mindless of the scorch of the flame of ruin.
chn: 受到灰灭火焰焚烧，还是屹立不摇。

eng: Hahah, Hahah...
chn: 哈哈、哈哈哈……

eng: Then, we are yet Golden Ones.
chn: 既然如此，我们就还是黄金之民……

eng: He is returned! The Lord has returned at long last.
chn: ……回朝啦，引颈期盼的王，回朝啦。

eng: Our very first lord, to brandish the Elden Ring once more...
chn: 我们的初始之王，会再一次展现艾尔登法环吶……

eng: Brave Tarnished. Take the plunge.
chn: ……褪色者啊，跳下去吧。

eng: Of learning, and remembrance.
chn: 去学习，去回想吧──

eng: Recall the arts of war. And your warrior's blood.
chn: 学习交战的方法，想起身为战士的事实。

eng: One day, we'll return together.
chn: 终有一天，我等将返家。

eng: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
chn: 一同返回黄金树脚的故乡。

eng: There is only one tree, and only its branches.
chn: 人言正统为主枝，主枝其下为旁枝，

eng: That bathe in true rays of gold.
chn: 主枝之于黄金树脚，名正言顺──

eng: Not the fool Omen King.
chn: 弃子的恶兆之王，不可企及；

eng: Nor the rank malformed twins.
chn: 不成熟的畸形兄妹，望洋兴叹。

eng: O, we are the Golden Ones. The true and rightful heirs.
chn: 噢，我们是黄金之民、正统王者之民。

eng: Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
chn: 纵然大地贫瘠、乌云满布，

eng: But look up, the Erdtree glows!
chn: 抬头一望，大树蓊郁如常。

eng: Is there still a place for us?
chn: 我等是否还能返家？

eng: In our home, bathed in rays of gold.
chn: 返回黄金树脚的故乡。

eng: They will always welcome us.
chn: 我等一定能返家，

eng: To our home, bathed in rays of gold.
chn: 返回黄金树脚的故乡。

eng: Erdtree, O Golden Circle.
chn: 黄金树啊，黄金法环啊──

eng: Grant us the droplets of life,
chn: 赐予我等生命露滴吧。

eng: Structure us. Reveal our path.
chn: 掌管我们、引导我们吧。

eng: We are your guardians.
chn: 我们是您的守卫：

eng: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,
chn: 我们除去蛀虫，我们拨开火星，

eng: Repel the Omen, and undo Tarnish.
chn: 我们驱散恶兆，我们屏除褪色。

eng: Blessed we, at your side, eternal.
chn: 一同前进吧，受赐福之民啊。

eng: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.
chn: 一同前进吧，受赐福之民啊。

eng: Serve you we shall, in life, eternal.
chn: 侍奉永生，永生侍奉吧。

eng: Agheel, oh, Agheel...
chn: 亚基尔啊，噢，亚基尔啊……

eng: Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...
chn: 亚基尔的火焰啊，请将我燃烧殆尽吧……

eng: Whoah, whoah, whoah, whoah.
We journey on a road so far,
chn: 棺木与我们同行，

eng: Death's fortune's what we seek.
chn: 目的地过于遥远，旅途显得无穷──

eng: Coffin in tow, we'll find a hero
chn: 我们寻找战争后英雄残存的片段，

eng: And scraps of his great deeds!
chn: 我们寻找英雄的死亡命运。

eng: Whoah, whoah, whoah, whoah.
Who rode along this road before?
chn: 这是谁的来路？

eng: He did, but won't anymore.
chn: 这是他的来路。

eng: Whoah, whoah, whoah, woah.
He did, but won't anymore.
chn: 这是他的来路。

eng: Blessed Erdtree...
chn: 黄金树啊……

eng: O hallowed Runes...
chn: 我等的卢恩啊……

eng: You're a Tarnished, I can see it.
chn: ……你是褪色者吧？

eng: And I can also see...
chn: 而且看起来……

eng: That you're not after my throat.
chn: 好像不会攻击我。

eng: Then why not purchase a little something?
chn: 既然如此，要不要买些什么？

eng: I am Kalé. Purveyor of fine goods.
chn:
我叫咖列。
可能看不太出来，我是做生意的。

eng: What is it? Still going to purchase something?
chn: ……怎么？还想买些什么吗？

eng: Wait, weren't you...?
chn: ……你是先前的……

eng: Well, you're back. Care to buy something?
chn: 又过来啦？那要不要买些什么？

eng: Ah, it's you again.
chn: ……啊，果然是你啊……

eng: Always a pleasure. Care to purchase anything?
chn: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

eng: Good-bye for now.
chn: 再会了。

eng: Good-bye. Nice to do business.
chn: 和你做生意很愉快，再会了。

eng: I am of a nomadic people.
chn: 我出身流浪民族。

eng: Selling wares as I travel.
chn: 一边旅行，一边做生意。

eng: The land has been tainted by madness since the shattering of the Elden Ring.
chn:
艾尔登法环破碎之后，
这块土地的人，脑袋几乎都变得不正常。

eng: It's only Tarnished like yourself who keep things from drying up entirely.
chn:
好在有你们褪色者，
我才得以摆脱毫无收入的下场。

eng: Let's say you're a very welcome customer.
chn: 总之，之后也请多加惠顾了。

eng: You know, if you can spare the runes,
chn: 啊，你手边的卢恩要是还够的话，

eng: you should buy yourself a crafting kit.
chn: 我建议你买下工具皮袋。

eng: A crafting kit allows you to make basic items on your own.
chn: 有了那只皮袋，就能自己制作简单的道具。

eng: Essential really, if you intend to survive out here for any duration.
chn: 要在这块土地奋战下去，颇需要这类东西。

eng: The kit costs a bundle, and I admit, I do take my cut.
chn: 那确实有点价位，卖出去我也能赚个一笔……

eng: But the important thing is that you survive. Every customer counts, after all.
chn: 但我的初衷，是希望重要的客人能活下去。

eng: I'm glad you took my warning to heart.
chn: 谢谢你相信我的话。

eng: You've made an excellent choice.
chn: 这笔生意，我谈得很愉快。

eng: There are others of my people who yet survive in these lands.
chn:
我们幸存的族人，
应该也在这块土地上讨生活。

eng: If the mood takes you when you meet one, then offer them some trade, won't you?
chn:
要是你遇到他们，有兴趣的话，
和他们买点东西吧。

eng: My people, wanderers all, have long been spurned by the grace of gold.
chn:
……我们流浪民族从古至今，
都不受黄金赐福的青睐。

eng: Which is why we cannot settle, but instead are forced into this pitiful, unceasing journey.
chn: 因此我们被迫四处为家，过着困顿的旅行生活。

eng: But thanks to that, things are not so different for us now, though the Elden Ring is shattered.
chn:
在艾尔登法环破碎之后，我们还能保有神智，
可能这就是原因吧。

eng: I think this makes us kindred spirits of sorts.
chn: 光这点看来，褪色者和流浪民族，

eng: Your people, the Tarnished, and mine.
chn: 我们两个还颇类似的。

eng: I suppose I shouldn't keep this from you.
chn: ……先和你说一声好了。

eng: I'm thinking of moving elsewhere for a time.
chn: 再过一阵子，我会离开这个地方。

eng: My people are wanderers all, which I won't deny is one reason...
chn: 流浪民族就该四处旅行，这也是理由……

eng: But I've done all I can here, in search of the Great Caravan.
chn:
但主要是因为继续待在这里，
好像也没办法得到大商队的情报。

eng: Perhaps you don't need to hear this, but...
chn: 嗯，这个警告也许对你没有意义……

eng: See that no harm comes to my kin.
chn: 记住，绝对不要攻击我们的族人。

eng: We have a saying, we wanderers.
chn: 流浪民族有一条族规：

eng: Lament not your solitude. Expect no sympathy. No regard. Nothing.
chn:
“孤单也很好──即使受人轻视、被人抛弃，
也不必想着谋求什么。”

eng: But if anyone dares harm us, show them no mercy.
chn: “唯独那些伤害我们的，绝不能轻易放过。”

eng: That is our code, so to speak.
chn: 要说的话，这就是我们的律法。

eng: Just the way we are. Deeply... unforgiving.
chn: 这民族听起来很执着、很烦人吧？

eng: Ah, by the way...
chn: 话说回来……

eng: Have you heard of the Great Caravan?
chn: 你有听过“大商队”吗？

eng: ...I see, more's the pity.
chn: ……没有吗？可惜了。

eng: Well, even we had a place to call home, once.
chn: 我们以前也有等同故乡的存在，

eng: The Great Caravan, they called it… but it's been lost to us for ages.
chn:
就是那个“大商队”……
只是不知不觉中消失不见，很久没人看过。

eng: I've been searching for it as long as I can remember.
chn: 我一直在寻找大商队的下落。

eng: And with a name like that,
chn: 既然都有这么响亮名字了，

eng: You'd hope they kept some fine goods there, eh.
chn: 说不定能看见数也数不尽的稀世珍宝啊。

eng: The howl of a wolf, in the Mistwood...
chn: ……雾林里有狼嚎……

eng: I suppose he must still be skulking about...
chn: 这样啊，是他……

eng: Mmm, I know. Why not meet him for yourself?
chn: ……对了，应该介绍给你认识。

eng: Next time you hear the wolf's howl, make this signal right under the source.
chn:
你之后听到狼嚎，
在那声音的正下方打出暗号吧。

eng: Oh, don't fret, there is nothing to fear.
chn: ……没事，这没有什么。

eng: I just have an inkling the two of you might hit it off.
chn: 只是觉得你们应该处得来。

eng: Oh, by the way. There's someone you should meet.
chn: 对了，有个人我想介绍给你认识。

eng: If you happen to hear a wolf's howl, make this signal under the source.
chn:
你之后如果有听到狼嚎，
在那声音的正下方打出暗号吧。

eng: Oh, then you met Blaidd, did you?
chn: 哦，你见过布莱泽了？

eng: Wonderful. I'm glad I pointed you in his direction.
chn: 那很好啊，我从中牵线也有价值了。

eng: He's boorish, blunt, and couldn't find his nose with both hands, but he's a good egg.
chn:
他态度不怎么友善，为人笨拙，
找东西的能力也差到令人发噱……但人不错。

eng: I think the two of you are sure to find the best in one another.
chn: 希望认识彼此对你们来说，都是一件好事。

eng: Ah, good to see you.
chn: ……你来啦。

eng: I knew leaving the sign would be worth the trouble.
chn: 石文放得有价值了。

eng: Thought I'd set up shop here for a time.
chn: 我会暂时待在这里做生意。

eng: A pleasure, as ever. Care to purchase anything?
chn: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

eng: We meet again, I see.
chn: ……又见到面了。

eng: It's me, Kalé.
chn: ……是我，咖列。

eng: Thought I'd set up shop here for a time.
chn: 我会暂时待在这里做生意。

eng: Right then. Care to purchase anything?
chn: 要不要买些什么？

eng: Have you seen a crow around here by any chance?
chn: ……你有没有在这附近看过乌鸦？

eng: You know, a burial crow, with a letter fastened to its claw?
chn: 那种鸟爪上绑着信的墓地乌鸦。

eng: Well, if you do set eyes upon it, I'll buy that letter from you, no question.
chn: 要是你有看到，希望你能把它带的信卖给我。

eng: I'd give you a generous sum for it, of course.
chn: 当然，之后买东西会给你一点优惠。

eng: My thanks. I've been wanting to get my hands on this.
chn: 谢谢，我一直很想得到这封信。

eng: And I was willing to pay whatever was needed. Your reward, as promised.
chn: 我们说好的，全是优惠价，挑你喜欢的吧。

eng: So, about the letter you brought me...
chn: 关于你拿来的那封信，

eng: It's just as I suspected, it features a cryptogram of my people.
chn:
和我料想的一样，
上面写着流浪民族使用的暗语。

eng: And I'm sure it's come from wherever the Great Caravan disappeared to.
chn:
……这可能是来自消失不见的大商队，
上头标注的或许是他们的所在地。

eng: This could be my chance to get close to it.
chn: 说不定我离他们越来越近了。

eng: Thanks to you.
chn: 幸亏有你帮忙。

eng: Once I decipher that cryptogram, I'll be packing up shop again.
chn: ……等我解开暗语之后，就会离开这里。

eng: Don't worry, I'll leave a sign that shows where I've gone.
chn: 对，我会用石文留下目的地。

eng: With any luck, I'll see you there, eh.
chn: 要是有缘分，应该会再见到面吧。

eng: I've always preferred my own company, to that of other people's...
chn: ……其实，我对于孤独一人这件事很满意。

eng: And I don't have any burning questions I wish to ask my ancestors...
chn:
而且事到如今，
我也不是有什么话想对祖先说……

eng: But there's something I need to know.
chn: 我只是想知道──

eng: My roots.
chn: 我的根在哪？

eng: I want to know who I am. Where I came from. Where I'm headed.
chn: 我到底是谁、来自哪里、要往哪里前进？

eng: Ah, good to see you.
chn: ……你来啦。

eng: I knew leaving the sign would be worth the trouble.
chn: 石文留得有价值了。

eng: The shop is all set up.
chn: 当然，我还是有在做生意。

eng: A pleasure as ever. Care to purchase anything?
chn: 大常客，要买些什么啊？

eng: Oh yes, about the cryptogram from the letter...
chn: 对，关于那封信的暗语，

eng: I think it's pointing underneath the capital.
chn: 上头写的位置，好像是在那座王城的地底。

eng: I think it's pointing here, underneath the capital.
chn: 上头写的位置，好像是在这座王城的地底。

eng: But I'm perplexed as to the path to take down there.
chn: 可是我完全不知道怎样才能进到地底。

eng: Well, the journey can wait, I suppose.
chn: 嗯，反正也不急于一时。

eng: I'll settle here for the time being, and start looking into it.
chn: 我打算多花点时间调查看看。

eng: Where...did you find this letter?
chn: ……你是在哪里找到这封信的？

eng: I can't imagine how it ended up there...
chn: ……原来，在那种地方……

eng: But the well might just lead under the capital.
chn: ……说不定和那口井相连啊──

eng: To the spot indicated by the cryptogram from the letter.
chn: 信纸上暗号所写的，王城地底的某个地方。

eng: Seems like an odd place for the Great Caravan...
chn: ……大商队会在那种地方，是有点奇怪……

eng: But no amount of thinking will change anything. I'll be heading straight there, after some preparation.
chn:
想破头也没用。
调查完之后，直接过去看看吧。

eng: Once again, I find myself in your debt.
chn: 又受到你的帮忙了。

eng: Take this, as a token of my appreciation.
chn: 这是谢礼，收下吧。

eng: It's not from my usual stock, but something rather more special.
chn: 是非卖品，相当特殊的东西。

eng: I hope you can join me at the Great Caravan, in fact.
chn: 希望下一次我会在大商队和你碰面，

eng: Who knows what wonders there might be to trade?
chn: 说不定到时候，我的生意规模会变得更大！

eng: Ah, you, is it...
chn: ……啊，是你啊……

eng: Did you see? What they did to my ancestors?
chn: 我们祖先的模样，你看到了吗？

eng: The whole clan, buried alive. Sick. Maddened. Husks of themselves.
chn: 一整个民族被活埋进地底，病的病，疯的疯。

eng: Have you heard their moans? They're hardly human anymore.
chn:
那一阵阵，不像人类发出的悲叹声，
你有听见吗？

eng: They think we worship the Three Fingers? That we called the maddening sickness down upon them?
chn: ……我们是参指的信徒？是招来狂病的祸首？

eng: Well. If that's what they expect from us, then that's what they shall get from us!
chn: 好啊，那好啊！我就让一切变成事实吧！

eng: The world of grace and its people should have been content to see us sink between the cracks.
chn:
受到赐福的世界啊、人们啊，
你们要轻视我们、抛弃我们都没关系。

eng: But to have intruded upon our solace... Having broken us upon their whims...
chn: 只要你们影响、践踏我们的孤独，

eng: I'll never forgive any of you.
chn: 我就绝对不会原谅你们。

eng: I'm sorry, but we won't be trading any longer.
chn: 对你很抱歉，但我不会再和你做生意了。

eng: And...I think it's time we parted ways.
chn: ……就此永别吧。

eng: Guided by grace, you seek to become Elden Lord.
chn: 受到赐福指引，目标当上艾尔登之王──

eng: I don't want anything to do with you Tarnished lot any more.
chn: 我已经不能认同你们这些褪色者的存在。

eng: I should apologise to you.
chn: ……我该和你道歉。

eng: It's my fault that we stumbled into this mess.
chn: 让你配合我东奔西跑，最后变成这种结果。

eng: I'm sorry.
chn: 抱歉啊。

eng: I'm sorry, but we won't be trading any longer.
chn: 对你很抱歉，但我不会再和你做生意了。

eng: I think it's time we parted ways.
chn: 就此永别吧。

eng: Wait, what's that?
chn: ……你等一下。

eng: That burn...
chn: 你身上的那个烧伤……

eng: Your eyes...
chn: 你的眼睛……

eng: You've inherited the flame of frenzy!
chn: ……你受赐癫火了吗！

eng: Oh, that's it... That's what I need...
chn: 啊啊，我……我也想要癫火……

eng: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
chn:
能把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法，
所有的一切都熔化的……

eng: The yellow flame of chaos...
chn: 黄色浑沌火焰……

eng: Oh, that's it... That's what I need...
chn: 啊啊，我……我也想要癫火……

eng: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
chn:
能把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法，
所有的一切都熔化的……

eng: The yellow flame of chaos...
chn: 黄色浑沌火焰……

eng: O Three Fingers, throw wide the door.
chn: ……参指啊，请您打开门吧。

eng: Please, bestow unto me the yellow flame of chaos.
chn: 请将黄色浑沌火焰赐予我吧。

eng: A frenzied flame to melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
chn:
赐予我将诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法──
所有的一切都熔化的癫火吧。

eng: May chaos take the world.
chn: 全为了让浑沌充满世间。

eng: May chaos take the world.
chn: 全为了让浑沌充满世间。

eng: The frenzied flame...burned me...
chn: ……癫火……也只有燃烧我……

eng: I was not... a suitable home.
chn: ……我不是……对的容器……

eng: Unknown warrior...
chn: ……不知名的……人啊……

eng: You, who reached the Three Fingers' abyss...
chn: ……来到……参指深渊的人啊……

eng: Tell the one... Who will become Lord...
chn: ……转达给……必定为王的人……

eng: Divest yourself of everything, and head to the door.
chn: ……卸下一切……走向门……

eng: Divest yourself of everything...
chn: ……卸下一切……

eng: And pray to the Lord...
chn: ……记得……请求王……

eng: To melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
chn:
……把诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法……
所有的一切都熔化……

eng: May chaos...take the world.
chn: ……让浑沌充满世间……

eng: The frenzied flame...burned me...
chn: ……癫火……也只有燃烧我……

eng: I was not... a suitable home.
chn: ……我不是……对的容器……

eng: Dear Lord, Lord of Chaos...
chn: ……王啊，浑沌之王啊……

eng: Melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.
chn:
熔化诅咒、痛苦、绝望、律法……
熔化所有的一切吧……

eng: May chaos...take the world.
chn: ……让浑沌充满世间……

eng: Are you offering that drink to me?
chn: ……你要给我酒吗？

eng: Oh, no, what do you take me for? I am an honest merchant of good standing!
chn: 嗯，我不是那种商人，不接受贿赂。

eng: [pause]
Oh, for heaven's sake, I jest.
chn: ……我开玩笑的。

eng: That's a very kind gesture, and I accept.
chn: 如果是单纯表示心意的礼物，我愿意收下。

eng: A pleasure as ever, old friend.
chn: 之后再请多关照了，大常客。

eng: Urgh!
chn: 呜。

eng: What's the matter with you?
chn: 你怎么了？

eng: Have you gone mad?
chn: 你也变得不正常了吗？

eng: I knew you for a highwayman all along.
chn: 唉，原来你的真面目是盗匪啊。

eng: Then it's time you learnt a lesson.
chn: 就让你知道，

eng: Our people will not stand for your barbarism!
chn: 攻击流浪民族，下场会怎样！

eng: Is that all you were, mate?
chn: 你的真面目还真是无聊。

eng: Is this...how it ends?
chn: 啊，我会死吗……

eng: I'll never find...
chn: 我还什么都不知道……

eng: <takes damage>
So you're just like the others?
chn: 你也一样？

eng: Another would-be oppressor to my people.
chn: 想要践踏我们吗？

eng: I see. I see how it is! You were one of them all along!
chn: 唉，我懂了。你是属于那一边啊──

eng: Trying to trample us underfoot, you grace-given bastard?
chn: 那些践踏我们，受到赐福的恶意化身！

eng: I'll never forgive your kind...
chn: 我绝对不会原谅你们……

eng: Your kind...will all be razed clean.
chn: ……你们最好都熔化到尸骨无存，

eng: By the frenzied flame...of chaos...
chn: 受浑沌癫火焚烧吧。

eng: Ahh, welcome...dear customer.
chn: 啊……客人啊，欢迎光临。

eng: Yes, right this way... Right this way...
chn: 这里……我在这里、在这里……

eng: Welcome...
chn: 客人啊……

eng: Valued customer... Come trade, in our wandering emporium.
chn: 欢迎光临……流浪民族的商店……

eng: Please, buy something...
chn: 买些什么吧……

eng: I'm hungry. I've been hungry so long. Please.
chn: 拜托了……我已经饿了好几天……

eng: Ahh, hello.
chn: 啊……客人啊，

eng: How nice of you to stop by, again.
chn: 您又来光顾了啊……

eng: Please, buy something, won't you?
chn: 买些什么吧……

eng: You're new around here.
chn: ……我没见过你。

eng: Surprised you found me in my little nook.
chn: 待在这么偏僻的地方，居然还能找到我。

eng: No matter, no matter. Your money's as good as anyone else's.
chn: 嗯，也罢，总之横竖都是客人。

eng: Why don't you take a look at my wares?
chn: 那来谈谈生意吧。

eng: Oh, but...
chn: 只不过……

eng: Don't ask me how I got my hands on them, eh.
chn: 商品的来源，就别追问了。

eng: Ah, back again are we?
chn: ……你又来了啊。

eng: Not everyone can tell how good my wares are. You've a discerning eye, you have.
chn: 明白我商品的价值，很有眼光嘛……

eng: Mm? Ohh...
A...custom...er?
chn: 客、人吗？

eng: Hello...again...
G-good...customer...
chn: 又来、光顾……

eng: Hello...again...
You...g-good customer...
chn: 常来、谢谢……

eng: G-good...bye...
Till nex...t-time...
chn: 欢迎、再来……

eng: Buying or selling?
chn: ……做买卖吗？

eng: Not finished yet?
chn: ……还有事吗？

eng: Trade again?
chn: ……还要做买卖吗？

eng: Be well.
chn: ……保重啊。

eng: Ooh, dear.
chn: 噫！

eng: Oh, dear, terribly sorry.
chn: ……啊，不、不好意思……

eng: Are you here as a customer?
chn: 您是客人吗……？

eng: Oh...
chn: 请、请问……

eng: Is there anything wrong?
chn: 我有哪里不周到吗……？

eng: Ooh!
chn: 噫噫！

eng: Ah, oh, terribly sorry...
chn: ……啊，不、不好意思……

eng: I-I didn't realise you came back.
chn: 您再度莅临了啊。

eng: I-I must apologise.
chn: 万分抱、抱歉……

eng: I'm afraid I've very little to offer.
chn: 商品不是很尽善尽美……

eng: Oh, nothing that suits your tastes, then?
chn: 您、您不满意吗？

eng: Heh heh...
chn: 呵、呵呵……

eng: What do you need?
chn: ……你是客人吗？

eng: I don't want any trouble.
chn: ……别做出节外生枝的举动。

eng: You again?
chn: ……又来了？

eng: I don't want any trouble.
chn: ……别做出节外生枝的举动。

eng: All done?
chn: ……好了？

eng: Well, be on your way, then.
chn: 那就快点离开。

eng: Well…
It's been an age since I've seen a customer.
chn: 已经很久没有客人上门了。

eng: How can I help, here at the end of the earth?
chn: ……你跑到这么偏僻的地方，求的是什么？

eng: Anything else for you?
chn: ……又想买些什么吗？

eng: Back already?
chn: ……你又来啦。

eng: Unusual fellow, aren't we.
chn: 说来你还真是奇特。

eng: Did this aged merchant have something that caught your eye?
chn: 这些老商人的货物，有什么吸引到你的目光吗？

eng: Have a safe journey.
chn: ……保重啊。

eng: Is someone there?
chn: ……有人在那里吗？

eng: A customer?
chn: ……想做买卖？

eng: Well, how long has it been.
chn: 这件事，久远到令人怀念啊。

eng: Something else?
chn: ……还想做买卖吗？

eng: Well, there you are again.
chn: ……哦，你又来了。

eng: Divorce from one's trade does not come easily.
chn: 世袭职业真像影子，分也分不开啊。

eng: Agh!
chn: 噫。

eng: Please! Stop this, good customer!
chn: 不要！不要打，客人！

eng: Bollocks! What the devil's wrong with you!
chn: 畜生！你有什么问题？

eng: Dirty little thief...
chn: ……你这下贱的强盗。

eng: You dirty little thief...
chn: ……下贱的强盗……

eng: Melt away with the rest of it...
chn: ……燃烧吧、熔化吧……

eng: Owgh!
chn: 唔。

eng: What are you playing at! Stop this!
chn: 你干什么！住手！

eng: That's the last straw, you bloody thief!
chn: 混账，少瞧不起人了，你这强盗！

eng: Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.
chn: ……别对我们流浪民族动手。

eng: How dare you trample us.
chn: ……别以为事情就这样结束……

eng: You filthy thief.
chn: ……你这强盗……

eng: A-agh!
chn: 噫。

eng: S...stop
chn: 不、要……

eng: P...please, s...stop
chn: 客、人啊……住、手……

eng: E...enough
chn: 够、了……

eng: M...melt away...
chn: 熔化、吧……

eng: G-good...bye...
chn: 永别、了……

eng: Dear...customer...
chn: 客、人啊……

eng: But, why...?
chn: 为什、么……？

eng: Kind...sir...
chn: 客、人啊……

eng: Madame...
chn: 客、人啊……

eng: You've always...
been...too kind...
chn: 常来、谢谢……

eng: Ngh!
chn: 唔。

eng: Enough.
chn: 住手。

eng: Another thief? Fine.
chn: ……遇上强盗啊，那没办法。

eng: What folly.
chn: ……无聊。

eng: How in the...
Blast...
chn: 怎么可能……

eng: Eh!
chn: 噫。

eng: Please!
chn: 噫噫！快住手！

eng: Please, stop this!
chn: 请您快住手！

eng: It was me! It's all my fault!
chn: 我道歉！我会道歉！

eng: Please, don't hurt me!
chn: 请不要这样对我！

eng: I said don't hurt me!
chn: 我不是说住手了吗！

eng: Aaargh!
chn: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

eng: I warned you. I told you to stop...
chn: ……所以我才说，要你住手啊……

eng: How could you...
chn: ……好过分……

eng: What have I ever done?
chn: 我有做了什么吗……？

eng: Heh heh...
chn: 呵、呵呵……

eng: Ow!
chn: 噫。

eng: I knew it, you dirty scoundrel!
chn: 你果然非善类！

eng: There was something off about you from the start!
chn: 打从一开始我就觉得可疑！

eng: Hurry up and die! You wretched thief!
chn: 去死吧！臭强盗！

eng: Rotten scoundrels...
chn: ……真的是……

eng: Every last one of 'em...
chn: 没有人信得过……

eng: Agh!
chn: 呜。

eng: Enough of that.
chn: ……别再动手了。

eng: Surely you are no highwayman.
chn: 除非你是夺人财物的盗匪。

eng: A pity, this.
chn: ……太可悲了。

eng: Our descent into savagery.
chn: 最近只碰见这种人物。

eng: You've never heard?
chn: 难道没有人提醒过你，

eng: Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.
chn: 流浪民族到底有多恐怖？

eng: Offed by a highwayman?
chn: 竟然会败给盗匪……

eng: I must've lost my touch…
chn: 岁月不饶人啊……

eng: Agh!
chn: 呜。

eng: Stop this at once.
chn: ……停下来。

eng: And I will forgive you.
chn: 现在停手，我能不追究。

eng: You'd come this far for your pillaging?
chn: ……在这种地方也会遇上强盗。

eng: No different than a plague, your kind.
chn: 你们真的是无所不在。

eng: I've heard enough from you. Be gone.
chn: 真烦人，消失吧。

eng: All that I wanted was solitude…
chn: ……就连唯一的孤独，也不能拥有吗……？
